original: Ivaṇṇa cavagga yakārā tālujā. Ṭavagga rakāra ḷakārā muddhajā. Tavagga lakāra sakārā dantajā. Uvaṇṇa pavaggā oṭṭhajā. Ekāro kaṇṭhatālujo. Okāro kaṇṭhoṭṭhajo.

original: Vakāro dantoṭṭhajo.
analyzed: vakāraḥ danta uṭṭhajaḥ

analyzed: ṅa ña ṇa na mā saka ṭṭhāna jā nāsika ṭṭhāna jā ca ati

original: Hakāraṃ pañcameheva, antaṭṭhāhi ca saṃyutaṃ;

analyzed: vadanti ittha kaṇṭha jam tat asaṃyutam

original: Karaṇaṃ jivhāmajjhaṃ tālujānaṃ, jivhopaggaṃ muddhajānaṃ, jivhāggaṃ dantajānaṃ, sesā sakaṭṭhānakaraṇā.
analyzed: karaṇam jivhāmajjham tālu jānam jivhopaggam muddha jānam jivhā aggam danta jānam sesā saka ṭṭhāna karaṇā

analyzed: evam ṭhāna karaṇa ppayatana suti kāla bhinnesu akkharesu sarāḥ nissayāḥ itare nissitā tattha

original: Nissayādo sarā vuttā, byañjanā nissitā tato;

analyzed: vuttam ca

original: Nissayādippabhedehi, vutto tesamanukkamo”ti.

original: Adhikakkharavantāni, ekatālīsato ito;

original: Na buddhavacanānīti, dīpetācariyāsabho.
analyzed: na buddha vacanāni iti

analyzed: apiggahaṇam heṭṭhā vuttānam apekkhā karaṇa ttham

original: 3. Tatthodantā sarā aṭṭha.
analyzed: tattha udantā sarāḥ aṭṭha

original: Tattha tesu akkharesu akārādīsu okārantā aṭṭha akkharā sarā nāma honti. Taṃ yathā – a ā i ī u ū e o-iti sarā.

original: 4. Lahumattā tayo rassā.
analyzed: lahu mattā tayoḥ rassā

analyzed: tattha aṭṭhasu saresu lahumattā tayo sarāḥ rassāḥ nāma honti tam yathā rassā

analyzed: chandasi gahaṇa attham rassa kāla yogataḥ rassāḥ rassa kālavantaḥ vā rassāḥ

original: Sararassaggahaṇāni ca vattante.

original: 5. Aññe dīghā.
analyzed: aññe dīghā

original: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu rassehi aññe dvimattā pañca sarā dīghā nāma honti. Taṃ yathā – ā ī ū e o-iti dīghā.
analyzed: tattha aṭṭhasu saresu rassehi aññe dvimattā pañca sarāḥ dīghāḥ nāma honti tam yathā dīghā

analyzed: dīghāḥ kvaci saṃyoga pubbāḥ ekāra ukārāḥ rassāḥ iva vuccante yathā ettha seyyaḥ oṭṭho

original: 6. Dumhi garu.
analyzed: dumhi garu

original: Dvinnaṃ samūho du, tasmiṃ dumhi. Saṃyogabhūte akkhare pare yo pubbo rassakkharo, so garusañño hoti. Yathā – datvā, hitvā, bhutvā.

analyzed: garūti vattate

original: 7. Dīgho ca.
analyzed: dīghaḥ ca

original: Dīgho ca saro garusañño hoti. Yathā – nāvā, nadī, vadhū, dve, tayo. Garukato añño “lahuko”ti veditabbo.
analyzed: dīghaḥ ca saraḥ garu sañño hoti yathā nāvā nadī vadhū dve tayo garukataḥ aññaḥ lahuko ti veditabbo

original: 8. Sesā byañjanā.
analyzed: sā isā byañjanā

original: kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha
analyzed: kha ga gha ṅa ca cha ja jha ña ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa ta tha da dha na pa pha ba bha

original: ma, ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṃ-iti byañjanā. Kakārādīsvakāro uccāraṇattho.
analyzed: ma ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ iti byañjanā uccāraṇa attho

original: “Byañjanā”ti vattate.
analyzed: byañjanāti vattate

original: 9. Vaggā pañcapañcaso mantā.
analyzed: vaggā pañca pañcasaḥ mantā

original: Tesaṃ kho byañjanānaṃ kakārādayo makārantā pañcavīsati byañjanā pañcapañcavibhāgena
analyzed: tesam kho kakāra ādayaḥ makāra antā pañcavīsati byañjanā pañca pañca vibhāgena

original: vaggā nāma honti. Taṃ yathā – ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa,

original: ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma-iti vaggā.
analyzed: ta tha da dha na pa pha ba bha mā iti vaggā

original: Te pana paṭhamakkharavasena kavaggacavaggādivohāraṃ gatā, vaggoti samūho, tattha pañcapañcavibhāgenāti vā pañca pañca etesamatthīti vā pañcapañcaso, mo anto yesaṃ te mantā.
analyzed: te pana paṭhama kkhara vasena ka vagga ca vagga ādi vohāram gatāḥ vaggo ti samūhaḥ tattha pañca pañca vibhāgena ati vā pañca pañca etesam atthi iti vā pañca pañcaso antaḥ yesam te mantā

original: 10. Aṃiti niggahītaṃ.
analyzed: aṃ iti niggahītam

original: Akāro uccāraṇattho, itisaddo panānantaravuttanidassanattho, aṃiti yaṃ akārato paraṃ
analyzed: akāraḥ uccāraṇa atthaḥ iti saddo pana anantara vutta nidassana atthaḥ yam akārato param

original: gayhatīti vā niggahītaṃ.
analyzed: gayhati iti vā niggahītam

original: Karaṇaṃ niggahetvāna, mukhenāvivaṭena yaṃ;
analyzed: karaṇam yam

analyzed: vuccate niggahītan ti vuttam bindu sara anugam

original: Idha avuttānaṃ parasamaññānampi payojane sati gahaṇatthaṃ paribhāsamāha.
analyzed: idha avuttānam para samaññānam pi payojane sati gahaṇa attham paribhāsam āha

original: 11. Parasamaññā payoge.
analyzed: para samaññā payoge

original: Yā ca pana parasmiṃ sakkataganthe, paresaṃ vā veyyākaraṇānaṃ samaññā ghosāghosalopasavaṇṇasaṃyogaliṅgādikā, tā payoge sati etthāpi yujjante.
analyzed: yā ca pana parasmim sakkata ganthe paresam vā veyyākaraṇānam samaññā ghosa aghosa lopa savaṇṇa saṃyoga liṅga ādikā tā payoge sati ettha api yujjante

original: Parasmiṃ, paresaṃ vā samaññā parasamaññā, veyyākaraṇe, veyyākaraṇamadhītānaṃ vā samaññātyattho. Payujjanaṃ payogo, viniyogo.
analyzed: parasmim paresam vā samaññā para samaññā veyyākaraṇe veyyākaraṇam adhītānam vā samaññā atyattho payujjanam payogaḥ viniyogaḥ

original: Tattha vaggānaṃ paṭhamadutiyā, sakāro ca aghosā. Vaggānaṃ tatiyacatutthapañcamā, ya ra lava ha ḷā cāti ekavīsati ghosā nāma.
analyzed: tattha vaggānam paṭhama dutiyā sakāro ca aghosāḥ vaggānam tatiya catuttha pañcamā ya ra la va ha ḷā ca ati ekavīsati ghosāḥ nāma

original: Ettha ca vaggānaṃ dutiyacatutthā dhanitātipi vuccanti, itare sithilāti. Vināso lopo.
analyzed: ettha ca vaggānam dutiya catutthāḥ vuccanti itare vināsaḥ lopo

original: Rassassarā sakadīghehi aññamaññaṃ savaṇṇā nāma, ye sarūpātipi vuccanti. Sarānantaritāni
analyzed: ras sa s rā saka dīghehi aññam aññam savaṇṇāḥ nāma ye vuccanti sa ra anantaritāni

original: byañjanāni saṃyogo. Dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṃ liṅgaṃ. Vibhatyantaṃ padaṃ. Iccevamādi.
analyzed: byañjanāni saṃyogaḥ liṅgam vibhati antam padam iti ca evamādi

original: Iti saññāvidhānaṃ.
analyzed: iti saññā vidhānam

original: Sarasandhividhāna
analyzed: sara sandhi vidhāna

original: Atha sarasandhi vuccate.
analyzed: atha sara sandhi vuccate

original: Loka aggapuggalo, paññā indriyaṃ, tīṇi imāni, no hi etaṃ, bhikkhunī ovādo, mātu upaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: loka agga puggalaḥ paññā indriyam tīṇi imāni no hi etam bhikkhunī ovādaḥ mātu upaṭṭhānaṃ

original: sametu āyasmā, abhibhū āyatanaṃ, dhanā me atthi, sabbe eva, tayo assu dhammā, asanto
analyzed: sametu āyasmai āyatanam dhanā me atthi sabbe eva tayo assu dhammā asantaḥ

original: ettha na dissanti itīdha sarādisaññāyaṃ sabbasandhikaraṇaṭṭhāne byañjanaviyojanatthaṃ paribhāsamāha.
analyzed: ettha na dissanti iti idha sara ādi saññā ayam sabba sandhi karaṇa ṭhāne byañjana viyojana attham paribhāsam āha

original: 12. Pubbamadhoṭhitamassaraṃ sarena viyojaye.
analyzed: pubbam adhoṭhita massaram sarena viyojaye

original: Sarenāti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ, sahayoge vā, sandhitabbe sarasahitaṃ pubbabyañjanaṃ
analyzed: sarena ati nissakke karaṇavacanam saha yoge vā sandhi tabbe sara sahitam pubba byañjanam

analyzed: an atikkamantaḥ adhoṭhita massaram ca katvā sarataḥ viyojaya iti sarataḥ byañjanam viyojetabbam

original: Ettha ca assaraggahaṇasāmatthiyena “byañjana”nti laddhaṃ.
analyzed: ettha ca laddham

original: 13. Sarā sare lopaṃ.
analyzed: sara ā sare lopam

original: Sarā kho sabbepi sare pare ṭhite lopaṃ papponti. Lopoti adassanaṃ anuccāraṇaṃ. Ettha
analyzed: sarā kho sabbe pi sare pare ṭhite lopam papponti a dassanam an uccāraṇam ettha

original: sarāti kāriyīniddeso. Bahuvacanaṃ panettha ekekasmiṃ sare pare bahūnaṃ lopañāpanatthaṃ.
analyzed: sarā ati kāriyī niddesaḥ bahuvacanam pana ittha eka ekasmin sare pare bahūnam lopa ñāpana attham

original: Sareti nimittaniddeso, nimittasattamī cāyaṃ, nimittopādānasāmatthiyato vaṇṇakālabyavadhāne
analyzed: sarā iti nimitta niddesaḥ nimitta sattamī ca ayam nimitta upādāna sāmatthiyataḥ vaṇṇa kāla byavadhāne

original: sandhikāriyaṃ na hoti. Lopanti kāriyaniddeso, idaṃ pana suttaṃ upari paralopavidhānato
analyzed: sandhi kāriyam na hoti kāriya niddeso idam pana suttam upari para lopa vidhānato

original: pubbalopavidhānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, evaṃ sabbattha sattamīniddese pubbasseva vidhi, na
analyzed: pubba lopa vidhānam ti daṭṭhabbam evam sabbattha sattamī niddese pubbassa iva na

original: parassa vidhānanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: parassa vidhānam ti veditabbam

original: “Assaraṃ, adhoṭhita”nti ca vattate, siliṭṭhakathane paribhāsamāha.
analyzed: ca vattate siliṭṭha kathane paribhāsam āha

original: 14. Naye paraṃ yutte.

original: Tatra ayaṃ, buddha anussati, sa atthikā, paññavā assa, tadā ahaṃ, yāni idha bhūtāni,

original: Pubbo saro parassare lutte kvacidīghaṃ pappoti. Caggahaṇaṃ luttadīghaggahaṇānukaḍḍhanatthaṃ, taṃ “cānukaḍḍhitamuttaratra nānuvattate”ti ñāpanatthaṃ.

original: Lokassāti, devāti, vītipatanti, vītināmenti, saṅghāṭīpi, jīvitahetūpi, vijjūva, kiṃsūdha vittaṃ, sādhūti.

original: 21. Ivaṇṇo yaṃ navā.

analyzed: kvaci iti kim

original: Yiṭṭhaṃ vā hutaṃ vā loke, yadi vā sāvake, puggalā dhammadasā te, bhovādī nāma so hoti, yathābhāvī guṇena so itīdha –
analyzed: vā hutam vā loke yadi vā sāvake puggalāḥ dhamma dasā te bho vādī nāma saḥ hoti yathābhāvī guṇena saḥ iti idha

original: Pubbasmiṃyevādhikāre –
analyzed: pubbasmin eva adhikāre

original: 38. Rassaṃ.
analyzed: rassam

original: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci rassaṃ pappontīti chandānurakkhaṇe, āgame, saṃyoge ca rassattaṃ.
analyzed: sarā khaḥ byañjane pare kvaci rassam papponti iti chanda anurakkhaṇe āgame saṃyoge ca rassa ttam

original: Chandānurakkhaṇe tāva yiṭṭhaṃva hutaṃva loke, yadiva sāvake, puggala dhammadasā te, bhovādi nāma so hoti, yathābhāvi guṇena so.
analyzed: chanda anurakkhaṇe tāva loke yat iva sāvake puggala dhamma dasā te bho vādi nāma saḥ hoti yathābhāvi guṇena so

original: Āgame yathayidaṃ, sammadakkhāto.
analyzed: āgame yathayidam sammad akkhāto

original: Saṃyoge parākamo parakkamo, āsādo assādo, evaṃ taṇhakkhayo, jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi, thullaccayo.
analyzed: saṃyoge parākamaḥ parakkamaḥ āsādaḥ assādaḥ evam taṇha khayaḥ jhānassa lābhimhi vasimhi thullaccayo

original: Kvacīti kiṃ? Māyidaṃ, manasā daññā vimuttānaṃ, yathākkamaṃ, ākhyātikaṃ, dīyyati, sūyyati.
analyzed: kvaci iti kim manasā daññā yathākkamam ākhyātikam dīyyati sūyyati

original: Eso kho byantiṃ kāhiti, so gacchaṃ na nivattati iccatra –
analyzed: saḥ gaccham na nivattati id catra

original: Tasmiṃyevādhikāre –
analyzed: tasmin ya eva adhikāre

original: 39. Lopañca tatrākāro.
analyzed: lopaḥ ca tatra akāraḥ

original: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṃ papponti, tatra lutte ṭhāne akārāgamo ca hoti. Etatasaddantokārassevāyaṃ lopo.
analyzed: sarā khaḥ byañjane pare kvaci lopam tatra lutte ṭhāne akāra āgamaḥ ca hoti lopaḥ

original: Esa kho byantiṃ kāhiti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattati, evaṃ esa dhammo, esa pattosi, sa muni, sa sīlavā.
analyzed: esa kho byantim sa gaccham na nivattati evam esa dhammo esa pattosi sa muni sa sīlavā

original: Kvacīti kiṃ? Eso dhammo, so muni, so sīlavā.
analyzed: kvaci iti kim esaḥ dhammo so muni so sīlavā

original: Casaddena etasaddantassa sarepi kvaci lopo. Yathā – esa attho, esa ābhogo, esa idāni.
analyzed: ca saddena eta sadda antassa sare pi kvaci lopaḥ yathā esa atthaḥ esa ābhogaḥ esa idāni

original: Vipariṇāmena “saramhā, byañjanassā”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: vipariṇāmena saramhā byañjanassa ati ca vattate

original: 40. Paradvebhāvo ṭhāne.
analyzed: para dvebhāvaḥ ṭhāne

original: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa dvebhāvo hoti ṭhāne. Dvinnaṃ bhāvo dvibhāvo, so eva dvebhāvo.
analyzed: saramhā parassa byañjanassa dvebhāvaḥ hoti ṭhāne dvinnam bhāvaḥ dvi bhāvaḥ saḥ eva dvebhāvaḥ

original: Ettha ca ṭhānaṃ nāma rassākārato paraṃ pa pati paṭikamukusa kudha kī gaha juta ñāsi
analyzed: ettha ca ṭhānam nāma rassa ākārato param pa pati

original: su sambhū sara sasādīnamādibyañjanānaṃ dvebhāvaṃ, tika taya tiṃsa vatādīnamādi ca,
analyzed: su sambhū sara sasa ādīnam ādi byañjana ānam dvebhāvam tika taya tiṃsa vata ādīnam ādi ca

original: vatu vaṭudisādīnamantañca, u du ni-upasagga ta catu cha santasaddādesādiparañca,
analyzed: vatu vaṭu disa ādīnam antañca u du ni upasagga catu cha santa sadda desa ādi parañca

original: apadantā nākāradīghato yakārādi ca,
analyzed: a pada antāḥ na ākāra dīghataḥ yakāra ādi ca

original: Yavataṃ talanādīna-mādeso ca sayādinaṃ;
analyzed: ya vatam tala na ādīnam ādesaḥ ca saya ādinam

original: Saha dhātvantassādeso, sīsakāro tapādito.
analyzed: saha dhātu antaḥ sa ādesaḥ sīsakāraḥ ta pa ā t itaḥ

original: Chandānurakkhaṇe ca – ghara jhe dhaṃsu bhamādīnamādi ca, rassākārato vaggānaṃ catutthadutiyā ca iccevamādi.
analyzed: chanda anurakkhaṇe ca ghara jhe dhaṃsu bhama ādīnam ādi ca rassa ākārataḥ vaggānam catuttha dutiyā ca i ca evamādi

original: Tattha pa pati paṭīsu tāva – idha pamādo idhappamādo, evaṃ appamādo, vippayutto,
analyzed: tattha pa pati paṭīsu tāva idha pamādaḥ idhappamādaḥ evam appamādaḥ vippayutto

original: suppasanno, sammā padhānaṃ sammappadhānaṃ, rassattaṃ, appativattiyo, adhipatippaccayo,
analyzed: su pasannaḥ sammā padhānam sammappadhānam rassattam appativattiyaḥ adhipati paccayo

original: suppatiṭṭhito, appaṭipuggalo, vippaṭisāro, suppaṭipanno, suppaṭipatti.
analyzed: suppatiṭṭhitaḥ appaṭipuggalaḥ vippaṭisāraḥ suppaṭipanno suppaṭipatti

original: Kamādidhātūsu – pakkamo, paṭikkamo, hetukkamo, ākamati akkamati, evaṃ parakkamati, yathākkamaṃ.
analyzed: kama ādi dhātūsu pakkamaḥ paṭikkamaḥ hetukkamaḥ ākamati akkamati evam parakkamati yathākkamam

original: Pakkosati, paṭikkosati, anukkosati, ākosati, akkosati.
analyzed: pakkosati paṭikkosati anukkosati ākosati akkosati

original: Akkuddho, atikkodho.
analyzed: akkuddhaḥ atikkodhaḥ

original: Dhanakkīto, vikkayo, anukkayo.
analyzed: dhanakkītaḥ vikkayaḥ anukkayaḥ

original: Paggaho, viggaho, anuggaho, niggaho, candaggaho, diṭṭhiggāho.
analyzed: paggahaḥ viggahaḥ anuggahaḥ niggahaḥ candaggahaḥ diṭṭhiggāho

original: Pajjoto, vijjotati, ujjoto.
analyzed: pajjotaḥ vijjotati ujjotaḥ

original: Kataññū, viññū, paññāṇaṃ, viññāṇaṃ, anuññā, manuññā, samaññā.
analyzed: kataññū viññū paññāṇam viññāṇam anuññā manuññā samaññā

original: Avassayo, nissayo, samussayo.
analyzed: avassayaḥ nissayaḥ samussayaḥ

original: Appassuto, vissuto, bahussuto, āsavā assavā.
analyzed: appassutaḥ vissutaḥ bahu ssutaḥ āsavā assavā

original: Passambhanto, vissambhati.
analyzed: passambhantaḥ vissambhati

original: Aṭṭassaro, vissarati, anussarati.
analyzed: aṭṭassaraḥ vissarati anussarati

original: Passasanto, vissasanto, mahussasanto, āsāso assāso.
analyzed: passasantaḥ vissasantaḥ mahussasantaḥ āsāsaḥ assāsaḥ

original: Avissajjento, vissajjento, pariccajanto, upaddavo, upakkiliṭṭho, mittaddu, āyabbayo, udabbahi iccādi.
analyzed: a vissajjentaḥ vissajjentaḥ pariccajantaḥ upaddavaḥ upakkiliṭṭhaḥ mittaddu āyabbayaḥ udabbahi iccādi

original: Saramhāti kiṃ? Sampayutto, sampatijāto, sampaṭicchannaṃ, saṅkamanto, saṅgaho.
analyzed: saramha ati kim sampayuttaḥ sampatijātaḥ sampaṭicchannam saṅkamantaḥ saṅgahaḥ

original: Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Mā ca pamādo, patigayhati, vacīpakopaṃ rakkheyya, ye pamattā yathā matā, manopakopaṃ rakkheyya, idha modati, pecca modati.
analyzed: ṭhānā iti kim mā ca pamādaḥ patigayhati vacī pakopam rakkheyya ye pamattāḥ yathā matāḥ manā upakopam rakkheyya idha modati pecca modati

original: Tikādīsu – kusalattikaṃ, pītittikaṃ, hetuttikaṃ, vedanāttikaṃ, lokattayaṃ, bodhittayaṃ,
analyzed: tika ādīsu kusala ttikam pīti ttikam hetu ttikam vedanā ttikam lokattayam bodhittayam

original: vatthuttayaṃ. Ekattiṃsa, dvattiṃsa, catuttiṃsa. Sīlabbataṃ, subbato, sappītiko, samannāgato, punappunaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: vatthuttayam ekattiṃsa dvattiṃsa catuttiṃsa sīlabbatam subbataḥ sappītikaḥ samannāgato punappunam iccādi

original: Vatu vaṭu disādīnamante yathā – vattati, vaṭṭati, dassanaṃ, phasso iccādi.
analyzed: vatu vaṭu disā ādīnam ante yathā vattati vaṭṭati dassanam phasso iccādi

original: U du ni upasaggādiparesu – ukaṃso ukkaṃso. Dukaraṃ dukkaraṃ, nikaṅkho nikkaṅkhe.
analyzed: u du ni upasagga ādi paresu ukaṃsaḥ ukkaṃsaḥ dukaram dukkaram nikaṅkhaḥ nikkaṅkhe

original: Evaṃ uggataṃ, duccaritaṃ, nijjaṭaṃ, uññātaṃ, unnati, uttaro, dukkaro, niddaro, unnato, duppañño, dubbalo, nimmalo, uyyutto, dullabho, nibbatto, ussāho, dussaho, nissāro.
analyzed: evam uggatam duccaritam nijjaṭam uññātam unnati uttaraḥ dukkaraḥ niddaraḥ unnataḥ duppaññaḥ dubbalaḥ nimmalaḥ uyyuttaḥ dullabhaḥ nibbattaḥ ussāhaḥ dussahaḥ nissāraḥ

original: Tathā takkaro, tajjo, tanninno, tappabhavo, tammayo.
analyzed: tathā takkaraḥ tajjaḥ tanninnaḥ tappabhavaḥ tammayaḥ

original: Catukkaṃ, catuddisaṃ, catuppādo, catubbidhaṃ, catussālaṃ.
analyzed: catukkam catuddisam catur pādaḥ catubbidham catur sālam

original: Chakkaṃ, channavuti, chappadikā, chabbassāni.
analyzed: chakkam channavuti chappadikā chabbassāni

original: Sakkāro, sakkato, saddiṭṭhi, sappuriso, mahabbalo.
Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Nikāyo, nidānaṃ, nivāso, nivāto, tato, catuvīsati, chasaṭṭhi.
analyzed: ṭhānā iti kim nikāyaḥ nidānam nivāsaḥ nivāto catuvīsati

original: Yakārādimhi – nīyyati, sūyyati, abhibhūyya, viceyya, vineyya, dheyyaṃ, neyyaṃ, seyyo, jeyyo, veyyākaraṇo.
analyzed: yakāra ādimhi sūyyati abhibhūyya viceyya vineyya dheyyam neyyam seyyaḥ jeyyaḥ veyyākaraṇaḥ

original: Ādisaddena etto, ettāvatā.
analyzed: ādi saddena ettaḥ ettāvatā

original: Anākāraggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Mālāya, dolāya, samādāya.
analyzed: an ākāra ggahaṇam kim mālāya dolāya samādāya

original: Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Upanīyati, sūyati, toyaṃ.
analyzed: upanīyati sūyati toyam

original: Yavatamādese – jāti andho, vipali āso, ani āyo, yadi evaṃ, api ekacce, api ekadā iccatra, ikārassa “ivaṇṇo yaṃ navā”ti yakāre kate –
analyzed: yava tama ādese jāti andhaḥ yadi evam api ekacce api ekadā iccatra ikārassa yam navāti yakāre kate

original: “Sabbassa so dāmhi vā”ti ito maṇḍūkagatiyā vāti vattate.
analyzed: sabbassa saḥ dāmhi vāti itas maṇḍūkagatiyā vāti vattate

original: 41. Yavataṃ talanadakārānaṃ byañjanāni calañajakārattaṃ.
analyzed: yavatam byañjanāni

original: Yakāravantānaṃ talanadakārānaṃ saṃyogabyañjanāni yathākkamaṃ calañajakārattamāpajjante vā.
analyzed: saṃyoga byañjanāni yathākkamam vā

original: Kāraggahaṇaṃ yavataṃ sakāra ka ca ṭa pavaggānaṃ sakārakacaṭapavaggādesatthaṃ, tathā yavataṃ ta dha ṇakārānaṃ cha jhañakārādesatthañca, tato yavatamādesassa anena dvibhāvo.
analyzed: kāra ggahaṇam yavatam sakāra ka ca ṭa pavaggānam sakāraka ca ṭa pavagga ādesa attham tathā yavatam ta dha ṇakārānam cha jha ñakāra ādesa attham ca tatas anena dvi bhāvaḥ

original: Jaccandho, vipallāso, aññāyo, yajjevaṃ, appekacce appekadā.
analyzed: vipallāsaḥ aññāyaḥ appekacce appekadā

original: Vāti kiṃ? Paṭisanthāravutyassa, bālyaṃ, ālasyaṃ.
analyzed: vāti kim bālyam ālasyam

original: Saramhāti kiṃ? Añāyo, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ.
analyzed: saramhā ati kim

original: Tapādito simhi – tapassī, yasassī.
analyzed: tapa āditaḥ simhi tapassī yasassī

original: Chandānurakkhaṇe – nappajjahe vaṇṇabalaṃ purāṇaṃ, ujjugatesu seyyo, gacchanti suggatinti.
analyzed: chanda anurakkhaṇe vaṇṇa balam purāṇam ujju gatesu seyyaḥ gacchanti suggatin ti

original: Vaggacatutthadutiyesu pana tasmiṃyevādhikāre “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: vagga catuttha dutiyesu pana tasmin yeva adhikāre para dvebhāvaḥ ṭhāna iti ca vattate

original: Vaggacatutthadutiyānaṃ sadisavasena dvibhāve sampatte niyamatthamāha.
analyzed: vagga catuttha dutiyānam sadisa vasena dvi bhāve sampatte niyama ttham āha

original: 42. Vagge ghosāghosānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā.
analyzed: vagge ghosāghosānam tatiya paṭhamā

original: Saramhā parabhūtānaṃ vagge ghosāghosānaṃ byañjanānaṃ yathākkamaṃ vaggatatiya paṭhamakkharā dvibhāvaṃ gacchanti ṭhāneti ṭhānāsannavasena tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamāva honti.
analyzed: para bhūtānam vagge ghosa aghosānam byañjanānam yathākkamam vagga tatiya paṭhama kkharāḥ dvi bhāvam gacchanti ṭhāne iti ṭhāna āsanna vasena tad bagge tatiya paṭhamāḥ ava honti

original: Ettha ca sampatte niyamattā ghosāghosaggahaṇena catutthadutiyāva adhippetā, itarathā
analyzed: ettha ca sampatte niyama ttā ghosa aghosa ggahaṇena catuttha dutiyā vā adhippetāḥ itarathā

original: aniṭṭhappasaṅgosiyā. Tena “kataññū, tannayo, tammayo”tiādīsu vaggapañcamānaṃ satipi
analyzed: tena kataññū tannayaḥ tammayaḥ ti ādīsu vagga pañcamānam satipi

original: ghosatte tatiyappasaṅgona hoti, ṭhānādhikārato vā.
analyzed: ghosatte tatiya ppasaṅgo na hoti ṭhāna adhikārataḥ vā

original: Gharādīsu pa u du niādiparacatutthesu tāva – pagharati paggharati, evaṃ uggharati,
analyzed: ghara ādīsu pa u du ni ādi para catutthesu tāva pagharati paggharati evam uggharati

original: ugghāṭeti, dugghoso, nigghoso, eseva cajjhānaphalo, paṭhamajjhānaṃ, abhijjhāyati,
analyzed: ugghāṭeti dugghosaḥ nigghosaḥ esa iva paṭhamajjhānam abhijjhāyati

original: ujjhāyati, viddhaṃseti, uddhaṃsito, uddhāro, niddhāro, niddhano, niddhuto, vibbhanto,
analyzed: ujjhāyati viddhaṃseti uddhaṃsitaḥ uddhāraḥ niddhāraḥ niddhanaḥ niddhutaḥ vibbhantaḥ

original: ubbhato, dubbhikkhaṃ, nibbhayaṃ, tabbhāvo, catuddhā, cabhubbhi, chaddhā, saddhammo,
analyzed: ubbhataḥ dubbhikkham nibbhayam tad bhāvaḥ catuddhā chaddhā saddhammaḥ

original: sabbhūto, mahaddhano, mahabbhayaṃ.
analyzed: sat bhūtaḥ mahat dhanaḥ mahat bhayam

original: Yavata mādesādīsu – bojjhaṅgā, āsabbhaṃ, bujjhitabbaṃ, bujjhati.
analyzed: yava ta mā desa ādīsu bojjhaṅgāḥ āsabbham bujjhitabbam bujjhati

original: Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Sīlavantassa jhāyino, ye jhānappasutā dhīrā, nidhānaṃ, mahādhanaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhāne ti kim sīlavantassa jhāyinaḥ ye jhāna ppasutāḥ dhīrāḥ nidhānam mahādhanam

original: Rassākāratoparaṃ vaggadutiyesu – pañca khandhā pañcakkhandhā, evaṃrūpakkhandho, akkhamo,
analyzed: rassa ākāra toparam vagga dutiyesu pañca khandhāḥ pañca khandhāḥ evaṃrūpa kkhandhaḥ akkhamaḥ

original: abhikkhaṇaṃ, avikkhepo, jātikkhettaṃ, dhātukkhobho, āyukkhayo. Setachattaṃ setacchattaṃ,
analyzed: abhikkhaṇam avikkhepaḥ jāti kkhettam dhātu kkhobho āyu kkhayo seta chattam seta chattam

original: evaṃ sabbacchannaṃ, vicchinnaṃ, bodhicchāyā, jambucchāyā, samucchedo. Tatra ṭhito
analyzed: evam sabba channam vicchinnam bodhi chāyā jambu chāyā samucchedaḥ tatra ṭhitaḥ

original: tatraṭṭhito, evaṃ thalaṭṭhaṃ, jalaṭṭhaṃ, adhiṭṭhitaṃ, niṭṭhitaṃ, cattāriṭṭhānāni,
analyzed: tatraṭṭhitaḥ evam thala aṭṭham jala aṭṭham adhiṭṭhitam niṭṭhitam cattāri ṭhānāni

original: garuṭṭhāniyo, samuṭṭhito, suppaṭṭhāno. Yasatthero, yattha, tattha, pattharati, vitthāro,
analyzed: samuṭṭhitaḥ su paṭṭhānaḥ yasa thero yattha tattha pattharati vitthāro

original: abhitthuto, vitthambhito, anutthunaṃ, catuttho, kuttha. Papphoṭeti, mahapphalaṃ,
analyzed: abhitthutaḥ vitthambhitaḥ anutthunam catutthaḥ mahat phalam

original: nipphalaṃ, vipphāro, paripphuseyya, madhupphāṇitaṃ.
analyzed: nipphalam vipphāraḥ paripphuseyya madhu phāṇitam

original: Ākārato – ākhāto ākkhāto, evaṃ taṇhākkhayo, āṇākkhettaṃ, saññākkhandho, āchādayati, ācchādayati, evaṃ ācchindati, nāvāṭṭhaṃ, āttharati, āpphoṭeti.
analyzed: ākārataḥ ākhātaḥ ākkhātaḥ evam taṇhā kkhayaḥ āṇā khettam saññā kkhandho āchādayati ācchādayati evam ācchindati āttharati āpphoṭeti

original: Saramhāti kiṃ? Saṅkhāro, taṅkhaṇe, sañchannaṃ, taṇṭhānaṃ, santhuto, tamphalaṃ.
analyzed: saramhā ati kim sañchannam taṇṭhānam

original: Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Pūvakhajjakaṃ, tassa chaviyādīni chinditvā, yathā ṭhitaṃ, kathaṃ, kammaphalaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhāna iti kim pūva khajjakam tassa chaviya ādīni chinditvā yathā ṭhitam katham kamma phalam

original: Nikamati, nipatti, nicayo, nicarati, nitaraṇaṃ iccatra – “do dhassa cā”ti ettha caggahaṇassa bahulatthattā tena caggahaṇena yathāpayogaṃ bahudhā ādeso siyā.
analyzed: nikamati nipatti nicayaḥ nicarati nitaraṇam iccatra daḥ dhassa ca ati ettha ca ggahaṇassa bahula ttha ttā tena ca ggahaṇena yathā apayogam bahudhā ādesaḥ siyā

original: Yathā – ni upasaggato kamu pada ci cara tarānaṃ paṭhamassa vaggadutiyo iminā dvittaṃ, nikkhamati, nipphatti, nicchayo, niccharati, nittharaṇaṃ.
analyzed: yathā ni upasaggataḥ kamu pada ci cara tarānam paṭhamassa vagga dutiyaḥ iminā nikkhamati nipphatti nicchayaḥ niccharati nittharaṇam

original: Tathā bo vassa kuva diva siva vajādīnaṃ dvirūpassāti vakāradvayassa bakāradvayaṃ,
analyzed: tathā baḥ vassa kuva diva siva vaja ādīnam dvi rūpassa ati vakāra dvayassa bakāra dvayam

original: yathā – kubbanto, evaṃ kubbāno, kubbanti, sadhātvantayādesassa dvittaṃ. Divati dibbati,
analyzed: yathā kubbantaḥ evam kubbāno kubbanti sa dhātu anta yādesassa dvittam divati dibbati

original: evaṃ dibbanto, sibbati, sibbanto, pavajati pabbajati, pabbajanto, nivānaṃ nibbānaṃ,
analyzed: evam dibbantaḥ sibbati sibbantaḥ pavajati pabbajati pabbajantaḥ nivānam nibbānam

original: nibbuto, nibbindati, udabbayaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: nibbutaḥ nibbindati udabbayam iti ca ādi

original: Lo rassa pari taruṇādīnaṃ kvaci. Paripanno palipanno, evaṃ palibodho, pallaṅkaṃ, taruṇo taluno, mahāsālo, māluto, sukhumālo.
analyzed: laḥ rassa pari taruṇa ādīnam kvaci paripannaḥ palipannaḥ evam palibodhaḥ pallaṅkam taruṇaḥ talunaḥ mahāsālaḥ mālutaḥ sukhumālaḥ

original: Ṭo tassa dukkatādīnaṃ kvaci. Yathā – dukkataṃ dukkaṭaṃ, evaṃ sukaṭaṃ, pahaṭo, patthaṭo, uddhaṭo, visaṭo iccādi.
analyzed: ṭaḥ tassa dukkata ādīnam kvaci yathā dukkatam dukkaṭam evam sukaṭam pahaṭaḥ patthaṭaḥ uddhaṭaḥ visaṭaḥ iccādi

original: Ko tassa niyatādīnaṃ kvaci. Niyato niyako.
analyzed: kaḥ tassa niyata ādīnam kvacid niyataḥ niyakaḥ

original: Yo jassa nijādissa vā, nijaṃputtaṃ niyaṃputtaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ jassa nija ādissa vā nijaṃputtam niyaṃputtam

original: Ko gassa kulūpagādīnaṃ, kulūpago kulūpako.
analyzed: kaḥ gassa kulūpaga ādīnam kulūpagaḥ kulūpakaḥ

original: Tathā ṇo nassa pa pariādito. Panidhānaṃ paṇidhānaṃ, evaṃ paṇipāto, paṇāmo, paṇītaṃ, pariṇato, pariṇāmo, ninnayo niṇṇayo, evaṃ uṇṇato, oṇato iccādi.
analyzed: tathā panidhānam paṇidhānam evam paṇipātaḥ paṇāmaḥ paṇītam pariṇataḥ pariṇāmaḥ ninnayaḥ ninnayaḥ evam uṇṇataḥ oṇataḥ iccādi

original: Patiaggi, patihaññati itīdha –
analyzed: pati aggi pati haññati iti idha

original: 43. Kvaci paṭi patissa.
analyzed: kvaci paṭi patissa

original: Patiiccetassa upasaggassa sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci paṭiādeso hoti pubbassaralopo. Paṭaggi, paṭihaññati.
analyzed: pati i cca itassa upasaggassa sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci paṭi ādesaḥ hoti pubba ssara lopaḥ paṭaggi paṭihaññati

original: Kvacīti kiṃ? Paccattaṃ, patilīyati.
analyzed: kvaci iti kim paccattam patilīyati

original: Puthajano puthabhūtaṃ itīdha “anto”ti vattate.
analyzed: putha jano putha bhūtam iti idha antaḥ iti vattate

original: 44. Puthassu byañjane.
analyzed: puthassu byañjane

original: Puthaiccetassa anto saro ukāro hoti byañjane pare, dvittaṃ. Puthujjano, puthubhūtaṃ.
analyzed: antaḥ saraḥ ukāraḥ hoti byañjane pare dvittam puthujjano puthubhūtam

original: Byañjaneti kiṃ? Putha ayaṃ. “Puthassa a putha”iti samāseneva siddhe puna antaggahaṇādhikārena kvaci aputhantassāpi uttaṃ sare.
analyzed: byañjana iti kim ayam puthassa samāsena iva siddhe puna anta ggahaṇa adhikārena kvaci sare

original: Mano aññaṃ manuññaṃ, evaṃ imaṃ evumaṃ, paralopo, iti evaṃ itvevaṃ, ukārassa vakāro.
analyzed: manaḥ aññam manuññam evam imaṃ evumam para lopaḥ iti evam i tu evam ukārassa vakāraḥ

original: Avakāso, avanaddho, avavadati, avasānamitīdha –
analyzed: avakāsaḥ avanaddhaḥ avavadati avasānam iti idha

original: “Kvaci byañjane”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: kvacid byañjana iti ca vattate

original: 45. O avassa.
analyzed: o avassa

original: Avaiccetassa upasaggassa okāro hoti kvaci byañjane pare. Okāso, onaddho, ovadati, osānaṃ.
analyzed: upasaggassa okāraḥ hoti kvaci byañjane pare okāsaḥ onaddhaḥ ovadati osānam

original: Kvacīti kiṃ? Avasānaṃ, avasussatu.
analyzed: kvaci iti kim avasānam avasussatu

original: Byañjaneti kiṃ? Avayāgamanaṃ, avekkhati.
analyzed: byañjana iti kim avayā gamanam avekkhati

original: Avagate sūriye, avagacchati, avagahetvā itīdha –
analyzed: avagate sūriye avagacchati avagahetvā iti idha

original: “Avasse”ti vattate oggahaṇañca.
analyzed: avassa iti vattate oggahaṇam ca

original: 46. Tabbiparītūpapade byañjane ca.
analyzed: tap bipari tu upapade byañjane ca

original: Avasaddassa upapade tiṭṭhamānassa tassokārassa viparīto ca hoti byañjane pare.
analyzed: avasaddassa upapade tiṭṭhamānassa tassa ukārassa viparītaḥ ca hoti byañjane pare

original: Tassa viparīto tabbiparīto, upoccāritaṃ padaṃ upapadaṃ, okāraviparītoti ukārassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Casaddo katthaci nivattanattho, dvittaṃ. Uggate sūriye, uggacchati, uggahetvā.
analyzed: tassa viparītaḥ tad biparītaḥ upoccāritam padam upapadam okāra viparītaḥ iti ukārassa etam adhivacanam ca saddo katthaci nivattana atthaḥ uggate sūriye uggacchati uggahetvā

original: Atippakho tāva, parasataṃ, parasahassaṃ itīdha –
analyzed: tāva para satam para sahassam iti idha

original: “Āgamo”ti vattate.
analyzed: āgamaḥ iti vattate

original: 47. Kvaci o byañjane.
analyzed: kvaci o byañjane

original: Byañjane pare kvaci okārāgamo hotīti atippa parasaddehi okārāgamo “yavamada”iccādisutte casaddena atippato gakārāgamo ca.
analyzed: byañjane pare kvaci okāra āgamaḥ hoti iti para saddehi okāra āgamaḥ ca saddena gakāra āgamaḥ ca

original: Atippago kho tāva, parosataṃ, parosahassaṃ, ettha “sarā sare lopa”nti pubbassaralopo.
analyzed: atippago kho tāva parosatam parosahassam ettha sarā sare pubbassara lopaḥ

original: Manamayaṃ, ayamayaṃ itīdha “manogaṇādīna”nti vattate.
analyzed: manam ayam ayam iti idha manaḥ gaṇa ādīn anti vattate

original: 48. Etesamo lope.
analyzed: e te samaḥ lope

original: Etesaṃ manogaṇādīnamanto ottamāpajjate vibhattilope kate.
analyzed: etesam manaḥ gaṇa ādīnam antaḥ vibhatti lope kate

original: Manomayaṃ, ayomayaṃ, evaṃ manoseṭṭhā, ayopatto, tapodhano, tamonudo, siroruho, tejokasiṇaṃ, rajojallaṃ, ahorattaṃ, rahogato.
analyzed: manaḥ mayam ayaḥ mayam evam manoseṭṭhā ayopatto tapodhano tamonudaḥ siroruhaḥ tejaḥ kasiṇam rajojallam ahorattam rahogataḥ

original: Ādisaddena āpodhātu, vāyodhātu.
analyzed: ādi saddena āpaḥ dhātu vāyodhātu

original: Sīhagatiyā vādhikārato idha na bhavati, manamattena manacchaṭṭhānaṃ, ayakapallaṃ, tamavinodano, manaāyatanaṃ.
analyzed: sīha gatiyā vā adhikārataḥ idha na bhavati mana mattena mana cha ṭṭhānam mana āyatanam

original: Iti byañjanasandhividhānaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: iti byañjana sandhi vidhānam niṭṭhitam

original: Niggahītasandhividhāna
analyzed: niggahīta sandhi vidhāna

original: Atha niggahītasandhi vuccate.
analyzed: atha niggahīta sandhi vuccate

original: Taṇhaṃ karo, raṇaṃ jaho, saṃ ṭhito, jutiṃ dharo, saṃ mato itīdha “niggahīta”nti adhikāro, “byañjane”ti vattate.
analyzed: adhikāraḥ byañjana iti vattate

original: 49. Vaggantaṃ vā vagge.
analyzed: vagga antam vā vagge

original: Vaggabhūte byañjane pare niggahītaṃ kho vaggantaṃ vā pappotīti nimittānusvarānaṃ
analyzed: vagga bhūte byañjane pare niggahītam kho vaggantam vā pappoti iti

original: ṭhānāsannavasena tabbaggapañcamo hoti. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo. Tena “taṇhaṅkaro,
analyzed: ṭhāna āsanna vasena tad bagga pañcamaḥ hoti vavatthita vibhāsa atthaḥ yam vā saddaḥ tena taṇhaṅkaro

original: raṇañjaho, saṇṭhito, jutindharo, sammato”tiādīsu niccaṃ.
analyzed: raṇañjahaḥ saṇṭhitaḥ jutindharaḥ sammataḥ ti ādīsu niccam

original: Taṅkaroti taṃ karoti, taṅkhaṇaṃ taṃkhaṇaṃ, saṅgaho saṃgaho, taṅghataṃ taṃ ghataṃ.
analyzed: taṅkaroti tam karoti taṅkhaṇam taṃkhaṇam saṅgaho saṃgaho taṅghatam tam ghatam

original: Dhammañcare dhammaṃ care, tañchannaṃ taṃ channaṃ, tañjātaṃ taṃ jātaṃ, taññāṇaṃ taṃ
analyzed: dhammam care dhammam care tat channam tat channam tat jātam tat jātam tat ñāṇam taṃ

original: ñāṇaṃ. Taṇṭhānaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṇḍahati bhaṃ ḍahati. Tantanoti taṃ tanoti, tanthiraṃ
analyzed: ñāṇam tat ṭhānam tam ṭhānam tat ḍahati bham ḍahati tantanoti tam tanoti tanthiram

original: taṃ thiraṃ, tandānaṃ taṃ dānaṃ, tandhanaṃ taṃ dhanaṃ, tanniccutaṃ taṃ niccutaṃ. Tampatto
analyzed: tam thiram tat dānam tam dānam tat dhanam tam dhanam tat niccutam tam niccutam tam patto

original: taṃ patto, tamphalaṃ taṃ phalaṃ, tesambodho tesaṃ bodho, sambhūto saṃbhūto, tammittaṃ
analyzed: tam patto tam phalam tam phalam tesambodho tesambodho sambhūtaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ tammittaṃ

original: taṃ mittaṃ. Kiṅkato kiṃ kato, dātuṅgato dātuṃ gatoti evamādīsu vikappena.
analyzed: tam mittam kiṅkato kim kataḥ dātuṃgataḥ dātum gataḥ iti evamādīsu vikappena

original: Idha na bhavati, na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, saraṇaṃ gacchāmi.
analyzed: idha na bhavati na tam kammam katam sādhu saraṇam gacchāmi

original: Sati copari vāggahaṇe vijjhantare vā idha vāggahaṇakaraṇamatthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ,
analyzed: sati ca upari vāc gahaṇe vijjhantare vā idha vāc gahaṇa karaṇam atthantara viññāpana attham

original: tena niggahītassa saṃupasaggapumantassa le lakāro. Yathā – paṭisaṃlīno paṭisallīno,
analyzed: tena niggahītassa saṃupasagga pumantassa le lakāraḥ yathā paṭisaṃlīnaḥ paṭisallīnaḥ

original: evaṃ paṭisallāṇo, sallakkhaṇā, sallekho, sallāpo, puṃliṅgaṃ pulliṅgaṃ.
analyzed: evam paṭisallāṇaḥ sat lakkhaṇā sat lekhaḥ sallāpaḥ pum liṅgam pum liṅgam

original: Paccattaṃ eva, taṃ eva, tañhi tassa, evañhi vo itīdha “vā”ti adhikāro.
analyzed: paccattam eva tam eva tañhi tassa evañhi vaḥ iti idha vāti adhikāro

original: 50. Ehe ñaṃ.
analyzed: e he ñaṃ

original: Ekārahakāre pare niggahītaṃ kho ñakāraṃ pappoti vā, ekāre ñādesassa dvibhāvo.
analyzed: ekāra hakāre pare niggahītam kho ñakāram pappoti vā ekāre ña ādesassa dvi bhāvaḥ

original: Paccattaññevapaccattaṃ eva, taññeva taṃ eva, tañhi tassa tañhi tassa, evañhi vo evañhi vo.
analyzed: eva taṃ eva tam eva tañhi tassa tañhi tassa evañhi vo evañhi vo

original: Vavatthitavibhāsattā vāsaddassa evahinipātato aññattha na hoti, yathā – evametaṃ, evaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vavatthita vibhāsa ttā vā saddassa eva hi nipātataḥ aññattha na hoti yathā evam etam evam hoti

original: Saṃyogo, saṃyojanaṃ, saṃyato, saṃyācikāya, yaṃ yadeva, ānantarikaṃ yamāhu itīdha “ña”miti vattate.
analyzed: saṃyogaḥ saṃyojanam saṃyataḥ saṃyācikāya yam yat eva ānantarikam yam āhuḥ iti idha ñam iti vattate

original: 51. Sa ye ca.
analyzed: sa ye ca

original: Niggahītaṃ kho yakāre pare saha yakārena ñakāraṃ pappoti vā, ñādesassa dvittaṃ.
analyzed: niggahītam kho yakāre pare saha yakārena ñakāram pappoti vā ña ādesassa

original: Saññogo saṃyogo, saññojanaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, saññato saṃyato, saññācikāya saṃyācikāya, yaññadeva yaṃ yadeva, ānantarikaññamāhu ānantarikaṃ yamāhu.
analyzed: saññogo saṃyogo saññojanam saṃyojanam saññato saṃyato saññācikāya saṃyācikāya yat yat eva ānantarikam yam āhu ānantarikam yam āhu

original: Vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattāva saṃpadantato ca sabbanāmayakāraparato ca niggahītā aññattha na hoti. Yathā – etaṃ yojanaṃ, taṃ yānaṃ, saraṇaṃ yanti.
analyzed: vā saddassa saṃpad antataḥ ca sabba nāma yakāra paratas ca niggahītā aññattha na hoti yathā etam yojanam tam yānam saraṇam yanti

original: Ettha ca “saha ye cā”ti vattabbe “sa ye cā”ti vacanato suttantesu sukhuccāraṇatthamakkharalopopīti
analyzed: ettha ca saha ye ca ati vattabbe sa ye ca ati vacanato suttantesu

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ, tena paṭisaṅkhāya yoniso paṭisaṅkhā yoniso, sayaṃ abhiññāya sacchikatvā
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam tena paṭisaṅkhāya yonisas paṭisaṅkhā yonisas sayam abhiññāya sacchikatvā

original: sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā, pariyesanāya pariyesanātiādi sijjhati.
analyzed: sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā pariyesanāya pariyesanā ati ādi sijjhati

original: Taṃ ahaṃ brūmi, yaṃ āhu, dhanaṃ eva, kiṃ etaṃ, nindituṃ arahati, yaṃ aniccaṃ, taṃ anattā, etaṃ avoca, etaṃ eva iccatra –
analyzed: tam aham brūmi yam āhu dhanam eva kim etam ninditum arahati yam aniccam tam anattā etam avocaḥ etam eva

original: 52. Madā sare.
analyzed: madā sare

original: Niggahītassa kho sare pare makāradakārādesā honti vā. Ettha ca vāsaddādhikārassa vavatthitavibhāsattā dakāro yatetasaddato parasseva.
analyzed: niggahītassa kho sare pare makāra dakāra ādesāḥ honti vā ettha ca vā sadda adhikārassa vavatthita vibhāsa ttā dakāraḥ parassa iva

original: Tamahaṃ brūmi, yamāhu, dhanameva, kimetaṃ, ninditumarahati, yadaniccaṃ, tadanattā, etadavoca, etadeva.
analyzed: tam aham brūmi yam āhuḥ dhanam eva kim etam ninditum arahati yat aniccam tat anattā etat avocaḥ etat eva

original: Vāti kiṃ? Taṃ ahaṃ, etaṃ eva, akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ.
analyzed: vāti kim tam aham etam eva mam

original: Ettha ca madāti yogavibhāgena byañjanepi vā makāro. Tena “buddhama saraṇama gacchāmī”tiādi sijjhati.
analyzed: ca yoga vibhāgena byañjane pi vā tena buddham saraṇam gacchāmi itiādi sijjhati

original: Tāsaṃ ahaṃ santike, vidūnaṃ aggaṃ, tassa adāsiṃ ahaṃ itīdha “sare”ti vattate.
analyzed: tāsam aham santike vidūnam aggam tassa adāsim aham iti idha sarā iti vattate

original: 53. Kvaci lopaṃ.
analyzed: kvaci lopam

original: Niggahītaṃ kho sare pare lopaṃ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇe sukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne. Pubbassaralopo, parassa asaṃyogantassa dīgho.
analyzed: niggahītam kho sare pare lopam pappoti kvaci chanda anurakkhaṇe sukha uccāraṇa ṭṭhāne pubbassara lopaḥ parassa a saṃyoga antassa dīghaḥ

original: Tāsāhaṃ santike, vidūnaggaṃ, tassa adāsāhaṃ, tathāgatāhaṃ, evāhaṃ, kyāhaṃ.
analyzed: tāsāham santike vidūnaggam tassa adāsāham tathāgatāham eva aham kyā aham

original: Kvacīti kiṃ? Evamassa, kimahaṃ.
analyzed: kvaci iti kim evam assa kim aham

original: Ariyasaccānaṃ dassanaṃ, etaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ, saṃratto, saṃrāgo, saṃrambho, avisaṃhāro, ciraṃ pavāsiṃ, gantuṃ kāmo, gantuṃ mano itīdha “kvaci lopa”nti vattate.
analyzed: ariya saccānam dassanam etam buddhānam sāsanam saṃrattaḥ saṃrāgaḥ saṃrambhaḥ a visaṃhāraḥ ciram pavāsim gantum kāmaḥ gantum mano iti idha kvaci vattate

original: 54. Byañjane ca.
analyzed: byañjane ca

original: Niggahītaṃ kho byañjane ca pare lopaṃ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇādimhi. Rakārahakāresu upasaggantassa dīgho.
analyzed: niggahītam khaḥ byañjane ca pare lopam pappoti kvaci chanda anurakkhaṇa ādimhi rakāra hakāresu upasagga antassa dīghaḥ

original: Ariyasaccāna dassanaṃ, etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ, sāratto, sārāgo, sārambho, avisāhāro, cirappavāsiṃ, dvittaṃ, gantukāmo, gantumano.
analyzed: ariya saccāna dassanam etam buddhāna sāsanam sā rattaḥ sā rāgaḥ sārambhaḥ a visāhāraḥ cira ppavāsim dvittam gantu kāmaḥ gantu manaḥ

original: Kvacīti kiṃ? Etaṃ maṅgalamuttamaṃ.
analyzed: kvaci iti kim etam maṅgalam uttamam

original: Kataṃ iti, kiṃ iti, abhinanduṃ iti, uttattaṃ iva, cakkaṃ iva, kaliṃ idāni, kiṃ idāni,
analyzed: katam iti kim iti abhinandum iti uttattam iva cakkam iva kalim idāni kim idāni

original: tvaṃ asi, idaṃ api, uttariṃ api, dātuṃ api, sadisaṃ eva itīdha “niggahītamhā, lopa”nti ca vattate.
analyzed: tvam asi idam api uttarim api dātum api sadisam eva iti idha ca vattate

original: 55. Paro vā saro.
analyzed: paras vā saro

original: Niggahītamhā paro saro lopaṃ pappoti vā. Niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ.
analyzed: niggahītamhā paraḥ saraḥ lopam pappoti vā niggahītassa vagga anta ttam

original: Katanti, kinti, abhinandunti, uttattaṃva, cakkaṃva, kalindāni, kindāni, tvaṃsi, idampi, uttarimpi, dātumpi, sadisaṃva.
analyzed: katanti kinti abhinandunti cakkaṃva kalindāni kindāni tvaṃsi idampi uttarimpi dātumpi sadisaṃva

original: Vāti kiṃ? Kataṃ iti, kimiti, dātumapi, sāmaṃ eva.
analyzed: vāti kim iti kim iti dātum api eva

original: Ayampi vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattā itīvīdānisīpevādito aññattha na hoti. Yathā – ahaṃ ettha, etaṃ ahosi.
analyzed: ayam pi vā saddassa vavatthita vibhāsa ttā iti ivi idānisī pevā āditaḥ aññattha na hoti yathā aham ettha etam ahosi

original: Evaṃ assa te āsavā, pupphaṃ assā uppajjati itīdha sare pare lutte vipariṇāmena “parasmiṃ, sare, lutte”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: evam assa te āsavā puppham assā uppajjati iti idha sare pare lutte vipariṇāmena parasmin sare luttā iti ca vattate

original: 56. Byañjano ca visaññogo.
analyzed: byañjanaḥ ca vi saññogaḥ

original: Niggahītamhā parasmiṃ sare lutte byañjano saññogo ce, visaññogova hotīti saṃyogekadesassa purimabyañjanassa lopo.
analyzed: niggahītamhā parasmin sare lutte byañjanaḥ saññogaḥ ce visaññogaḥ uva hoti iti saṃyoga eka desassa purima byañjanassa lopaḥ

original: Dvinnaṃ byañjanānamekatra ṭhiti saññogo, idha pana saṃyujjatīti saññogo, purimo vaṇṇo, vigato saññogo assāti visaññogo, paro.
analyzed: dvinnam byañjanānam ekatra saññogaḥ idha pana saṃyujjati iti saññogaḥ purimaḥ vaṇṇaḥ vigataḥ saññogaḥ assa ati visaññogaḥ paraḥ

original: Evaṃ sa te āsavā, pupphaṃsā uppajjati.
analyzed: evam sa te āsavāḥ pupphaṃsāḥ uppajjati

original: Lutteti kiṃ? Evamassa.
analyzed: luttā iti kim evam assa

original: Casaddena tiṇṇaṃ byañjanānaṃ sarūpasaṃyogopi visaññogo hoti. Yathā – agyāgāraṃ, vutyassa.
analyzed: ca saddena tiṇṇam byañjanānam sarūpa saṃyogaḥ api visaññogaḥ hoti yathā

original: Liṅgassa sambandhī akāro ca pitusatthuiccevamādīnamanto ca ākārattamāpajjate ge pare.

original: “Ge, rassa”miti ca vattate.

original: 74. Sesato lopaṃ gasipi.

original: Keci ālapanābhibyattiyā bhavantasaddaṃ vā hesaddaṃ vā payujjante. Bho purisa tiṭṭha, he purisā vā.

analyzed: amha tumha ntu rāja brahmatta sakha satthu pitu icca ivamādīhi smā vacanam nā ava daṭṭhabbanti smā vacanassa nā bhāva atideso atideso pana chabbidhaḥ

original: kathitakammaṃ dvikammikāya yācanakriyāya pattumicchitatarattā. “Yaññadatta”miti appadhānattā
analyzed: kathita kammam dvikammikāya yācana kriyāya pattum icchitatara ttā yañña dattam iti appadhāna ttā

original: akathitakammaṃ. Tathā samiddhaṃ dhanaṃ bhikkhate, ajaṃ gāmaṃ nayati, parābhavantaṃ
analyzed: a kathita kammam tathā samiddham dhanam bhikkhate ajam gāmam nayati parābhavantam

original: purisaṃ, mayaṃ pucchāma gotamaṃ, bhagavā bhikkhū etadavoca iccādi.
analyzed: purisam mayam pucchāma gotamam bhagavā bhikkhū etat avoca iccādi

original: Abhihitakamme pana na hoti, yathā – kaṭo karīyate devadattena, sugatena desito dhammo, yaññadatto kambalaṃ yācīyate brāhmaṇena iccādi.
analyzed: abhihita kamme pana na hoti yathā kaṭaḥ karīyate devadattena sugatena desitaḥ dhammaḥ yaññadatto kambalam yācīyate brāhmaṇena iccādi

original: “Dutiyā”ti adhikāro.
analyzed: adhikāro

original: 286. Gati buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara sayādīnaṃ kārite vā.
analyzed: gati buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara kārite vā

original: Gamu sappa gatimhi, budha bodhane, budha avagamane vā, bhuja pālanabyavaharaṇesu,
analyzed: gamu sappa gatimhi budha bodhane budha avagamane vā bhuja pālana byavaharaṇesu

original: paṭha byattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, hara haraṇe, kara karaṇe, si saye iccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ
analyzed: paṭha vācāyam hara haraṇe kara karaṇe si iti ca evamādīnam dhātūnam

original: payoge kārite sati payojjakakattubhūte kammani liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti vā. Niccasampatte
analyzed: payoge kārite sati payojjaka kattu bhūte kammani liṅgamhā dutiyā vibhatti hoti vā nicca sampatte

original: vikappatthoyaṃ, tena tassa pakkhe tatiyā hoti.
analyzed: vikappa atthaḥ iyam tena tassa pakkhe tatiyā hoti

original: Yo koci puriso gāmaṃ gacchati, tamañño payojayati. Puriso purisaṃ gāmaṃ gamayati,
analyzed: yaḥ koci purisaḥ gāmam gacchati tam aññaḥ payojayati purisaḥ purisam gāmam gamayati

original: purisena vā gāmaṃ gamayati. Evaṃ sissaṃ dhammaṃ bodheti ācariyo, mātā puttaṃ bhojanaṃ
analyzed: purisena vā gāmam gamayati evam sissam dhammam bodheti ācariyaḥ mātā puttam bhojanam

original: bhojayati, sissaṃ dhammaṃ pāṭheti ācariyo, puriso purisaṃ bhāraṃ hāreti, tathā puriso
analyzed: bhojayati sissam dhammam pāṭheti ācariyaḥ puriso purisam bhāram hāreti tathā puriso

original: purisaṃ kammaṃ kārayati, purisena vā kammaṃ kārāpayati, puriso purisaṃ sayāpayati.
analyzed: purisam kammam kārayati purisena vā kammam kārāpayati puriso purisam sayāpayati

original: Evaṃ sabbattha kārite kattukammani dutiyā.
analyzed: evam sabbattha kārite kattu kammani dutiyā

original: Kāriteti kiṃ? Puriso gāmaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: kāritā iti kim purisaḥ gāmam gacchati

original: Abhihite na bhavati, purisena puriso gāmaṃ gamīyate, sisso dhammaṃ bodhīyate iccādi.
analyzed: abhihite na bhavati purisena purisaḥ gāmam gamīyate sissaḥ dhammam bodhīyate iccādi

original: 287. Kāladdhānamaccantasaṃyoge.
analyzed: kāla d dhāna mac canta saṃyoge

original: Accantaṃ nirantaraṃ saṃyogoaccantasaṃyogo. Kāladdhānaṃ dabbaguṇakriyāhi accantasaṃyoge tehi kāladdhānavācīhi liṅgehi dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
analyzed: nirantaram saṃyogaḥ accanta saṃyogaḥ kāladdhānam dabba guṇa kriyāhi accanta saṃyoge tehi kāladdhāna vācīhi liṅgehi dutiyā vibhatti hoti

original: Kāle tāva – sattāhaṃ gavapānaṃ, māsaṃ maṃsodanaṃ, saradaṃ ramaṇīyā nadī, sabbakālaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ nandanaṃ, māsaṃ sajjhāyati, tayo māse abhidhammaṃ desesi.
analyzed: kāle tāva sattāham gavapānam māsam maṃsodanam saradam ramaṇīyā nadī sabbakālam ramaṇīyam nandanam māsam sajjhāyati tayaḥ māse abhidhammam desesi

original: Addhāne – yojanaṃ vanarāji, yojanaṃ dīgho pabbato, kosaṃ sajjhāyati.
analyzed: addhāne yojanam vana rāji yojanam dīghaḥ pabbataḥ kosam sajjhāyati

original: Accantasaṃyogeti kiṃ? Māse māse bhuñjati, yojane yojane vihāraṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
analyzed: acc anta saṃyoga iti kim māse māse bhuñjati yojane yojane vihāram patiṭṭhāpesi

original: 288. Kammappavacanīyayutte.
analyzed: kamma ppavacanīya yutte

original: Kammappavacanīyehi nipātopasaggehi yutte yoge sati liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
analyzed: kammappavacanīyehi nipāta upasaggehi yutte yoge sati liṅgamhā dutiyā vibhatti hoti

original: Kammaṃ pavacanīyaṃ yesaṃ te kammappavacanīyā, parasamaññāvasena vā anvādayo kammappavacanīyā.
analyzed: kammam pavacanīyam yesam te kamma ppavacanīyā para samaññā vasena vā anu ādayaḥ kamma ppavacanīyā

original: Tattha anusaddassa lakkhaṇe, sahatthe, hīne ca kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā. Yathā
analyzed: tattha anu saddassa lakkhaṇe sahatthe hīne ca kammappavacanīya saññā vuttā yathā

original: – pabbajitamanu pabbajiṃsu, nadimanvavasitā bārāṇasī, nadiyā saha avabaddhāti attho,
analyzed: pabbajitam anu pabbajiṃsu nadim anvavasitā bārāṇasī nadiyā saha avabaddhā iti attho

original: anu sāriputtaṃ paññavā.
analyzed: anu sāriputtam paññavā

original: Lakkhaṇādīsu “lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhānabhāga vicchāsu pati pari anavo”ti pati pari anūnaṃ kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ādīsu pati pari anavaḥ ti pati pari anūnam kammappavacanīya saññā vuttā

original: Lakkhaṇe sūriyuggamanaṃ pati dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṃ, rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṃ pari, rukkhaṃ anu.
analyzed: lakkhaṇe sūri yuggamanam pati dibbāḥ bhakkhāḥ pātubhaveyyum rukkham pati vijjotate candaḥ rukkham pari rukkham anu

original: Itthambhūtakkhāne sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pati, mātaraṃ pari, mātaraṃ anu.
analyzed: sādhu devadattaḥ mātaram pati mātaram pari mātaram anu

original: Bhāge yadettha maṃ pati siyā, maṃ pari, maṃ anu, taṃ dīyatu.
analyzed: bhāge yadā itthā mam pati siyāḥ mam pari mam anu tam dīyatu

original: Vicchāyoge atthamatthaṃ pati saddo nivisati, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pari, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ anu.
analyzed: vicchā yoge attham attham pati saddaḥ nivisati rukkham rukkham pati vijjotate cando rukkham rukkham pari rukkham rukkham anu

original: “Abhirabhāge”ti abhissa bhāgavajjitesu lakkhaṇādīsu kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā. Taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato, sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ abhi.
analyzed: abhissa bhāga vajjitesu lakkhaṇa ādīsu kammappavacanīya saññā vuttā tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyāṇaḥ kitti saddaḥ abbhuggataḥ sādhu devadattaḥ mātaram abhi

original: Nipāte dhi brāhmaṇassa hantāra miccevamādi.
analyzed: nipāte dhi brāhmaṇassa hantāram iti evamādi

original: 289. Kvaci dutiyā chaṭṭhīnamatthe.
analyzed: kvaci dutiyā chaṭṭhī nama tthe

original: Chaṭṭhīnaṃ atthe kvaci dutiyāvibhatti hoti. Antarāabhito parito pati paṭibhātiyoge
analyzed: chaṭṭhīnam atthe kvaci dutiyā vibhatti hoti antarā abhitas paritas pati paṭibhā ati yoge

original: ayaṃ. Antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno, rājagahassa
analyzed: ayam antarā ca rājagaham antarā ca nāḷandam addhāna magga paṭipannaḥ rājagahassa

original: ca nāḷandāya ca majjheti attho. Abhito gāmaṃ vasati, parito gāmaṃ vasati, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ
analyzed: ca nāḷandāya ca majjhe iti attho abhitas gāmam vasati paritas gāmam vasati nadim nerañjaram

original: pati, nerañjarāya nadiyā samīpeti attho. Paṭibhantu taṃ cunda bojjhaṅgā, upamā maṃ
analyzed: nerañjarāya nadiyā samīpā iti attho paṭibhantu tam cunda bojjhaṅgāḥ upamā mama

original: paṭibhāti, upamā mayhaṃ upaṭṭhahatīti attho.
analyzed: paṭibhāti upamā mayham upaṭṭhahati iti attho

original: “Kvaci dutiyā, atthe”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: kvaci dutiyā attha iti ca vattate

original: 290. Tatiyāsattamīnañca.
analyzed: tatiyā sattamī nañ ca

original: Tatiyāsattamīnamatthe ca kvaci liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
analyzed: tatiyā sattamī nama tthe ca kvaci liṅgamhā dutiyā vibhatti hoti

original: Tatiyatthe sace maṃ nālapissati, tvañca maṃ nābhibhāsasi, vinā saddhammaṃ kuto sukhaṃ, upāyamantarena na atthasiddhi.
analyzed: tatiya tthe sace mama na ālapissati tvam ca mama na abhibhāsasi vinā saddhammam kuto sukham upāyam antarena na attha siddhi

original: Sattamiyatthe – kāle, upānvajjhāvasassa payoge, adhisiṭṭhāvasānaṃ payoge, tappānacāre ca dutiyā.
analyzed: sattamiya tthe kāle payoge adhisiṭṭha avasānam payoge tad pāna cāre ca dutiyā

original: Kāle tāva – pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā. Imaṃ rattiṃ cattāro mahārājāno.
analyzed: kāle tāva pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā ekam samayam bhagavā imam rattim cattāraḥ mahā rājānaḥ

original: Upādipubbassa vasadhātussa payoge – gāmaṃ upavasati, gāmaṃ anuvasati, vihāraṃ adhivasati,
analyzed: upa ādi pubbassa vasa dhātussa payoge gāmam upavasati gāmam anuvasati vihāram adhivasati

original: gāmaṃ āvasati, agāraṃ ajjhāvasati. Tathā pathaviṃ adhisessati, gāmaṃ adhitiṭṭhati, gāmaṃ ajjhāvasati.
analyzed: gāmam āvasati agāram ajjhāvasati tathā pathavim adhisessati gāmam adhitiṭṭhati gāmam ajjhāvasati

original: Tappānacāresu – nadiṃ pivati, gāmaṃ carati iccādi.
analyzed: tad pāna cāresu nadim pivati gāmam carati iccādi

original: Kasmiṃ atthe tatiyā?
analyzed: kasmin atthe tatiyā

original: 291. Karaṇe tatiyā.
analyzed: karaṇe tatiyā

original: Karaṇakārake tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
analyzed: karaṇa kārake tatiyā vibhatti hoti

original: Kiṃ karaṇaṃ?
analyzed: kim karaṇam

original: 292. Yena vā kayirate taṃ karaṇaṃ.
analyzed: yena vā tam karaṇam

original: Yena vā kattā upakaraṇabhūtena vatthunā kriyaṃ abyavadhānena karoti, yena vā vikaroti, yena vā pāpuṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ karaṇasaññaṃ hoti.
analyzed: yena vā kattā upakaraṇa bhūtena vatthunā kriyam a byavadhānena karoti yena vā vikaroti yena vā pāpuṇāti tam kārakam karaṇa saññam hoti

original: Karīyate anenāti karaṇaṃ, ettha ca satipi sabbakārakānaṃ kriyāsādhakatte “yena vā kayirate”ti visesetvā vacanaṃ kattūpakaraṇabhūtesu kārakesu sādhakatamasseva gahaṇatthaṃ.
analyzed: anena ati karaṇam ettha ca sati pi sabba kārakānam kriyā sādhaka tte yena vā visesetvā vacanam kattu upakaraṇa bhūtesu kārakesu sādhakatamassa iva gahaṇa attham

original: Vuttañca
analyzed: vuttam ca

original: “Yassa sabbavisesena, kriyāsaṃsiddhihetutā;
analyzed: yassa sabba visesena kriyā saṃsiddhi hetu tā

original: Sambhāvīyati taṃ vuttaṃ, karaṇaṃ nāma kāraka”nti.
analyzed: sambhāvīyati tam vuttam karaṇam nāma kārakan ti

original: Taṃ pana duvidhaṃ ajjhattika bāhiravasena.
analyzed: tam pana duvidham ajjhattika bāhira vasena

original: Yathā – hatthena kammaṃ karoti, cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, manasā dhammaṃ viññāya. Dattena vīhayo lunāti, agginā kuṭiṃ jhāpeti.
analyzed: yathā hatthena kammam karoti cakkhunā rūpam passati manasā dhammam viññāya dattena vīhayaḥ lunāti agginā kuṭim jhāpeti

original: “Tatiyā”ti adhikāro.
analyzed: adhikāraḥ

original: 293. Kattari ca.
analyzed: kattari ca

original: Kattari ca kārake liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti. Caggahaṇena itthambhūtalakkhaṇe,
analyzed: kattari ca kārake liṅgamhā tatiyā vibhatti hoti ca ggahaṇena ittham bhūta lakkhaṇe

original: kriyāpavagge, pubbasadisasamūnattha kalaha nipuṇa missaka sakhilatthādiyoge, kāladdhānesu,
analyzed: kriyā pavagge pubba sadisa samūnattha kalaha nipuṇa missaka sa khilattha ādi yoge kāla ddhānesu

original: paccattakammatthapañcamiyatthādīsu ca tatiyā.
analyzed: paccatta kamma ttha pañcamiya ttha ādīsu ca tatiyā

original: Ko ca kattā?
analyzed: kaḥ ca kattā

original: 294. Yo karoti sa kattā.
analyzed: yaḥ karoti sa kattā

original: Yo kriyaṃ attappadhāno hutvā karoti, so kattusañño hoti.
analyzed: yaḥ kriyam attappadhānaḥ hutvā karoti saḥ kattu saññaḥ hoti

original: So tividho suddhakattā hetukattā kammakattāti. Tattha yo sayameva kriyaṃ karoti,
analyzed: saḥ tividhaḥ suddha kattā hetu kattā kamma kattā ati tattha yaḥ sayam eva kriyam karoti

original: so suddhakattā. Yo aññaṃ kātuṃ samatthaṃ akarontaṃ kammaṃ niyojeti, so hetukattā,
analyzed: saḥ suddha kattā yaḥ aññam kātum samattham a karontam kammam niyojeti saḥ hetukattā

original: yathā – gantuṃ samattho devadatto, tamañño payojeti “gamayati devadatta”nti.
analyzed: yathā gantum samatthaḥ devadattaḥ tam aññaḥ gamayati devadatta nti

original: Yaṃ pana tattha tattha gacchati devadatto, tamañño payojayati “gamayati devadatta”nti
analyzed: yam pana tattha tattha gacchati devadatto tam aññaḥ payojayati gamayati devadatta nti

original: hetvatthanidassanaṃ, tampi sāmatthiyadassanavasena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā yadi
analyzed: hetvattha nidassanam tam pi sāmatthiya dassana vasena vuttan ti gahetabbam aññathā yadi

original: sayameva gacchati, kiṃ tattha payojakabyāpārena akarontaṃ balena kārayati, pāsāṇaṃ
analyzed: sayam eva gacchati kim tattha payojaka byāpārena a karontam balena kārayati pāsāṇam

original: uṭṭhāpayatītiādikañca na sijjheyya.
analyzed: uṭṭhāpayati iti ādikam ca na sijjheyya

original: Ettha pana
analyzed: ettha pana

original: “Kattā”ti vattate.
analyzed: kattā ati vattate

original: 293. Yo kāreti sa hetu.
analyzed: yaḥ kāra iti sa hetu

original: Yo kattāraṃ kāreti, so hetusañño hoti, kattā cāti hetukattusaññā.
analyzed: yaḥ kattāram kāreti saḥ hetu saññaḥ hoti kattā ca ati hetu kattu saññā

original: Yo pana parassa kriyaṃ paṭicca kammabhūtopi sukarattā sayameva sijjhanto viya hoti, so kammakattā nāma, yathā – sayaṃ karīyate kaṭo, sayameva paccate odanoti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana parassa kriyam paṭicca kamma bhūtaḥ api sukarattā sayam eva sijjhantaḥ viya hoti saḥ kamma kattā nāma yathā sayam karīyate kaṭaḥ sayam eva paccate odanaḥ ti

original: Vuttañca
analyzed: vuttam ca

original: “Attappadhāno kiriyaṃ, yo nibbatteti kārako;
analyzed: atta ppadhānaḥ kiriyam yaḥ nibbatteti kārakaḥ

original: Appayutto payutto vā, sa kattāti pavuccati.
analyzed: appayuttaḥ payuttaḥ vā sa kattā ati pavuccati

original: Hetukattāti kathito,
analyzed: kathitaḥ

original: Kattuno yo payojako;
analyzed: kattunaḥ yaḥ payojakaḥ

original: Kammakattāti sukaro,
analyzed: kamma kattā ati sukaraḥ

original: Kammabhūto kathīyate”ti.
analyzed: kamma bhūtaḥ kathīyate iti

original: Nanu ca “saṃyogo jāyate”tiādīsu kathaṃ pure asato jananakriyāya kattubhāvosiyāti?
analyzed: nanu ca saṃyogaḥ jāyata iti ādīsu katham pure asataḥ janana kriyāya

original: Vuccate – lokasaṅketasiddho hi saddappayogo, avijjamānampi hi loko saddābhidheyyatāya
analyzed: vuccate loka saṅketa siddhaḥ hi sadda ppayogaḥ a vijjamānam pi hi lokaḥ sadda abhidheyya tāya

original: vijjamānaṃ viya gahetvā voharati, vikappabuddhigahitākāroyeva hi saddenābhidhīyate,
analyzed: vijjamānam viya gahetvā voharati vikappa buddhi gahita ākārā iva hi saddena abhidhīyate

original: na tu vatthusabhāvo, aññathā sutamayañāṇenapi paccakkhena viya vatthusabhāvasacchikaraṇappasaṅgo
analyzed: na tu vatthu sabhāvaḥ aññathā suta maya ñāṇena api paccakkhena viya vatthu sabhāva sacchikaraṇa ppasaṅgo

original: ca musāvāda kudiṭṭhivādādīnamabhāvappasaṅgo ca siyā, tasmā buddhiparikappitapaññattivasenapi
analyzed: ca musāvāda kudiṭṭhi vāda ādīnam abhāva ppasaṅgo ca siyā tasmā buddhi parikappita paññatti vasena api

original: saddappavatti hotīti asato saṃyogādissapi hoteva jananakriyāya kattukārakatāti.
analyzed: sadda ppavatti hoti iti asataḥ hotā iva janana kriyāya kattu kāraka tā ati

original: Yathāha
analyzed: yathā āha

original: “Vohāravisayo saddo, nekantaparamatthiko;
analyzed: vohāra visayaḥ saddo nekanta paramatthiko

original: Buddhisaṅkappito attho, tassatthoti pavuccati.
analyzed: buddhi saṅkappito attho tassa attho ti pavuccati

original: Buddhiyā gahitattā hi, saṃyogo jāyate iti;
analyzed: hi saṃyogaḥ jāyate iti

original: Saṃyogo vijjamānova, kattā bhavati jātiyā”ti.
analyzed: saṃyogaḥ vijjamānaḥ iva kattā bhavati jātiyā ati

original: Tatra tatiyā jinena desito dhammo, buddhena jito māro, ahinā daṭṭho naro, buddhena bodhito loko, saddhehi kārito vihāro.
analyzed: tatra tatiyā jinena desitaḥ dhammaḥ buddhena jitaḥ māraḥ ahinā daṭṭhaḥ naraḥ buddhena bodhitaḥ loko saddhehi kāritaḥ vihāro

original: Abhihite na bhavati. Kaṭaṃ karoti devadatto, kāreti vā.
analyzed: abhihite na bhavati kaṭam karoti devadattaḥ kāra iti vā

original: Itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇe – sā bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭivissakānaṃ
analyzed: itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇe sā bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭivissakānam

original: ujjhāpesi, ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya, tidaṇḍakena paribbājakamaddakkhi.
analyzed: ujjhāpesi ūna pañca bandhanena pattena aññam navam pattam cetāpeyya ti daṇḍakena paribbājakam addakkhi

original: Apavagge – ekāheneva bārāṇasiṃ pāyāsi, navahi māsehi vihāraṃ niṭṭhāpesi, yojanena adhītaṃ byākaraṇaṃ, kriyāpavaggoti kriyāya āsuṃ pariniṭṭhāpanaṃ.
analyzed: apavagge eka ahena iva bārāṇasim pāyāsi navahi māsehi vihāram niṭṭhāpesi yojanena adhītam byākaraṇam kriyāpavaggo ti kriyāya āsum pariniṭṭhāpanam

original: Pubbādiyoge – māsena pubbo, pitarā sadiso, mātarā samo, kahāpaṇena ūno, dhanena vikalo,
analyzed: pubba ādi yoge māsena pubbaḥ pitarā sadisaḥ mātarā samaḥ kahāpaṇena ūnaḥ dhanena vikalaḥ

original: asinā kalaho, ācārena nipuṇo, vācāya nipuṇo, guḷena missakaṃ, tilena missakaṃ, vācāya
analyzed: asinā kalahaḥ ācārena nipuṇaḥ vācāya nipuṇaḥ guḷena missakam tilena missakam vācāya

original: sakhilo, maṇinā attho, dhanena attho, pitarā tulyo.
analyzed: sakhilaḥ maṇinā atthaḥ dhanena atthaḥ pitarā tulyaḥ

original: Kāladdhānesu – māsena bhuñjati, yojanena gacchati.
analyzed: kāladdhānesu māsena bhuñjati yojanena gacchati

original: Paccatte – attanāva attānaṃ sammannati.
analyzed: paccatte attanāva attānam sammannati

original: Kammatthe – tilehi khette vapati.
analyzed: kammatthe tilehi khette vapati

original: Pañcamiyatthe – sumuttā mayaṃ tena mahāsamaṇena.
analyzed: sumuttā mayam tena mahā samaṇena

original: 296. Sahādiyoge ca.
analyzed: saha ādi yoge ca

original: Saha saddhiṃ samaṃ nānā vinā alaṃ kimiccevamādīhi yoge liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti, casaddena sahatthepi.
analyzed: saha saddhim samam nānā vinā alam kim icca evamādīhi yoge tatiyā vibhatti hoti ca saddena saha atthe pi

original: Tattha sahasaddena yogo kriyā guṇa dabba samavāye sambhavati. Yathā – vitakkena saha
analyzed: tattha saha saddena yogaḥ kriyā guṇa dabba samavāye sambhavati yathā vitakkena saha

original: vattati, puttena saha thūlo, antevāsikasaddhivihārikehi saha ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ lābho,
analyzed: vattati puttena saha thūlaḥ antevāsika saddhivihārikehi saha ācariya upajjhāyānam lābhaḥ

original: nisīdi bhagavā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena, sahassena samaṃ mitā, sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi
analyzed: nisīdi bhagavā saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena sahassena samam mitā sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi

original: nānābhāvo vinābhāvo, saṅgho vināpi gaggena uposathaṃ kareyya, alaṃ te idha vāsena,
analyzed: nānābhāvaḥ vinābhāvaḥ saṅghaḥ vinā api gaggena uposatham kareyya alam te vāsena

original: kiṃ me ekena tiṇṇena, purisena thāmadassinā, kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā.
analyzed: kim me ekena tiṇṇena purisena thāma dassinā kim te jaṭāhi dummedha kim te ajina sāṭiyā

original: Sahatthe – devadatto rājagahaṃ pāvisi kokālikena pacchāsamaṇena, dukkho bālehi saṃvāso.
analyzed: sahatthe devadattaḥ rājagaham pāvisi kokālikena pacchā samaṇena dukkhaḥ bālehi saṃvāso

original: 297. Hetvatthe ca.
analyzed: hetu atthe ca

original: Yogaggahaṇamihānuvattate, hetvatthe, hetvatthappayoge ca liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
analyzed: yoga ggahaṇam iha anuvattate hetu atthe hetu attha ppayoge ca liṅgamhā tatiyā vibhatti hoti

original: Kismiñci phale diṭṭhasāmatthiyaṃ kāraṇaṃ hetu, soyeva attho, tasmiṃ hetvatthe, annena vasati, dhammena vasati, vijjāya vasati.
analyzed: kismiñci phale diṭṭha sāmatthiyam kāraṇam hetu saḥ yā iva atthaḥ tasmin hetu atthe annena vasati dhammena vasati vijjāya vasati

original: Na jaccāvasalo hoti,
analyzed: na hoti

original: Na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;
analyzed: na brāhmaṇaḥ

original: Kammunā vasalo hoti,
analyzed: kammunā vasalaḥ hoti

original: Kammunā hoti brāhmaṇo.
analyzed: kammunā hoti brāhmaṇaḥ

original: Dānena bhogavā, ācārena kulī.
analyzed: dānena bhogavā ācārena kulī

original: Kena pāṇi kāmadado, kena pāṇi madhussavo;
analyzed: kena pāṇi kāmadadaḥ kena pāṇi madhussavaḥ

original: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
analyzed: kena te brahmacariyena puññam pāṇimhi ijjhati

original: Hetvatthappayoge – kena nimittena, kena payojanena, kenaṭṭhena, kena hetunā vasati.
analyzed: hetu attha ppayoge kena nimittena kena payojanena kenaṭṭhena kena hetunā vasati

original: 298. Sattamyatthe ca.
analyzed: sattamī atthe ca

original: Sattamyatthe ca liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
analyzed: sattamī atthe ca liṅgamhā tatiyā vibhatti hoti

original: Kāladdhānadisādesādīsu cāyaṃ. Tena samayena, tena kālena, kālena dhammassavaṇaṃ,
analyzed: kāla ddhāna disā desa ādīsu ca ayam tena samayena tena kālena kālena dhamma ssavaṇam

original: so vo mamaccayena satthā, māsena bhuñjati, yojanena dhāvati. Puratthimena dhataraṭṭho,
analyzed: saḥ vaḥ mamaccayena satthā māsena bhuñjati yojanena dhāvati puratthimena dhataraṭṭhaḥ

original: dakkhiṇena virūḷhako, pacchimena virūpakkho, uttarena kasivanto janoghamaparena ca,
analyzed: dakkhiṇena virūḷhako pacchimena virūpakkho uttarena kasivantaḥ janogham aparena ca

original: yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami iccādi.
analyzed: yena bhagavān tena upasaṅkami iccādi

original: 299. Yenaṅgavikāro.
analyzed: yena aṅga vikāraḥ

original: Yena byādhimatā aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate, tattha tatiyāvibhatti hoti. Ettha ca aṅgamassa atthīti aṅgaṃ, sarīraṃ. Akkhinā kāṇo, hatthena kuṇī, pādena khañjo, piṭṭhiyā khujjo.
analyzed: yena byādhimatā aṅgena aṅginaḥ vikāraḥ lakkhīyate tattha tatiyā vibhatti hoti ettha ca aṅgam assa atthi iti aṅgam sarīram akkhinā kāṇaḥ hatthena kuṇī pādena khañjaḥ piṭṭhiyā khujjo

original: 300. Visesane ca.
analyzed: visesane ca

original: Visesīyati visesitabbaṃ anenāti visesanaṃ, gottādi. Tasmiṃ gottanāmajātisippavayoguṇasaṅkhāte visesanatthe tatiyāvibhatti hoti, casaddena pakatiādīhi ca. Gottena gotamo nātho.
analyzed: visesīyati visesitabbam anena ati visesanam gotta ādi tasmin gotta nāma jāti sippa vayaḥ guṇa saṅkhāte visesana atthe tatiyā vibhatti hoti ca saddena pakati ādīhi ca gottena gotamaḥ nātho

original: Sāriputtoti nāmena, vissuto paññavā ca so;
analyzed: sāriputtaḥ ti nāmena vissutaḥ paññavā ca so

original: Jātiyā khattiyo buddho, loke appaṭipuggalo.
analyzed: jātiyā khattiyaḥ buddhaḥ loke appaṭipuggalaḥ

original: Tadahu pabbajito santo, jātiyā sattavassiko;
analyzed: tat ahu pabbajitaḥ santaḥ jātiyā sattavassikaḥ

original: Sopi maṃ anusāseyya, sampaṭicchāmi matthake.
analyzed: saḥ api mam anusāseyya sampaṭicchāmi matthake

original: Sippena naḷakāro so, ekūnatiṃso vayasā, vijjāya sādhu, paññāya sādhu, tapasā uttamo, suvaṇṇena abhirūpo.
analyzed: sippena naḷakāro saḥ ekūnatiṃsaḥ vayasā vijjāya sādhu paññāya sādhu tapasā uttamaḥ suvaṇṇena abhirūpaḥ

original: Pakatiādīsu – pakatiyā abhirūpo, yebhuyyena mattikā, samena dhāvati, visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṃ kiṇāti, sahassena assake kiṇāti iccādi.
analyzed: pakati ādīsu pakatiyā abhirūpaḥ yebhuyyena mattikā samena dhāvati visamena dhāvati dvi doṇena dhaññam kiṇāti sahassena assake kiṇāti iccādi

original: Kasmiṃ atthe catutthī?
analyzed: kasmin a tthe catutthī

original: 301. Sampadāne catutthī.
analyzed: sampadāne catutthī

original: Sampadānakārake liṅgamhā catutthīvibhatti hoti.
analyzed: sampadāna kārake liṅgamhā catutthī vibhatti hoti

original: Kiñca sampadānaṃ?
analyzed: kiñca sampadānam

analyzed: yassa dātu kāmaḥ rocate dhārayate vā tam sampadānam

original: Yassa vā dātukāmo, yassa vā rocate, yassa vā dhārayate, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti. Sammā padīyate assāti sampadānaṃ, paṭiggāhako.
analyzed: yassa vā dātu kāmaḥ yassa vā rocate yassa vā dhārayate tam kārakam sampadāna saññam hoti sammā padīyate assa ati sampadānam paṭiggāhako

original: Taṃ pana tividhaṃ diyyamānassānivāraṇajjhesanānumativasena. Yathā – buddhassa pupphaṃ
analyzed: tam pana tividham diyyamāna ssa anivāraṇa ajjhesana anumati vasena yathā buddhassa puppham

original: yajati, bodhirukkhassa jalaṃ dadāti. Ajjhesane – yācakānaṃ dhanaṃ dadāti. Anumatiyaṃ
analyzed: yajati bodhi rukkhassa jalam dadāti ajjhesane yācakānam dhanam dadāti anumatiyam

original: – bhikkhūnaṃ dānaṃ deti.
analyzed: bhikkhūnam dānam deti

original: Yathāha
analyzed: yathā āha

original: “Anirākaraṇārādha-nābbhanuññavasena hi;
analyzed: hi

original: Sampadānaṃ tidhā vuttaṃ, rukkha yācaka bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: sampadānam tidhā vuttam rukkha yācaka bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: Dātukāmoti kiṃ? Rañño daṇḍaṃ dadāti.
analyzed: dātu kāmaḥ iti kim raññaḥ daṇḍam dadāti

original: Rocanādīsu pana – samaṇassa rocate saccaṃ, māyasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, yassāyasmato khamati, devadattassa suvaṇṇacchattaṃ dhārayate yaññadatto.
analyzed: rocana ādīsu pana samaṇassa rocate saccam mā ayasmantānam pi saṅgha bhedaḥ yassa ayasmataḥ khamati devadattassa suvaṇṇa chattam dhārayate yaññadatto

original: “Sampadānaṃ, vā”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: sampadānam vāti ca vattate

original: 303. Silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhi ssāsūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇapubbakattārocanatthatadattha
analyzed: si lāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhi ssāsūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa anu pati giṇa pubba kattā rocanattha tadattha

original: tumatthālamattha maññānādarappāṇini gatyatthakammani āsisattha sammuti bhiyyasattamyatthesu ca.
analyzed: tumattha alamattha maññāna ādara ppāṇini gati attha kammani āsi sattha sammuti bhiyya sattamī atthesu ca

original: Catuppadamidaṃ. Silāgha katthane, hanu apanayane, ṭhā gatinivattimhi, sapa akkose,
analyzed: catuppadam idam si lāgha katthane hanu apanayane ṭhā gati nivattimhi sapa akkose

original: dhara dhāraṇe, piha icchāyaṃ iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge, kudha kope, duha jighaṃsāyaṃ,
analyzed: dhara dhāraṇe piha iccha ayam dhātūnam payoge kudha kope duha jighaṃsa ayam

original: issa issāyaṃ, usūya dosāvikaraṇe iccetesaṃ tadatthavācīnañca dhātūnaṃ payoge ca rādha
analyzed: issaḥ issāyam usūya dosa a vikaraṇe dhātūnam payoge ca

original: hiṃsāsaṃrādhesu, ikkha dassanaṅkesūti imesaṃ payoge ca pati āpubbassa su savaṇeti
analyzed: hiṃsā saṃrādhesu ikkha dassa naṅkesu iti imesam payoge ca pati āpubbassa su savaṇā iti

original: imassa ca anupatipubbassa gesaddeti imassa ca pubbakattā ca ārocanatthappayoge, tadatthe,
analyzed: imassa ca anu pati pubbassa gesadde ti imassa ca pubbaka ttā ca ārocana attha ppayoge tad atthe

original: tumatthe, alamatthappayoge ca maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini ca gatyatthānaṃ kammani
analyzed: tum atthe alam attha ppayoge ca maññati ppayoge anādare ap pāṇini ca gati atthānam kammani

original: ca āsisatthappayoge ca sammuti bhiyyappayogesu ca sattamyatthe cāti taṃ kammādikārakaṃ
analyzed: ca āsi sattha ppayoge ca sammuti bhiyya ppayogesu ca sattamī atthe ca ati tam kamma ādi kārakam

original: sampadānasaññaṃ hoti, casaddaggahaṇena pahiṇatikappati pahoti upamāñjalikaraṇa phāsu
analyzed: sampadāna saññam hoti ca sadda ggahaṇena pahiṇati kappati upamā añjali karaṇa

original: atthaseyyappabhutiyoge ca pure viya catutthī.
analyzed: attha seyya ppabhuti yoge ca pure catutthī

original: Silāghādippayoge tāva – buddhassa silāghate. Upajjhāyassa silāghate, thometīti attho.
analyzed: silāghā ādi ppayoge tāva buddhassa silāghate upajjhāyassa silāghate thometi iti attho

original: Hanute mayhameva, hanute tuyhameva, apalapatīti attho.
analyzed: hanute mayham eva hanute tuyham eva apalapati iti

original: Upatiṭṭheyya sakyaputtānaṃ vaḍḍhakī, ettha ca upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma upagamanaṃ. Bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya.
analyzed: upatiṭṭheyya sakyaputtānam vaḍḍhakī ettha ca upaṭṭhānam nāma upagamanam bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya

original: Tuyhaṃ sapate, mayhaṃ sapate, ettha ca sapanaṃ nāma saccakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: tuyham sapate mayham sapate ettha ca sapanam nāma sacca karaṇam

original: Dhārayatippayoge dhanikoyeva sampadānaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ te dhārayate, iṇaṃ dhārayatīti attho. Tassa rañño mayaṃ nāgaṃ dhārayāma.
analyzed: dhārayati ppayoge sampadānam suvaṇṇam te dhārayate iṇam dhārayati iti tassa raññaḥ mayam nāgam dhārayāma

original: Pihappayoge icchitoyeva, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino, devāpi tesaṃ pihayanti, sambuddhānaṃ satīmataṃ, patthentīti attho.
analyzed: devā api tassa pihayanti tādinaḥ devāḥ api tesam pihayanti sambuddhānam satī matam patthenti iti atthaḥ

original: Kodhādiatthānaṃ payoge yaṃ pati kopo, tassa kujjha mahāvīra, yadihaṃ tassa kuppeyyaṃ.
analyzed: kodha ādi atthānam payoge yam pati kopo tassa kujjha mahāvīra yat iham tassa

original: Duhayati disānaṃ megho, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhati.
analyzed: duhayati disānam meghaḥ yaḥ mittānam na dubbhati

original: Titthiyā issanti samaṇānaṃ.
analyzed: titthiyāḥ issanti samaṇānam

original: Dujjanā guṇavantānaṃ usūyanti, kā usūyā vijānataṃ.
analyzed: dujjanāḥ usūyanti kā usūyā vijānatam

original: Rādhikkhappayoge yassa vipucchanaṃ kammavikhyāpanatthaṃ, vādhikārato dutiyā ca. Ārādho
analyzed: rādh ikkha ppayoge yassa vipucchanam kamma vikhyāpana attham vā adhikārataḥ dutiyā ca ārādhaḥ

original: me rañño, rañño aparajjhati, rājānaṃ vā aparajjhati, kyāhaṃ ayyānaṃ aparajjhāmi,
analyzed: me raññaḥ raññaḥ aparajjhati rājānam vā aparajjhati kyā aham ayyānam aparajjhāmi

original: kyāhaṃ ayye aparajjhāmi vā.
analyzed: kyā aham ayye aparajjhāmi vā

original: Āyasmato upālittherassa upasampadāpekkho upatisso, āyasmantaṃ vā.
analyzed: āyasmataḥ upāli ttherassa upasampada apekkhaḥ upatissaḥ āyasmantam vā

original: Paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇānaṃ pubbakattā ca suṇotissa dhātussa paccāyoge, giṇassa ca anupatiyoge
analyzed: pacca a suṇa anu pati giṇānam pubba ka ttā ca suṇotissa dhātussa pacca āyoge giṇassa ca anu pati yoge

original: pubbassa kammuno yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti. Yathā – bhagavā bhikkhū etadavoca,
analyzed: pubbassa kammunaḥ yaḥ kattā so sampadāna saññaḥ hoti yathā bhagavā bhikkhū etat avoca

original: ettha “bhikkhū”ti akathitakammaṃ, “eta”nti kathitakammaṃ, pubbassa vacanakammassa
analyzed: ettha bhikkhu iti a kathita kammam etat ti kathita kammam pubbassa vacana kammassa

original: kattā bhagavā. Bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ, āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū, tathā bhikkhu
analyzed: kattā bhagavā bhikkhū bhagavataḥ paccassosum āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū tathā bhikkhu

original: janaṃ dhammaṃ sāveti, tassa bhikkhuno jano anugiṇāti, tassa bhikkhuno jano patigiṇāti,
analyzed: janam dhammam sāveti tassa bhikkhunaḥ janaḥ anugiṇāti tassa bhikkhunaḥ janaḥ patigiṇāti

original: sādhukāradānādinā taṃ ussāhayatīti attho.
analyzed: sādhukāra dāna ādinā tam ussāhayati iti

original: Yo vadeti sa kattāti, vuttaṃ kammanti vuccati;
analyzed: yaḥ vadeti sa kattā ati vuttam kammanti vuccati

original: Yo paṭiggāhako tassa, sampadānaṃ vijāniyāti.
analyzed: yaḥ paṭiggāhako tassa sampadānam vijāniyāti

original: Ārocanatthappayoge yassa āroceti, taṃ sampadānaṃ. Ārocayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi
analyzed: ārocana attha payoge yassa āroceti tam sampadānam ārocayāmi vaḥ bhikkhave paṭivedayāmi

original: vo bhikkhave, āmantayāmi te mahārāja, āmanta kho taṃ gacchāmāti vā. Ettha ca ārocanasaddassa
analyzed: vaḥ bhikkhave āmantayāmi te mahā rāja āmanta kho tam gacchāma ati vā ettha ca ārocana saddassa

original: kathanappakāratthattā desanatthādippayogepi catutthī. Dhammaṃ vo desessāmi, desetu
analyzed: kathana ppakāra tthattā desana ttha ādi ppayoge pi catutthī dhammam vaḥ desessāmi desetu

original: bhante bhagavā dhammaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, yathā no bhagavā byākareyya, niruttiṃ te pavakkhāmi iccādi.
analyzed: bhante bhagavā dhammam bhikkhūnam yathā naḥ bhagavā byākareyya niruttim te pavakkhāmi iccādi

original: Tadatthe sampadānasaññā, catutthī ca.
analyzed: tad atthe sampadāna saññā catutthī ca

original: “Ato, vā”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: atas vāti ca vattate

original: 304. Āya catutthekavacanassa tu.
analyzed: āya catuttha ekavacanassa tu

original: Akārantato liṅgamhā parassa catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hoti vā, saralopādi.
analyzed: akāra antataḥ liṅgamhā parassa catuttha ekavacanassa āya ādesaḥ hoti vā sara lopa ādi

original: Buddhassatthāya dhammassatthāya saṅghassatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi, piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevāmi
analyzed: buddhassatthāya dhammassatthāya saṅghassatthāya jīvitam pariccajāmi piṇḍapātam paṭisevāmi

original: neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, ūnassa pāripūriyā, atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
analyzed: na iva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya ūnassa pāripūriyā atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati

original: Tumatthe – lokānukampāya, lokamanukampitunti attho. Tathā phāsuvihārāya.

original: Alaṃsaddassa atthā arahapaṭikkhepā. Arahatthe – alaṃ me rajjaṃ, alaṃ bhikkhu pattassa, akkhadhutto purisapuggalo nālaṃ dārabharaṇāya, alaṃ mallo mallassa, arahati mallo mallassa.

original: Addhakālanimmāne nimmānaṃ nāma parimāṇaṃ, tasmiṃ gamyamāne – ito mathurāya catūsu yojanesu saṅkassaṃ, rājagahato pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake sāvatthi.

original: Kālanimmāne – ito ekanavutikappamatthake vipassī bhagavā loke udapādi, ito vassasahassaccayena buddho loke uppajjissati.
analyzed: kāla nimmāne itas ekanavuti kappa matthake vipassī bhagavā loke udapādi itas vassa sahassa cayena buddhaḥ loke uppajjissati

original: Tvāpaccayantassa lopo nāma tadatthasambhavepi avijjamānatā, tasmiṃ tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu
analyzed: lopaḥ nāma tad attha sambhave pi avijjamāna tā tasmin tu ālope kamma adhikaraṇesu

original: – pāsādā saṅkameyya, pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā saṅkameyyāti attho. Tathā hatthikkhandhā
analyzed: pāsādā saṅkameyya pāsādam abhiruhitvā saṅkameyya ati tathā hatthi khandhā

original: saṅkameyya, abhidhammā pucchanti, abhidhammaṃ sutvā vā, abhidhammā kathayanti, abhidhammaṃ

original: paṭhitvā vā, āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya, āsane nisīditvā vā.
analyzed: paṭhitvā vā āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya āsane nisīditvā vā

original: Disatthavācīhi yoge, disatthe ca – ito sā purimā disā, ito sā dakkhiṇā disā, ito
analyzed: dis attha vācīhi yoge dis atthe ca itas sā purimā disā itas sā dakkhiṇā disā itas

analyzed: sā pacchimā disā itas sā uttarā disā avīcitaḥ upari bha vaggāḥ uddham pāda talāḥ adhas

original: kesamatthakā iccādi. Disatthe – puratthimato dakkhiṇatotiādi. Ettha pana sattamiyatthe
analyzed: kesa matthakāḥ iccādi disa atthe puratthimataḥ dakkhiṇatas tiādi ettha pana sattamiya tthe

original: topaccayopi bhavissati.
analyzed: to paccayaḥ pi bhavissati

original: Vibhattaṃ nāma sayaṃ vibhattasseva tadaññato guṇena vibhajanaṃ, tasmiṃ vibhatte –
analyzed: vibhattam nāma sayam vibhattassa iva tad aññatas guṇena vibhajanam tasmim vibhatte

original: yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi, attadanto tato varaṃ. Kiñcāpi dānato sīlameva
analyzed: yatas paṇītataraḥ vā visiṭṭhataraḥ vā natthi atta danto tatas varam kiñcā api dānataḥ sīlam eva

original: pāsaṇḍānaṃ pavaraṃ yadidaṃ sugatavinayo.

original: Āratippayogo nāma viramaṇatthasaddappayogo. Tattha – asaddhammā ārati, virati pāpā, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā paṭivirato, appaṭivirato musāvādā.
analyzed: āratippayogo nāma viramaṇa attha sadda ppayogo tattha asat dhammā ārati virati pāpā pāṇātipātā veramaṇī adinnādānā paṭivirataḥ appaṭivirataḥ musāvādā

original: Suddhatthappayoge – lobhanīyehi dhammehi suddho asaṃsaṭṭho, mātito ca pitito ca suddho anupakkuṭṭho agarahito.
analyzed: suddha ttha ppayoge lobhanīyehi dhammehi suddhaḥ a saṃsaṭṭhaḥ mātitaḥ ca pititaḥ ca suddhaḥ an upakkuṭṭhaḥ a garahito

original: Pamocanatthappayoge – parimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi, mutto mārabandhanā, na te muccanti maccunā, muttohaṃ sabbapāsehi.
analyzed: pamocana attha ppayoge parimuttaḥ dukkhasma ati vadāmi muttaḥ māra bandhanā na te muccanti maccunā muttaḥ aham sabba pāsehi

analyzed: daharāḥ na mīyare kasmai idhā iva maraṇam bhavissati kasmai hetunā yasmai ca kammāni

analyzed: karonti yasmā tiha bhikkhave tasmā tiha bhikkhave evam sikkhitabbam tasmā buddhaḥ asmi

original: brāhmaṇa, yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā kāraṇā, kiṃ kāraṇā. Dutiyā, chaṭṭhī ca, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ,
analyzed: brāhmaṇa tasmai kāraṇā kim kāraṇā dutiyā chaṭṭhī ca kim kāraṇam

analyzed: tam kissa hetu kissa tumhe

original: 313. Dīghorehi.
