original: Suhitatthayoge – pattaṃ odanassa pūretvā, odanenāti attho. Imameva kāyaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati, pūraṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa, pūrati bālo pāpassa.
analyzed: su hita attha yoge pattam odanassa pūretvā odanena ati attho imam eva kāyam pūram nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati pūram hirañña suvaṇṇassa pūrati bālaḥ pāpassa

original: Tulyatthakimalamādiyoge – pitussa tulyo, pitarā vā tulyo, mātu sadiso, mātarā sadiso vā, kiṃ tassa ca tuṭṭhassa, kiṃ tena tuṭṭhenāti attho. Alaṃ tassa ca tuṭṭhassa.
analyzed: tulya attha kim alam ādi yoge pitussa tulyaḥ pitarā vā tulyaḥ mātu sadisaḥ mātarā sadisaḥ vā kim tassa ca tuṭṭhassa kim tena tuṭṭhena ati atthaḥ alam tassa ca tuṭṭhassa

original: Kattari kitappaccayayoge – sobhanā kaccāyanassa kati, kaccāyanena vā, rañño sammato,
analyzed: kattari kitap paccaya yoge sobhanā kaccāyanassa kati kaccāyanena vā rañño sammataḥ

original: raññā vā, evaṃ rañño pūjito, rañño sakkato, rañño apacito, rañño mānito, amataṃ tesaṃ
analyzed: raññā vai evam raññaḥ pūjitaḥ raññaḥ sakkataḥ raññaḥ apacitaḥ raññaḥ mānitaḥ amatam tesam

original: bhikkhave aparibhuttaṃ, yesaṃ kāyagatāsati aparibhuttā iccādi.
analyzed: bhikkhave a paribhuttam yesam kāyagatā asati a paribhuttā iccādi

original: Sattamiyatthe kusalādiyoge – kusalā naccagītassa sikkhitā cāturitthiyo, kusalo tvaṃ
analyzed: sattamiya tthe kusala ādi yoge kusalā nacca gītassa sikkhitā cāturitthiyaḥ kusalaḥ tvam

original: rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ, kusalo maggassa, kusalo amaggassa, santi hi bhante uḷārā
analyzed: rathassa aṅga paccaṅgānam kusalaḥ maggassa kusalaḥ amaggassa santi hi bhante uḷārā

original: yakkhā bhagavato pasannā, divasassa tikkhattuṃ, divase tikkhattuṃ vā, māsassa dvikkhattuṃ iccādi.
analyzed: yakkhāḥ bhagavataḥ pasannāḥ divasassa tikkhattum divase tikkhattum vā māsassa dvi kkhattum iccādi

original: “Kvaci, chaṭṭhī”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: kvacid chaṭṭhī iti ca vattate

original: 318. Dutiyāpañcamīnañca.
analyzed: dutiyā pañcamī nañca

original: Dutiyāpañcamīnamatthe ca kvaci chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti.
analyzed: dutiyā pañcamīnam atthe ca kvaci chaṭṭhī vibhatti hoti

original: Dutiyatthe kammani kitakayoge – tassa bhavanti vattāro, sahasā kammassa kattāro,
analyzed: dutiya tthe kammani kitaka yoge tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ sahasā kammassa kattāraḥ

original: amatassa dātā, bhinnānaṃ sandhātā, sahitānaṃ anuppadātā, bodhetā pajāya, kammassa
analyzed: amatassa dātā bhinnānam sandhātā sahitānam anuppadātā bodhetā pajāya kammassa

original: kārako natthi, vipākassa ca vedako, avisaṃvādako lokassa, pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ,
analyzed: kārakaḥ natthi vipākassa ca vedakaḥ a visaṃvādakaḥ lokassa pāpānam a karaṇam sukham

original: catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo, acchariyo arajakena vatthānaṃ rāgo, acchariyo
analyzed: catunnam mahābhūtānam upādāya pasādaḥ acchariyaḥ arajakena vatthānam rāgaḥ acchariyaḥ

original: agopālakena gāvīnaṃ doho.
analyzed: a gopālakena gāvīnam dohaḥ

original: Tathā saricchādīnaṃ kammani – mātu sarati, mātaraṃ sarati, na tesaṃ koci sarati, sattānaṃ kammappaccayā, puttassa icchati, puttamicchati.
analyzed: tathā sariccha ādīnam kammani mātu sarati mātaram sarati na tesam koci sarati sattānam kamma ppaccayā puttassa icchati puttam icchati

original: Karotissa patiyatane ca – patiyatanaṃ abhisaṅkhāro, udakassa patikurute, udakaṃ patikurute, kaṇḍassa patikurute, kaṇḍaṃ patikurute.
analyzed: karotissa patiyatane ca patiyatanam abhisaṅkhāraḥ udakassa patikurute udakam patikurute kaṇḍassa patikurute kaṇḍam patikurute

original: Pañcamiyatthe parihānibhayatthayoge – assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti, kiṃ nu kho
analyzed: pañcamiya atthe parihāni bhaya attha yoge a savana tā dhammassa parihāyanti kim nu kho

original: ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi, sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno, bhīto
analyzed: aham tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa sabbe bhāyanti maccunaḥ bhīto

original: catunnaṃ āsivisānaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: catunnam āsi visānam it cādi

original: Kvacīti kiṃ? Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, kālena dhammiṃ kathaṃ bhāsitā hoti, paresaṃ puññāni anumoditā, bujjhitā saccāni, kaṭaṃ kārako, pasavo ghātako.
analyzed: kvaci iti kim gambhīram ca katham kattā kālena dhammim katham bhāsitā hoti paresam puññāni anumoditā bujjhitā saccāni kaṭam kārako pasavaḥ ghātako

original: Tathā na niṭṭhādīsu ca – sukhakāmī vihāraṃ kato, rathaṃ katavanto, rathaṃ katāvī, kaṭaṃ katvā, kaṭaṃ karonto, kaṭaṃ karāno, kaṭaṃ kurumāno iccādi.
analyzed: tathā na niṭṭhā ādīsu ca sukha kāmī vihāram kataḥ ratham katavantaḥ ratham katāvī kaṭam katvā kaṭam karontaḥ kaṭam karāno kaṭam kurumānaḥ iccādi

original: Kasmiṃ atthe sattamī?
analyzed: kasmin atthe sattamī

original: 319. Okāse sattamī.
analyzed: okāse sattamī

original: Okāsakārake sattamīvibhatti hoti.
analyzed: okāsa kārake sattamī vibhatti hoti

original: Ko ca okāso?
analyzed: kaḥ ca okāsaḥ

original: 320. Yodhāro tamokāsaṃ.
analyzed: yodhāraḥ tamaḥ kāsam

original: Ādhārīyati asminti ādhāro, adhikaraṇaṃ. Kattukammasamavetānaṃ nisajjapacanādikriyānaṃ patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena yo ādhāro, taṃ kārakaṃ okāsasaññaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ādhārīyati asmin ti ādhāraḥ adhikaraṇam kattu kamma samavetānam nisajja pacana ādi kriyānam patiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena yaḥ ādhāraḥ tam kārakam okāsa saññam hoti

original: Kaṭe nisīdati devadatto, thāliyaṃ odanaṃ pacati. Ettha hi devadattataṇḍulānaṃ kattukammānaṃ dhāraṇato taṃsamavetaṃ āsanapacanasaṅkhātaṃ kriyaṃ dhāreti nāma.
analyzed: kaṭe nisīdati devadattaḥ thāliyam odanam pacati ettha hi devadatta taṇḍulānam kattu kammānam dhāraṇato tat samavetam āsana pacana saṅkhātam kriyam dhārā iti nāma

original: So panāyamokāso catubbidho byāpiko opasilesiko sāmīpiko vesayikoti.
analyzed: so pana ayam okāso catubbidhaḥ byāpikaḥ opasilesikaḥ sāmīpikaḥ vesayikaḥ ti

original: Tattha byāpiko nāma yattha sakalopi ādhārabhūto attho ādheyyena patthaṭo hoti, yasmiñca
analyzed: tattha byāpikaḥ nāma yattha sakalaḥ api ādhāra bhūtaḥ atthaḥ ādheyyena patthaṭaḥ hoti yasmin ca

original: ādheyyabhūtaṃ kiñci byāpetvā tiṭṭhati, taṃ yathā – tilesu telaṃ atthi, khīlesu jalaṃ, dadhimhi sappīti.
analyzed: ādheyya bhūtam kiñci byāpetvā tiṭṭhati tam yathā tilesu telam atthi khīlesu jalam dadhimhi sappi iti

original: Opasilesiko nāma paccekasiddhānaṃ bhāvānaṃ yattha upasilesena upagamo hoti, yasmiñca
analyzed: opasilesikaḥ nāma paccekasiddhānam bhāvānam yattha upasilesena upagamaḥ hoti yasmin ca

original: ādheyyo upasilissati allīyitvā tiṭṭhati, taṃ yathā – āsane nisinno saṅgho, thāliyaṃ
analyzed: ādheyyaḥ upasilissati allīyitvā tiṭṭhati tam yathā āsane nisinnaḥ saṅghaḥ thāliyam

original: odanaṃ pacati, ghaṭesu udakaṃ atthi, dūre ṭhito, samīpe ṭhitoti.
analyzed: odanam pacati ghaṭesu udakam atthi dūre ṭhito samīpe ṭhitoti

original: Sāmīpiko nāma yattha samīpe samīpivohāraṃ katvā tadāyattavuttitādīpanatthaṃ ādhārabhāvo
analyzed: sāmīpikaḥ nāma yattha samīpe samīpi vohāram katvā tad āyatta vutti tā dīpana ttham ādhāra bhāvaḥ

original: vikappīyati, taṃ yathā – gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso vasati, gaṅgāya samīpe vajo vasatīti attho.
analyzed: tam yathā gaṅgāyam ghosaḥ vasati gaṅgāya samīpe vajaḥ vasati iti attho

original: Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane, sāvatthiyā samīpeti attho.
analyzed: bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane sāvatthiyā samīpe iti attho

original: Vesayiko nāma yattha aññatthābhāvavasena, desantarāvacchedavasena vā ādhārabhāvo
analyzed: vesayikaḥ nāma yattha aññattha abhāva vasena desantara avaccheda vasena vā ādhāra bhāvaḥ

analyzed: parikappaḥ tam yathā ākāse sakuṇā pakkhanti bhūmīsu manussā caranti jalesu macchā

original: pādesu patito, pāpasmiṃ ramatī mano, pasanno buddhasāsane, paññāya sādhu, vinaye
analyzed: pādesu patitaḥ pāpasmin ramati pasannaḥ buddha sāsane paññāya sādhu vinaye

original: nipuṇo, mātari sādhu, pitari nipuṇo iccādi.
analyzed: nipuṇaḥ mātari sādhu pitari nipuṇaḥ iccādi

original: Sabbopi cāyamādhāro padhānavasena vā parikappitavasena vā kriyāya patiṭṭhā bhavatīti okāsotveva vuttoti veditabbo.
analyzed: sabbaḥ api ca ayam ādhāraḥ padhāna vasena vā parikappita vasena vā kriyāya patiṭṭhā bhavati iti okāsaḥ tu eva vuttaḥ iti veditabbo

original: Vuttañcetaṃ
analyzed: vuttam ca itam

original: “Kiriyā kattukammānaṃ,
analyzed: kiriyā kattu kammānam

original: Yattha hoti patiṭṭhitā;
analyzed: yattha hoti patiṭṭhitā

original: ‘Okāso’ti pavutto so,
analyzed: okāsaḥ ti pavutto so

original: Catudhā byāpikādito.

original: Byāpiko tilakhīrādi,
analyzed: tila khīra ādi

original: Kaṭo opasilesiko;
analyzed: kaṭaḥ opasilesikaḥ

original: Sāmīpiko tu gaṅgādi,
analyzed: sāmīpikaḥ tu gaṅgā ādi

original: Ākāso visayo mato”ti.
analyzed: ākāsaḥ visayaḥ mataḥ iti

original: “Chaṭṭhī, sattamī”ti ca adhikāro.
analyzed: chaṭṭhī sattamī iti ca adhikāraḥ

original: 321. Sāmissarādhipatidāyādasakkhīpatibhūpasūtakusalehi ca.
analyzed: ca

original: Sāmī issara adhipati dāyāda sakkhipatibhū pasūta kusalaiccetehi yoge chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca. Ubhayatthaṃ vacanaṃ.
analyzed: sāmī issara adhipati dāyāda sakkhi patibhū pasūta kusala aicca itehi yoge chaṭṭhī vibhatti hoti sattamī ca ubhayattham vacanam

original: Gavaṃ sāmi, gosu sāmi, gavaṃ issaro, gosu issaro, gavaṃ adhipati, gosu adhipati,
analyzed: gavam sāmi gosu sāmi gavam issaraḥ gosu issaraḥ gavam adhipati gosu adhipati

analyzed: niddhāraṇe ca

original: 323. Anādare ca.
analyzed: an ādare ca

original: Anādare gamyamāne bhāvavatā liṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca. Akāmakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ rudantānaṃ pabbaji, mātāpitūsu rudantesu pabbaji.
analyzed: anādare gamyamāne bhāvavatā liṅgamhā chaṭṭhī vibhatti hoti sattamī ca akāmakānam mātā pitūnam rudantānam pabbaji mātā pitūsu rudantesu pabbaji

original: Pekkhamāne mahājane.
analyzed: pekkhamāne mahājane

original: 324. Kammakaraṇanimittatthesu sattamī.

original: Kammakaraṇanimittaiccetesvatthesu liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.

original: Kammatthe – bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, purisassa bāhāsu gahetvā.
analyzed: kammatthe bhikkhūsu abhivādenti muddhani cumbitvā purisassa bāhāsu gahetvā

original: Karaṇatthe – hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti, pattesu piṇḍāya caranti, pathesu gacchanti, sopi maṃ anusāseyya, sampaṭicchāmi matthake.
analyzed: karaṇa atthe hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti pattesu piṇḍāya caranti pathesu gacchanti saḥ api mama anusāseyya sampaṭicchāmi matthake

original: Nimittatthe – dīpi cammesu haññate, kuñjaro dantesu haññate, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṃ, musāvādanimittaṃ musāvādappaccayāti attho.

original: “Sattamī”ti adhikāro.
analyzed: sattamī iti adhikāraḥ

original: 325. Sampadāne ca.
analyzed: sampadāne ca

original: Sampadānatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. Saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, saṅghe gotami dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi.
analyzed: sampadāna atthe ca liṅgamhā sattamī vibhatti hoti saṅghe dinnam mahat phalam saṅghe gotami dehi saṅghe te dinne aham ca iva pūjitaḥ bhavissāmi

original: Yā palālamayaṃ mālaṃ, nārī datvāna cetiye;
analyzed: yā palāla mayam mālam nārī cetiye

original: Alattha kañcanamayaṃ, mālaṃ bojjhaṅgikañca sā.
analyzed: alattha kañcana mayam mālam bojjhaṅgikam ca sā

original: 326. Pañcamyatthe ca.
analyzed: pañcamī a tthe ca

original: Pañcamyatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. Kadalīsu gaje rakkhanti.
analyzed: pañcamī atthe ca liṅgamhā sattamī vibhatti hoti kadalīsu gaje rakkhanti

original: 327. Kālabhāvesu ca.
analyzed: kāla bhāvesu ca

original: Kālo nāma nimesa khaṇa laya muhutta pubbaṇhādiko, bhāvo nāma kriyā, sā cettha kriyantarūpalakkhaṇāva
analyzed: kālaḥ nāma nimesa khaṇa laya muhutta pubbaṇha ādikaḥ bhāvaḥ nāma kriyā sā ca ittha

analyzed: adhippetā tasmin kāla tthe ca bhāva lakkhaṇe bhāva tthe ca liṅgamhā sattamī vibhatti hoti

original: Kāle – pubbaṇhasamaye gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato, akāle vassati tassa, kāle tassa na vassati, phussamāsamhā tīsu māsesu vesākhamāso, ito satasahassamhi, kappe uppajji cakkhumā.
analyzed: kāle pubbaṇha samaye gataḥ sāyanha samaye āgataḥ akāle vassati tassa kāle tassa na vassati phussa māsamhā tīsu māsesu vesākha māso ito sata sahassamhi kappe uppajji cakkhumā

original: Bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe – bhikkhusaṅghesu bhojīyamānesu gato, bhuttesu āgato, gosu duyhamānāsu

original: saṃkampi sampakampi sampavedhi.
analyzed: saṃkampi sampakampi sampavedhi

original: Pāsāṇā sakkharā ceva, kaṭhalā khāṇukaṇṭakā;
analyzed: pāsāṇā sakkharā ca iva kaṭhalā khāṇukaṇṭakā

original: Sabbe maggā vivajjenti, gacchante lokanāyake.

original: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti iccādi.

original: 328. Upājhādhikissaravacane.

analyzed: dvipadam idam adhika atthe issara atthe ca vattamānehi upa adhi icca itehi yoge adhika issara vacane gamyamāne liṅgamhā sattamī vibhatti hoti

original: Adhikavacane – upa khāriyaṃ doṇo, khāriyā doṇo adhikoti attho. Tathā upa nikkhe kahāpaṇaṃ,

original: buddhova adhikoti attho.

original: 329. Maṇḍitussukkesu tatiyā ca.

analyzed: atha kammadhāraya samāsaḥ vuccate

original: So ca navavidho visesanapubbapado visesanuttarapado visesanobhayapado upamānuttarapado sambhāvanāpubbapado avadhāraṇapubbapado nanipātapubbapado kupubbapado pādipubbapado cāti.
analyzed: so ca navavidhaḥ visesana pubba padaḥ visesana uttara padaḥ visesana ubhaya padaḥ upamāna uttara padaḥ sambhāvanā pubba padaḥ avadhāraṇa pubba padaḥ na nipāta pubba padaḥ ku pubba padaḥ pādi pubba padaḥ ca ati

original: Tattha visesanapubbapado tāva – “mahanta purisa”itīdha ubhayattha paṭhamekavacanaṃ si, tulyādhikaraṇabhāvappasiddhatthaṃ casadda tasaddappayogo, mahanto ca so puriso cāti viggahe –
analyzed: tattha visesana pubba padaḥ tāva mahanta purisa etīdha ubhayattha paṭhama ekavacanam si tulya adhikaraṇa bhāva ppasiddhattham ca sadda ta sadda ppayogaḥ mahantaḥ ca saḥ puriso ca ati viggahe

original: Ito paraṃ “vibhāsā rukkhatiṇa”iccādito “vibhāsā”ti samāsavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
analyzed: itas param vibhāsā vibhāsā ati samāsa vidhāne sabbattha vattate

original: 339. Dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe kammadhārayo.
analyzed: dvipade tulya adhikaraṇe kammadhārayo

original: Dve padāni nāmikāni tulyādhikaraṇāni aññamaññena saha vibhāsā samasyante, tasmiṃ dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe sati so samāso kammadhārayasañño ca hoti.
analyzed: dve padāni nāmikāni tulya adhikaraṇāni aññam aññena saha vibhāsā samasyante tasmin dvipade tulya adhikaraṇe sati saḥ samāso kammadhāraya sañño ca hoti

original: Dve padāni dvipadaṃ, tulyaṃ samānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attho yassa padadvayassa taṃ tulyādhikaraṇaṃ,
analyzed: dve padāni dvi padam tulyam samānam adhikaraṇam atthaḥ yassa pada dvayassa tam tulya adhikaraṇam

original: tasmiṃ dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe. Bhinnappavattinimittānaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ visesanavisesitabbabhāvena
analyzed: tasmin dvipade tulya adhikaraṇe bhinna pavatti nimittānam dvinnam padānam visesana visesitabba bhāvena

original: ekasmiṃ atthe pavatti tulyādhikaraṇatā. Kammamiva dvayaṃ dhārayatīti kammadhārayo.
analyzed: ekasmin atthe tulya adhikaraṇa tā kammam iva dvayam dhārayati iti kammadhārayaḥ

original: Yathā hi kammaṃ kriyañca payojanañca dvayaṃ dhārayati, kamme sati kriyāya, payojanassa
analyzed: yathā hi kammam kriyam ca payojanam ca dvayam dhārayati kamme sati kriyāya payojanassa

original: ca sambhavato, tathā ayaṃ samāso ekassa atthassa dve nāmāni dhārayati, tasmiṃ samāse
analyzed: ca sambhavataḥ tathā ayam samāsaḥ ekassa atthassa dve nāmāni dhārayati tasmin samāse

original: sati ekatthajotakassa nāmadvayassa sambhavato.
analyzed: sati eka attha jotakassa nāma dvayassa sambhavataḥ

original: Pure viya samāsasaññāvibhattilopapakatibhāvā, samāseneva tulyādhikaraṇabhāvassa vuttattā “vuttatthānamappayogo”ti casadda tasaddānamappayogo.
analyzed: pure viya samāsa saññā vibhatti lopa pakati bhāvā samāsena iva tulya adhikaraṇa bhāvassa vutta ttā vutta tthānam appayogo iti ca sadda ta saddānam appayogo

original: 340. Mahataṃ mahā tulyādhikaraṇe pade.
analyzed: mahatam tulya adhikaraṇe pade

original: Mahanta saddassa mahā hoti tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare. Mahatanti bahuvacanaggahaṇena
analyzed: mahanta saddassa mahā hoti tulya adhikaraṇe uttara pade pare bahuvacana ggahaṇena

original: kvaci mahaādeso ca, ettha ca visesanassa pubbanipāto visesanabhūtassa pubbapadassa
analyzed: kvaci maha ādesaḥ ca ettha ca visesanassa pubba nipātaḥ visesana bhūtassa pubba padassa

original: mahādesavidhānatova viññāyati.
analyzed: mahā desa vidhānataḥ va viññāyati

original: “Kammadhārayo, digū”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: kammadhārayaḥ diś iti ca vattate

original: 341. Ubhe tappurisā.
analyzed: ubhe tappurisā

original: Ubhe kammadhārayadigusamāsā tappurisasaññā honti.
analyzed: ubhe kammadhāraya digu samāsā tappurisa saññāḥ honti

original: Tassa puriso tappuriso, tappurisasadisattā ayampi samāso anvatthasaññāya tappurisoti
analyzed: tassa purisaḥ tappurisaḥ tappurisa sadisa ttā ayam pi samāsaḥ anvattha saññāya tappurisaḥ ti

original: vutto. Yathā hi tappurisasaddo guṇamativatto, tathā ayaṃ samāsopi. Uttarapadatthappadhāno
analyzed: vuttaḥ yathā hi tappurisa saddaḥ guṇam ativatto tathā ayam samāsaḥ api uttara padattha ppadhānaḥ

original: hi tappurisoti. Tato nāmabyapadeso syādyuppatti. Ayaṃ pana tappuriso abhidheyyavacano, paraliṅgo ca.
analyzed: hi tappurisaḥ iti tatas nāma byapadesaḥ ayam pana tappurisaḥ abhidheyya vacano para liṅgo ca

original: Mahāpuriso, mahāpurisā iccādi purisasaddasamaṃ, evaṃ mahāvīro, mahāmuni, mahantañca
analyzed: mahā purisaḥ mahā purisāḥ iccādi purisa sadda samam evam mahāvīraḥ mahā muni mahantam ca

original: taṃ balañcāti mahābalaṃ, mahabbhayaṃ, mahaādeso. Santo ca so puriso cāti sappuriso,
analyzed: tam balam ca ati mahābalam mahabbhayam mahaādesaḥ santaḥ ca saḥ purisaḥ ca ati sappurisaḥ

original: “santasaddassa so bhe bo cante”ti ettha casaddena santasaddassa samāse abhakārepi
analyzed: santa saddassa saḥ bhe bo canta iti ettha ca saddena santa saddassa samāse a bhakāre pi

original: sādeso, tathā pubbapuriso, parapuriso, paṭhamapuriso, majjhimapuriso, uttamapuriso,
analyzed: sa ādesaḥ tathā pubba purisaḥ para purisaḥ paṭhama purisaḥ majjhima purisaḥ uttama purisaḥ

original: dantapuriso, paramapuriso, vīrapuriso, setahatthī, kaṇhasappo, nīluppalaṃ, lohitacandanaṃ.
analyzed: dantapurisaḥ parama purisaḥ vīra purisaḥ setahatthī kaṇha sappaḥ nīluppalam lohita candanam

original: Kvaci vibhāsādhikārato na bhavati, yathā – puṇṇo mantāniputto, citto gahapati, sakko devarājāti.
analyzed: kvaci vibhāsa adhikārataḥ na bhavati yathā puṇṇaḥ mantāniputto cittaḥ gahapati sakkaḥ devarājā ati

original: Pumā ca so kokilo cāti atthe samāse kate –
analyzed: pumā ca saḥ kokilo ca ati atthe samāse kate

original: “Lopa”nti vattate.
analyzed: vattate

original: 342. Pumassa liṅgādīsu samāsesu.
analyzed: pumassa liṅga ādīsu samāsesu

original: Pumaiccetassa anto akāro lopamāpajjate liṅgādīsu parapadesu samāsesu, “aṃmo niggahītaṃ jhalapehī”ti makārassa niggahītaṃ. Puṅkokilo. Evaṃ punnāgo.
analyzed: antaḥ akāraḥ lopam āpajjate liṅga ādīsu para padesu samāsesu niggahītam jha l apehi iti makārassa niggahītam puṅkokilaḥ evam punnāgaḥ

original: Khattiyā ca sā kaññā cāti viggayha samāse kate –
analyzed: khattiyā ca sā kaññā ca ati viggayha samāse kate

original: “Tulyādhikaraṇe, pade, itthiyaṃ bhāsitapumitthī pumāva ce”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: tulya adhikaraṇe pade itthiyam bhāsita pumitthī pum ava ca iti ca vattate

original: 343. Kammadhārayasaññe ca.
analyzed: kammadhāraya saññe ca

original: Kammadhārayasaññe ca samāse itthiyaṃ vattamāne tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare pubbabhūto
analyzed: kammadhāraya saññe ca samāse itthiyam vattamāne tulya adhikaraṇe uttara pade pare pubba bhūtaḥ

original: itthivācako saddo pubbe bhāsitapumā ce, so pumā iva daṭṭhabboti pubbapade itthippaccayassa nivatti hoti.
analyzed: itthi vācako saddo pubbe bhāsita pumā ce saḥ pumā iva daṭṭhabbaḥ iti pubba pade itthi ppaccayassa hoti

original: Khattiyakaññā, khattiyakaññāyo iccādi. Evaṃ rattalatā, dutiyabhikkhā, brāhmaṇī ca sā dārikā cāti brāhmaṇadārikā, nāgamāṇavikā.
analyzed: khattiya kaññā iccādi evam ratta latā dutiya bhikkhā brāhmaṇī ca sā dārikā ca ati brāhmaṇa dārikā nāga māṇavikā

original: Pubbapadassevāyaṃ pumbhāvātideso, tena “khattiyakumārī kumārasamaṇī taruṇabrāhmaṇī”tiādīsu uttarapadesu itthippaccayassa na nivatti hoti.
analyzed: pubba padassa iva ayam pumbhāva atideso tena khattiya kumārī kumāra samaṇī taruṇa brāhmaṇī iti ādīsu uttara padesu itthi paccayassa na hoti

original: Itthiyamicceva kiṃ? Kumārīratanaṃ, samaṇīpadumaṃ.
analyzed: itthiyam itthiyam ca iva kim kumārī ratanam

original: Bhāsitapumāti kiṃ? Gaṅgānadī, taṇhānadī, pathavīdhātu. “Nandāpokkharaṇī, nandādevī”tiādīsu pana saññāsaddattā na hoti.
analyzed: bhāsita pumā ati kim gaṅgā nadī taṇhā nadī pathavī dhātu nandā pokkharaṇī nandādevī iti ādīsu pana saññā saddattā na hoti

original: Tathā puratthimo ca so kāyo cāti puratthimakāyo, ettha ca kāyekadeso kāyasaddo. Evaṃ
analyzed: tathā puratthimo ca so kāyo ca ati puratthima kāyaḥ ettha ca kāya ekadesaḥ kāya saddo evam

original: pacchimakāyo, heṭṭhimakāyo, uparimakāyo, sabbakāyo, purāṇavihāro, navāvāso, kataranikāyo,
analyzed: pacchima kāyo heṭṭhima kāyo uparima kāyo sabba kāyo purāṇa vihāro nava āvāso katara nikāyo

original: katamanikāyo, hetuppaccayo, abahulaṃ bahulaṃ katanti bahulīkataṃ, jīvitappadhānaṃ
analyzed: katama nikāyaḥ hetu ppaccayaḥ abahulam bahulam katanti bahulīkatam jīvita ppadhānam

original: navakaṃ jīvitanavakaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: navakam jīvita navakam it ca ādi

original: Visesanuttarapade jinavacanānuparodhato therācariyapaṇḍitādi visesanaṃ parañca bhavati.
analyzed: visesana uttara pade jina vacana an uparodhato thera ācariya paṇḍita ādi visesanam param ca bhavati

original: Yathā – sāriputto ca so thero cāti sāriputtatthero. Evaṃ mahāmoggallānatthero, mahākassapatthero,
analyzed: yathā sāriputto ca so thero ca ati sāriputta theraḥ evam mahāmoggallāna ttheraḥ mahākassapa ttheraḥ

original: buddhaghosācariyo, dhammapālācariyo, ācariyaguttiloti vā, mahosadho ca so paṇḍito
analyzed: buddhaghosa ācariyaḥ dhammapāla ācariyaḥ ācariya guttilo ti vā mahosadhaḥ ca so paṇḍito

original: cāti mahosadhapaṇḍito. Evaṃ vidhurapaṇḍito, vatthuviseso.
analyzed: ca ati mahosadha paṇḍitaḥ evam vidhura paṇḍitaḥ vatthu viseso

original: Visesanobhayapado yathā – sītañca taṃ uṇhañcāti sītuṇhaṃ, siniddho ca so uṇho cāti
analyzed: visesana ubhaya padaḥ yathā sītam ca tam uṇham ca ati sītuṇham siniddhaḥ ca saḥ uṇhaḥ ca ati

original: siniddhuṇho, māso. Khañjo ca so khujjo cāti khañjakhujjo. Evaṃ andhabadhiro, katākataṃ,
analyzed: siniddhuṇhaḥ māsaḥ khañjaḥ ca saḥ khujjaḥ ca ati khañjakhujjaḥ evam andha badhiraḥ kata akatam

original: chiddāvachiddaṃ, uccāvacaṃ, chinnabhinnaṃ, sittasammaṭṭhaṃ, gatapaccāgataṃ.
analyzed: chidda avachiddam uccāvacam chinna bhinnam sitta sammaṭṭham gata paccāgatam

original: Upamānuttarapade abhidhānānurodhato upamānabhūtaṃ visesanaṃ paraṃ bhavati. Yathā
analyzed: upamāna uttara pade abhidhāna anurodhataḥ upamāna bhūtam visesanam param bhavati yathā

original: – sīho viya sīho, muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho. Evaṃ munivasabho, munipuṅgavo, buddhanāgo,
analyzed: sīhaḥ ca saḥ sīhaḥ ca ati muni sīhaḥ evam muni vasabhaḥ muni puṅgavaḥ buddha nāgo

original: buddhādicco, raṃsi viya raṃsi, saddhammo ca so raṃsi cāti saddhammaraṃsi. Evaṃ vinayasāgaro,
analyzed: buddha ādiccaḥ raṃsi viya raṃsi saddhammo ca saḥ raṃsi ca ati saddhamma raṃsi evam vinaya sāgaraḥ

original: puṇḍarīkamiva puṇḍarīko, samaṇo ca so puṇḍarīko cāti samaṇapuṇḍarīko, samaṇapadumo.
analyzed: puṇḍarīkam iva puṇḍarīkaḥ samaṇaḥ ca saḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ ca ati samaṇa puṇḍarīkaḥ samaṇa padumaḥ

original: Cando viya cando, mukhañca taṃ cando cāti mukhacando. Evaṃ mukhapadumaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: candaḥ candaḥ mukham ca tam cando ca ati mukhacando evam mukhapadumam iccādi

original: dhammasammato, pāṇasaññitā, asubhasaññā, aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, dhātusaññā, dhītusaññā,
analyzed: dhamma sammataḥ pāṇa saññitā asubha saññā anicca saññā anatta saññā dhātu saññā dhītu saññā

original: attasaññā, atthisaññā, attadiṭṭhi iccādi.
analyzed: atta saññā atthi saññā atta diṭṭhi iccādi

original: Avadhāraṇapubbapado yathā – guṇo eva dhanaṃ guṇadhanaṃ. Evaṃ saddhādhanaṃ, sīladhanaṃ,

original: cakkhudvāraṃ, rūpārammaṇamiccādi.
analyzed: cakkhu dvāram rūpa ārammaṇam iccādi

original: 344. Attaṃ nassa tappurise.
analyzed: attam nassa tappurise

original: Na nisedho sato yutto,
analyzed: na nisedhaḥ sataḥ yutto

original: Desādiniyamaṃ vinā;
analyzed: vinā

original: Asato cāphalo tasmā,
analyzed: asataḥ ca aphalaḥ tasmā

original: Kathamabrāhmaṇoti ce?
analyzed: katham abrāhmaṇāḥ iti ce

original: Parassa micchāñāṇattā-khyāpanāyopapajjate.
analyzed: parassa micchā ñāṇa ttā khyāpanāya upapajjate

analyzed: duvidhaḥ pasajja ppaṭisedha pariyudāsa vasena

analyzed: tattha yaḥ rāja dārāti ādīsu viya uttara padatthassa sabbathā abhāvam

analyzed: dīpeti so pasajjappaṭisedha vācī nāma yaḥ pana uttara pada ttham

original: pariyudāsitvā taṃsadise vatthumhi kāriyaṃ paṭipādayati, so pariyudāsavācī nāma.
analyzed: pariyudāsitvā taṃsadise vatthumhi kāriyam paṭipādayati saḥ pariyudāsavācī nāma

original: Vuttañca
analyzed: vuttam ca

original: “Pasajjappaṭisedhassa, lakkhaṇaṃ vatthunatthitā;
analyzed: pasajja ppaṭisedhassa lakkhaṇam vatthu natthi tā

analyzed: nanu evam sante pi abrāhmaṇa uti ādīsu katham uttara padattha ppadhāna tā siyāti

original: Vuccate – brāhmaṇādisaddānaṃ brāhmaṇādiatthasseva taṃsadisādiatthassāpi vācakattā,
analyzed: vuccate brāhmaṇa ādi saddānam brāhmaṇa ādi atthassa iva vācaka ttā

original: brāhmaṇādisaddā hi kevalābrāhmaṇādiatthesveva pākaṭā, bhūsaddo viyasattāyaṃ, yadā
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ādi saddāḥ hi kevala abrāhmaṇa ādi atthesu eva pākaṭāḥ bhū saddaḥ yadā

original: te pana aññena sadisādivācakena naiti nipātena yujjanti, tadā taṃsadisatadaññatabbiruddhatadabhāvesupi

original: vattanti, bhūsaddo viya anvabhiyādiyoge anubhavanaabhibhavanādīsu, tasmā uttarapadatthajotakoyevettha
analyzed: vattanti bhū saddaḥ anu abhi ādi yoge anubhavana abhibhavana ādīsu tasmai

original: Aññatthe – na byākatā abyākatā, asaṃkiliṭṭhā, apariyāpannā.
analyzed: aññatthe na byākatā a byākatā a saṃkiliṭṭhā a pariyāpannā

original: Pasajjappaṭisedhe – na katvā akatvā, akātuna puññaṃ akaronto.
analyzed: na katvā a katvā puññam a karontaḥ

original: “Nassa, tappurise”ti ca vattate.

original: 345. Sare ana.

original: Naiccetassa padassa tappurise uttarapade ana hoti sare pare.
analyzed: na e c ca itassa padassa tappurise uttara pade ana hoti sare pare

original: Na asso anasso, na ariyo anariyo. Evaṃ anissaro, aniṭṭho, anupavādo, na ādāya anādāya, anoloketvā iccādi.
analyzed: na assaḥ an assaḥ na ariyaḥ an ariyaḥ evam anissaraḥ aniṭṭhaḥ an upavādaḥ na ādāya an ādāya anoloketvā iccādi

original: Kupubbapado yathā – kucchitamannanti niccasamāsattā aññapadena viggaho, kammadhārayasamāse kate –
analyzed: ku pubba padaḥ yathā nicca samāsa ttā añña padena viggahaḥ kammadhāraya samāse kate

original: “Tappurise, sare”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: tappurise sara iti ca vattate

original: 346. Kadada kussa.
analyzed: kadada kussa

original: Kuiccetassa nipātassa tappurise uttarapade kada hoti sare pare. Kadannaṃ. Evaṃ kadasanaṃ.
analyzed: ku it ca itassa nipātassa tappurise uttara pade kada hoti sare pare kadannam evam kadasanam

original: Sareti kiṃ? Kudārā, kuputtā, kudāsā, kudiṭṭhi.
analyzed: sarā iti kim ku dārā ku puttā ku dāsā ku diṭṭhi

original: “Kussā”ti vattate.

original: 347. Kāppatthesu ca.

analyzed: tattha

analyzed: dakkhiṇa pubbassam iti

original: Dvandasamāsa

original: Tesu ādimajjhuttaresu avihitalakkhaṇesu jinavacanānuparodhena kvaci vuddhi lopa āgama
analyzed: tesu ādi majjhuttaresu avihita lakkhaṇesu jina vacana an uparodhena kvaci

original: vikāra viparītaādesā hontīti saṃyogantattepi ādivuddhi, ikāralope nyassañādeso, koṇḍañño,
analyzed: vikāra viparīta ādesāḥ honti iti ādi vuddhi ikāra lope koṇḍaññaḥ

original: kuruno putto korabyo, etthāpi teneva ukārassa avādeso, bhātuno putto bhātabyo.
analyzed: kurunaḥ putto korabyaḥ ettha api tena iva ukārassa a vādesaḥ bhātunaḥ putto bhātabyaḥ

original: “Upagussa apacca”nti viggahe –
analyzed: upagussa a paccanti viggahe

original: 371. Ṇavopagvādīhi.
analyzed: ṇava upagū ādīhi

original: Upagu manuiccevamādīhi ukārantehi gottagaṇehi ṇavappaccayo hoti vā “tassāpacca”miccetasmiṃ
analyzed: upagu manu iti evamādīhi ukāra antehi gotta gaṇehi ṇava ppaccayaḥ hoti vā

original: atthe. Ādisaddassa cettha pakāravācakattā ukārantatoyevāyaṃ. Opagavo, opagavī, opagavaṃ,
analyzed: atthe ādi saddassa ca ittha pakāra vācaka ttā ukāra antatas yā iva ayam opagavaḥ opagavī opagavam

original: manuno apaccaṃ mānavo, “mānuso”ti ṇappaccaye, sāgame ca kate rūpaṃ, bhagguno apaccaṃ
analyzed: manunaḥ apaccam mānavaḥ mānusaḥ iti ṇa ppaccaye sa āgame ca kate rūpam bhaggunaḥ apaccam

original: bhaggavo, paṇḍuno apaccaṃ paṇḍavo, upavindussa apaccaṃ opavindavo iccādi.
analyzed: bhaggavaḥ paṇḍunaḥ apaccam paṇḍavaḥ upavindussa apaccam opavindavaḥ iccādi

original: “Vidhavāya apacca”nti atthe –
analyzed: vidhavāya apaccanti atthe

original: 372. Ṇera vidhavādito.
analyzed: ṇeḥ a vidhavā āditaḥ

original: Vidhavādito ṇerappaccayo hoti vā apaccatthe. Vigato dhavo pati etissāti vidhavā,
analyzed: vidhavā āditaḥ ṇeḥ appaccayaḥ hoti vā a paccatthe vigataḥ dhavaḥ pati etissa ati vidhavā

original: vedhavero, bandhukiyā abhisāriṇiyā putto bandhukero, samaṇassa upajjhāyassa putto
analyzed: vedhaveraḥ bandhukiyāḥ abhisāriṇiyāḥ putto bandhukero samaṇassa upajjhāyassa putto

original: puttaṭṭhāniyattāti sāmaṇero, nāḷikero iccādi.
analyzed: putta ṭṭhāniyattā ati sāmaṇeraḥ nāḷikeraḥ iccādi

original: Apaccataddhitaṃ.
analyzed: a pad ca taddhitam

original: Saṃsaṭṭhādianekatthataddhita
analyzed: saṃsaṭṭha ādi aneka attha taddhita

original: “Tilena saṃsaṭṭha”nti viggahe –
analyzed: tilena saṃsaṭṭhanti viggahe

original: 373. Yena vā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tarati carati vahati ṇiko.
analyzed: yena vā saṃsaṭṭham tarati carati vahati

original: Yena vā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, yena vā tarati, yena vā carati, yena vā vahati, tato tatiyantato
analyzed: yena vā saṃsaṭṭham yena vā tarati yena vā carati yena vā vahati

original: liṅgamhā tesu saṃsaṭṭhādīsvatthesu ṇikappaccayo hoti vā. Telikaṃ bhojanaṃ, tilena
analyzed: tesu saṃsaṭṭha ādīsu atthesu ṇika ppaccayaḥ hoti vā telikam bhojanam tilena

original: abhisaṅkhatanti attho. Telikī yāgu. Guḷena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ egāḷikaṃ. Evaṃ ghātikaṃ, dādhikaṃ, māricikaṃ, loṇikaṃ.
analyzed: abhisaṅkhatanti telikī yāgu guḷena saṃsaṭṭham egāḷikam evam ghātikam dādhikam māricikam loṇikam

original: Nāvāya taratīti nāviko, uḷumpena taratīti oḷumpiko, vuddhiabhāvapakkhe uḷumpiko.
analyzed: nāvāya tarati iti nāvikaḥ uḷumpena tarati iti oḷumpikaḥ vuddhi abhāva pakkhe uḷumpikaḥ

original: Evaṃ kulliko, gopucchiko. Sakaṭena caratīti sākaṭiko. Evaṃ pādiko, daṇḍiko, dhammena
analyzed: evam kullikaḥ gopucchikaḥ sakaṭena carati iti sākaṭikaḥ evam pādikaḥ daṇḍikaḥ dhammena

original: carati pavattatīti dhammiko. Sīsena vahatīti sīsiko, vāggahaṇena īkārassa vuddhi
analyzed: carati pavattati iti dhammikaḥ sīsena vahati iti sīsikaḥ vāc gahaṇena īkārassa

original: na hoti. Evaṃ aṃsiko, khandhiko, hatthiko, aṅguliko.
analyzed: na hoti evam aṃsikaḥ khandhikaḥ hatthikaḥ aṅgulikaḥ

original: Puna vāggahaṇena aññatthesupi ṇikappaccayo, paradāraṃ gacchatīti pāradāriko, pathaṃ gacchatīti pathiko.
analyzed: puna vāc gahaṇena aññatthesu pi ṇika ppaccayaḥ paradāram gacchati iti pāradāriko patham gacchati iti pathiko

original: “Vinayamadhīte, aveccādhīte”ti vā viggahe –
analyzed: vinayam adhīte avecca adhīta iti vā viggahe

original: “Ṇiko”ti vattate.
analyzed: ṇikaḥ iti vattate

original: 374. Tamadhīte tenakatādisannidhānaniyogasippabhaṇḍajīvikatthesu ca.
analyzed: tam adhīte tenakata ādi sannidhāna niyoga sippa bhaṇḍa jīvika tthesu ca

original: Catuppadamidaṃ. Tamadhīteti atthe, tena katādīsvatthesu ca tamhi sannidhāno, tattha
analyzed: catuppadam idam tam adhīta iti atthe tena kata ādīsu atthesu ca tamhi

original: niyutto, tamassa sippaṃ, tamassa bhaṇḍaṃ, tamassa jīvikā iccetesvatthesu ca dutiyādivibhatyantehi
analyzed: niyuttaḥ tamassa sippam tamassa bhaṇḍam tamassa jīvikā icca itesu atthesu ca dutiya ādi vibhati antehi

original: liṅgehi ṇikappaccayo hoti vā. Venayiko. Evaṃ suttantiko, ābhidhammiko.
analyzed: liṅgehi ṇika ppaccayaḥ hoti vā venayikaḥ evam suttantikaḥ ābhidhammikaḥ

original: “Byākaraṇamadhīte”ti atthe ṇikappaccayādimhi kate –
analyzed: byākaraṇam adhīta iti atthe ṇika paccaya ādimhi kate

original: “Vuddhādisarassa vāsaṃyogantassa saṇe cā”ti vattamāne –
analyzed: vuddha ādi sarassa vā a saṃyoga antassa saṇe ca ati vattamāne

original: 375. Māyūnamāgamo ṭhāne.
analyzed: mā yūnam āgamaḥ ṭhāne

original: I uiccebhesaṃ ādisarānaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ mā vuddhi hoti saṇe, tatreva vuddhi āgamo hoti ca ṭhāneti ekāravuddhāgamo.
analyzed: ādisarāṇam asaṃyogantānam mā hoti saṇe tatra iva vuddhi āgamaḥ hoti ca ṭhāne iti ekāra vuddha āgamaḥ

original: “Ṭhāne”ti vacanā cettha, yūnamādesabhūtato;
analyzed: ṭhāna iti ca ittha yūnam ādesa bhūtataḥ

original: Yavehi pubbeva eo-vuddhiyo honti āgamā.
analyzed: yavehi pubbā iva eovuddhiyaḥ honti āgamā

original: Yakārassa dvibhāvo.
analyzed: yakārassa dvi bhāvaḥ

original: Veyyākaraṇiko, nyāyamadhīteti neyyāyiko. Evaṃ takkiko, vediko, nemittiko, kāyena
analyzed: veyyākaraṇikaḥ nyāyam adhīta iti neyyāyikaḥ evam takkikaḥ vedikaḥ nemittikaḥ kāyena

original: kato payogo kāyiko, kāyena kataṃ kammaṃ kāyikaṃ, vacasā kataṃ kammaṃ vācasikaṃ. Evaṃ
analyzed: kataḥ payogaḥ kāyikaḥ kāyena katam kammam kāyikam vacasā katam kammam vācasikam evam

original: mānasikaṃ, ettha ca “sasare vāgamo”ti sutte vavatthitavāsaddena paccaye parepi sāgamo,
analyzed: mānasikam ettha ca sa sare vāgamaḥ iti sutte vavatthita vā saddena paccaye pare pi sa āgamaḥ

original: therehi katā saṅgīti therikā. Evaṃ pañcasatikā, sattasatikā, ettha “ṇavaṇikā”disutte
analyzed: therehi katā therikā evam pañcasatikā sattasatikā ettha ṇavaṇikā ādi sutte

original: anuvattitavāggahaṇena īpaccayo na hoti.
analyzed: anuvattita vāc gahaṇena ī paccayaḥ na hoti

original: Sannidhānatthe sarīre sannidhānā vedanā sārīrikā, sārīrikaṃ dukkhaṃ. Evaṃ mānasikā, mānasikaṃ.
analyzed: sannidhāna atthe sarīre sannidhānā vedanā sārīrikā sārīrikam dukkham evam mānasikā mānasikam

original: Niyuttatthe dvāre niyutto dovāriko, ettha “māyūnamāgamo ṭhāne”ti vakārato pubbeokārāgamo.
analyzed: niyutta atthe dvāre niyuttaḥ dovārikaḥ ettha māyūnam āgamaḥ ṭhāne ti vakārataḥ pubbe okāra āgamaḥ

original: Evaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko, nāgariko, navakammiko, vanakammiko, ādikammiko, odariko, rathiko,
analyzed: evam bhaṇḍāgārikaḥ nāgarikaḥ nava kammikaḥ vana kammikaḥ ādi kammikaḥ odarikaḥ rathikaḥ

original: pathiko, upāye niyutto opāyiko, cetasi niyuttā cetasikā.
analyzed: pathikaḥ upāye niyuttaḥ cetasi niyuttā cetasikā

original: Sippatthe vīṇāvādanaṃ vīṇā, vīṇā assa sippaṃ veṇiko. Evaṃ pāṇaviko, modiṅgiko, vaṃsiko.
analyzed: sippatthe vīṇā vādanam vīṇā vīṇā assa sippam veṇikaḥ evam pāṇavikaḥ modiṅgikaḥ vaṃsikaḥ

original: Bhaṇḍatthe gandho assa bhaṇḍanti gandhiko. Evaṃ teliko, goḷiko, pūviko, paṇṇiko, tambūliko, loṇiko.
analyzed: bhaṇḍa tthe gandhaḥ assa bhaṇḍanti gandhikaḥ evam telikaḥ goḷikaḥ pūvikaḥ paṇṇikaḥ tambūlikaḥ loṇikaḥ

original: Jīvikatthe urabbhaṃ hantvā jīvati, urabbhamassa jīvikāti vā orabbhiko. Evaṃ māgaviko, ettha vakārāgamo. Sūkariko, sākuṇiko, macchiko iccādi.
analyzed: jīvika atthe urabbham hantvā jīvati urabbham assa jīvikā ati vā orabbhikaḥ evam māgavikaḥ ettha vakāra āgamaḥ sūkarikaḥ sākuṇikaḥ macchikaḥ iccādi

original: “Tena katādī”ti ettha ādiggahaṇena tena hataṃ, tena baddhaṃ, tena kītaṃ, tena dibbati,
analyzed: tena kata ādi iti ettha ādi ggahaṇena tena hatam tena baddham tena kītam tena dibbati

original: so assa āvudho, so assa ābādho, tattha pasanno, tassa santakaṃ, tamassa parimāṇaṃ,
analyzed: saḥ assa āvudhaḥ saḥ assa ābādhaḥ tattha pasanno tassa santakam tamassa parimāṇam

original: tassa rāsi, taṃ arahati, tamassa sīlaṃ, tattha jāto, tattha vasati, tatra vidito,
analyzed: tassa rāsi tam arahati tamassa sīlam tattha jātaḥ tattha vasati tatra viditaḥ

original: tadatthāya saṃvattati, tato āgato, tato sambhūto, tadassa payojananti evamādiatthe
analyzed: tad atthāya saṃvattati tatas āgataḥ tatas sambhūtaḥ tat assa payojana nti evamādi atthe

original: ca ṇikappaccayo hoti. Yathā – jālena hato, hanatīti vā jāliko. Evaṃ bāḷisiko, vākariko,
analyzed: ca ṇika ppaccayaḥ hoti yathā jālena hataḥ hanati iti vā jālikaḥ evam bāḷisikaḥ vākarikaḥ

original: suttena baddho suttiko, varattāya baddho vārattiko nāgo.
analyzed: suttena baddhaḥ suttikaḥ varattāya baddhaḥ vārattikaḥ nāgaḥ

original: Vatthena kītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vatthikaṃ. Evaṃ kumbhikaṃ, phālikaṃ, sovaṇṇikaṃ, sātikaṃ.
analyzed: vatthena kītam bhaṇḍam vatthikam evam kumbhikam phālikam sovaṇṇikam sātikam

original: Akkhena dibbatīti akkhiko. Evaṃ sālākiko, tindukiko, ambaphaliko. Cāpo assa āvudhoti
analyzed: akkhena dibbati iti akkhikaḥ evam sālākikaḥ tindukikaḥ ambaphalikaḥ ca apaḥ assa āvudhā ti

original: cāpiko. Evaṃ tomariko, muggariko, mosaliko.
analyzed: cāpikaḥ evam tomarikaḥ muggarikaḥ mosalikaḥ

original: Vāto assa ābādhoti vātiko. Evaṃ semhiko, pittiko.
analyzed: vātaḥ assa ābādhaḥ ti vātikaḥ evam semhikaḥ pittikaḥ

original: Buddhe pasanno buddhiko. Evaṃ dhammiko, saṅghiko. Buddhassa santako buddhiko. Evaṃ dhammiko, saṅghiko vihāro, saṅghikā bhūmi, saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ, puggalikaṃ.
analyzed: buddhe pasannaḥ buddhikaḥ evam dhammikaḥ saṅghikaḥ buddhassa santakaḥ buddhikaḥ evam dhammikaḥ saṅghikaḥ vihāraḥ saṅghikā bhūmi saṅghikam cīvaram puggalikam

original: Kumbho assa parimāṇanti kumbhikaṃ. Evaṃ khārikaṃ, doṇikaṃ. Kumbhassa rāsi kumbhiko.
analyzed: kumbhaḥ assa kumbhikam evam khārikam doṇikam kumbhassa rāsi kumbhikaḥ

original: Kumbhaṃ arahatīti kumbhiko. Evaṃ doṇiko, aṭṭhamāsiko, kahāpaṇiko, āsītikā gāthā,
analyzed: kumbham arahati iti kumbhikaḥ evam doṇikaḥ aṭṭha māsikaḥ kahāpaṇikaḥ āsītikā gāthā

original: nāvutikā, sātikaṃ, sāhassikaṃ. Sandiṭṭhamarahatīti sandiṭṭhiko, “ehi passā”ti imaṃ
analyzed: nāvutikā sātikam sāhassikam sandiṭṭham arahati iti sandiṭṭhikaḥ ehi passa ati imaṃ

original: vidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
analyzed: vidhim arahati iti ehipassikaḥ

original: Sīlatthe paṃsukūladhāraṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti paṃsukūliko. Evaṃ tecīvariko, ekāsane bhojanasīlo ekāsaniko, rukkhamūle vasanasīlo rukkhamūliko, tathā āraññiko, sosāniko.
analyzed: sīla atthe paṃsu kūla dhāraṇam paṃsu kūlam tam sīlam assa ati paṃsukūlikaḥ evam tecīvarikaḥ eka āsane bhojana sīlaḥ ekāsanikaḥ rukkha mūle vasana sīlaḥ rukkhamūlikaḥ tathā āraññikaḥ sosānikaḥ

original: Jātatthe apāye jāto āpāyiko. Evaṃ nerayiko, sāmuddiko maccho, vassesu jāto vassiko,
analyzed: jātatthe apāye jātaḥ āpāyikaḥ evam nerayikaḥ sāmuddikaḥ macchaḥ vassesu jātaḥ vassikaḥ

original: vassikā, vassikaṃ pupphaṃ, sāradiko, hemantiko, vāsantiko, cātuddasiko, rājagahe
analyzed: vassikā vassikam puppham sāradikaḥ hemantikaḥ vāsantikaḥ cātuddasikaḥ rājagahe

original: jāto, rājagahe vasatīti vā rājagahiko jano, magadhesu jāto, vasatīti vā māgadhiko,
analyzed: jātaḥ rājagahe vasati iti vā rājagahikaḥ janaḥ magadhesu jātaḥ vasati iti vā māgadhikaḥ

original: māgadhikā, māgadhikaṃ, sāvatthiyaṃ jāto, vasatīti vā sāvatthiko, kāpilavatthiko, vesāliko.
analyzed: māgadhikā māgadhikam sāvatthiyam jātaḥ vasati iti vā sāvatthikaḥ kāpilavatthikaḥ vesālikaḥ

original: Loke vidito lokiko, lokāya saṃvattatītipi lokiko. Tathā mātito āgataṃ mātikaṃ, pitito āgataṃ pettikaṃ nāmaṃ.
analyzed: loke viditaḥ lokikaḥ lokāya saṃvattati iti pi lokiko tathā mātitaḥ āgatam mātikam pititaḥ āgatam pettikam nāmam

original: Sambhūtatthe mātito sambhūtaṃ mattikaṃ. Evaṃ pettikaṃ. Upadhitassa payojanaṃ opadhikaṃ.
analyzed: sambhūta atthe mātitaḥ sambhūtam mattikam evam pettikam upadhitassa payojanam opadhikam

original: Sakatthepi asaṅkhāroyeva asaṅkhārikaṃ. Evaṃ sasaṅkhārikaṃ, nāmameva nāmikaṃ. Evaṃ
analyzed: asaṅkhāro yā iva asaṅkhārikam evam sa saṅkhārikam nāmam eva nāmikam evam

original: ākhyātikaṃ, opasaggikaṃ, nepātikaṃ, catumahārāje bhatti etesanti cātumahārājikā.
analyzed: ākhyātikam opasaggikam nepātikam cātumahārājikā

original: Evaṃ aññatthepi yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam aññattha api yojetabbam

original: “Kasāvena ratta”nti viggahe –
analyzed: kasāvena rattanti viggahe

original: 376. Ṇa rāgā tenarattaṃ tassedamaññatthesu ca.
analyzed: rāgā tenarattam tassa idam aññatthesu ca

original: Rāgatthavācakā liṅgamhā “tena ratta”miccetasmiṃ atthe, “tasse”ti chaṭṭhiyantato “ida”miccetasmiṃ atthe ca aññatthesu ca ṇappaccayo hoti vā.
analyzed: rāga attha vācakāḥ tena rattam icca etasmin atthe tassa iti idam icca etasmin atthe ca aññatthesu ca ṇa ppaccayaḥ hoti vā

original: Kāsāvaṃ vatthaṃ. Evaṃ kāsāyaṃ, kusumbhena rattaṃ kosumbhaṃ, haliddiyā rattaṃ hāliddaṃ, pattaṅgaṃ, mañjiṭṭhaṃ, kuṅkumaṃ, nīlena rattaṃ nīlaṃ. Evaṃ pītaṃ.
analyzed: kāsāvam vattham evam kāsāyam kusumbhena rattam kosumbham haliddiyā rattam hāliddam pattaṅgam mañjiṭṭham kuṅkumam nīlena rattam nīlam evam pītam

original: Idamatthe mahiṃsassa idaṃ māhiṃsaṃ maṃsaṃ, dadhi sappi cammādikaṃ vā, sūkarassa idaṃ sūkaraṃ, kaccāyanassa idaṃ kaccāyanaṃ byākaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sogataṃ sāsanaṃ.
analyzed: idamatthe mahiṃsassa idam māhiṃsam maṃsam dadhi sappi camma ādikam vā sūkarassa idam sūkaram kaccāyanassa idam kaccāyanam byākaraṇam evam sogatam sa āsanam

original: “Isissa ida”nti atthe ṇappaccaye kate vuddhimhi sampatte –
analyzed: isissa idanti atthe ṇap paccaye kate vuddhimhi sampatte

original: “Saṇe, yūnamāgamo ṭhāne”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: saṇe yūnam āgamaḥ ṭhāna iti ca vattate

original: 377. Āttañca.
analyzed: ā t tañ ca

original: I uiccetesaṃ ādisarānaṃ āttañca hoti saṇakārappaccaye pare, casaddena rikārāgamo ca ṭhāneti ikārassa āttaṃ.
analyzed: ā ttam ca hoti sa ṇakāra ppaccaye pare ca saddena rikāra āgamaḥ ca ṭhāne iti ikārassa āttam

original: Ṭhānādhikārato āttaṃ, isūsabhaujādinaṃ;
analyzed: ṭhāna adhikārataḥ ā ttam

original: Isissa tu rikārāga-mo cāttānantare bhave.
analyzed: isissa tu ri kāra āgamaḥ ca ātta anantare bhave

original: Ārisyaṃ, usabhassa idaṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ, āsabhī vācā.
analyzed: ārisyam usabhassa idam āsabham ṭhānam āsabhī vācā

original: Aññatthaggahaṇena pana avidūrabhavo, tatra bhavo, tatra jāto, tato āgato, so assa
analyzed: aññattha gahaṇena pana avidūra bhavo tatra bhavo tatra jāto tatas āgato so assa

original: nivāso, tassa issaro, kattikādīhi niyutto māso, sāssa devatā, tamaveccādhīte, tassa
analyzed: nivāsaḥ tassa issaraḥ kattikā ādīhi niyuttaḥ māso sā assa devatā tam avecca adhīte tassa

original: visayo deso, tasmiṃ dese atthi, tena nibbattaṃ, taṃ arahati, tassa vikāro, tamassa
analyzed: visayaḥ deso tasmin dese atthi tena nibbattam tam arahati tassa vikāro tamassa

original: parimāṇanti iccevamādīsvatthesu ca ṇappaccayo. Yathā – vidisāya avidūre bhavo vediso
analyzed: parimāṇanti iti ca ivamādīsu atthesu ca ṇa p paccayaḥ yathā vidisāya avidūre bhavaḥ vediso

original: gāmo, udumbarassa avidūre bhavaṃ odumbaraṃ vimānaṃ.
analyzed: gāmaḥ udumbarassa avidūre bhavaṃ odumbaram vimānam

analyzed: mettā mettī vā pure bhavā porī vācā

analyzed: jāta ādīsu pāvuse jātaḥ pāvusaḥ meghaḥ pāvusā ratti pāvusam abbham sara de jātaḥ sāra daḥ

analyzed: māsaḥ sāradā ratti sāradam puppham evam sisiraḥ hemantaḥ vasantaḥ

analyzed: rājagahaḥ assa nivāsaḥ iti vā rājagahassa issaraḥ iti vā rājagahaḥ rājagahakaḥ vā evam

original: Byākaraṇaṃ aveccādhīte veyyākaraṇo. Evaṃ mohutto, nemitto, aṅgavijjo, vatthuvijjo. Vasātīnaṃ visayo deso vāsāto, udumbarā asmiṃ padese santīti odumbaro deso.

original: Sahassena nibbattā sāhassī parikhā, payasā nibbattaṃ pāyāsaṃ, sahassaṃ arahatīti sāhassī gāthā, ayaso vikāro āyaso. Evaṃ sovaṇṇo, puriso parimāṇamassāti porisaṃ udakaṃ.

original: Caggahaṇena tattha jāto, tattha vasati, tassa hitaṃ, taṃ arahatītiādīsu ṇeyyappaccayo.

original: Tathā iyappaccaye manussajātiyā jāto manussajātiyo, manussajātiyā, manussajātiyaṃ. Evaṃ assajātiyo, hatthijātiyo, bodhisattajātiyo, dabbajātiyo, samānajātiyo, lokiyo iccādi.

original: 382. Upamatthāyitattaṃ.
analyzed: upamatthāyitattam

analyzed: tad nissitam ti atthe tad assa ṭhānam ti atthe ca la paccayaḥ hoti duṭṭhu nissitam duṭṭhu ṭhānam vā duṭṭhullam duṭṭhullā vācā lassa dvi bhāvaḥ evam vedallam

analyzed: ālu tap bahule

analyzed: evam ettha puna

analyzed: tathā kiṃyata itataḥ parimāṇa atthe ttaka vantup paccayā kim parimāṇam assa ati kittakam

original: Evaṃ yattakaṃ, tattakaṃ, ettakaṃ. Vantumhi āttañca, yaṃ parimāṇamassāti yāvā, yāvanto,

original: guṇavantusamaṃ. Evaṃ tāvā, tāvanto. Etāvā, etāvanto iccādi.
analyzed: evam tāvā tāvantaḥ etāvā etāvantaḥ iccādi

original: “Suvaṇṇena pakata”nti viggahe –

original: 385. Tappakativacane mayo.
analyzed: tad pakativacane ma yaḥ

original: Tappakativacanatthe mayappaccayo hoti, pakarīyatīti pakati, tena pakati tappakati,
analyzed: tad pakati vacana tthe mayap paccayaḥ hoti pakarīyati iti pakati tena pakati tad pakati

original: tappakatiyā vacanaṃ kathanaṃ tappakativacanaṃ. Suvaṇṇamayo ratho, sovaṇṇamayo vā,

original: suvaṇṇamayā bhājanavikati, suvaṇṇamayaṃ bhājanaṃ. Evaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ, rajatamayaṃ,
analyzed: suvaṇṇa mayāḥ suvaṇṇa mayam bhājanam evam rūpiya mayam rajata mayam

original: jatumayaṃ, dārumayaṃ, mattikāmayaṃ, iddhiyā nibbattaṃ iddhimayaṃ.
analyzed: jatu mayam dāru mayam mattikā mayam iddhiyā nibbattam iddhi mayam

original: Manato nipphannā manomayā, ayasāpakataṃ ayomayaṃ. Ettha ca “manogaṇādīna”nti vattamāne –
analyzed: nipphannāḥ manaḥ mayāḥ ayasā apakatam ayaḥ mayam ettha ca vattamāne

original: 386. Etesamo lope.
analyzed: e te samaḥ lope

original: Etesaṃ manogaṇādīnaṃ anto ottamāpajjate vibhattilope kateti okāro.
analyzed: etesam manaḥ gaṇa ādīnam antaḥ ottamā āpajjate vibhatti lope katā iti okāraḥ

original: Gavena pakataṃ karīsaṃ, goto nibbattanti vā gomayaṃ. “Mayo”tiyogavibhāgena sakatthepi dānameva dānamayaṃ, sīlamayaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: gavena pakatam karīsam gotaḥ nibbattanti vā gomayam dānam eva dāna mayam sīla mayam iccādi

original: Saṃsaṭṭhādianekatthataddhitaṃ.
analyzed: saṃsaṭṭha ādi aneka attha taddhitam

original: Bhāvataddhita
analyzed: bhāva taddhita

original: “Alasassa bhāvo”ti viggahe –
analyzed: alasassa bhāvaḥ ti viggahe

original: 387. Ṇyattatā bhāve tu.
analyzed: ṇyat tatā bhāve tu

original: Chaṭṭhiyantato ṇyattatāiccete paccayā honti “tassa bhāvo” iccetasmiṃ atthe, tusaddaggahaṇena
analyzed: chaṭṭhi yantataḥ ṇi a t ta tā it ca ete paccayāḥ honti tassa bhāvaḥ i cca itasmin atthe tu sadda gahaṇena

analyzed: ca bhavanti etasmai buddhi saddāḥ iti bhāvaḥ sadda ppavatti nimittam

original: vuccati, vuttañca – “yassa guṇassa hi bhāvā dabbe saddaniveso tadabhidhāneṇyattatādayo”ti.

original: Ālasyaṃ. Evaṃ ārogyaṃ, udaggassa bhāvo odagyaṃ, sakhino bhāvo sakhyaṃ, aṇaṇassa bhāvo āṇaṇyaṃ, vidhavāya bhāvo vedhabyaṃ, dubbalassa bhāvo dubbalyaṃ, capalassa bhāvo cāpalyaṃ.
analyzed: ālasyam evam ārogyam udaggassa bhāvaḥ odagyam sakhinaḥ bhāvaḥ sakhyam aṇaṇassa bhāvaḥ āṇaṇyam vidhavāya bhāvaḥ vedhabyam dubbalassa bhāvaḥ dubbalyam capalassa bhāvaḥ cāpalyam

original: Viyattassa bhāvo veyyattiyaṃ, maccharassa bhāvo macchariyaṃ. Evaṃ issariyaṃ, ālasiyaṃ, muṇḍiyaṃ, mūḷhiyaṃ. Ettha “veyyattiya”ntiādīsu “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā yamhi ikārāgamo.
analyzed: viyattassa bhāvaḥ veyyattiyam maccharassa bhāvaḥ macchariyam evam issariyam ālasiyam muṇḍiyam mūḷhiyam ettha veyyattiya nti ādīsu tesu vuddhi iti ādinā yamhi ikāra āgamaḥ

original: “Paṇḍitassa bhāvo paṇḍitya”ntiādīsu “yavataṃ talanadakārānaṃ byañjanāni calañajakāratta”nti
analyzed: paṇḍitassa bhāvaḥ byañjanāni

original: tyakārasaṃyogādīnaṃ calañajakārādesā, dvittaṃ. Paṇḍiccaṃ, bahussutassa bhāvo bāhussaccaṃ,

analyzed: muṭṭhassatissa bhāvaḥ muṭṭhassaccam i vaṇṇa lopaḥ kusalassa bhāvaḥ kosallam evam vepullam

original: saṃyoge pare rassattaṃ.
analyzed: saṃyoge pare raḥ sattam

analyzed: īkārassa akāraḥ tathā purisassa bhāvaḥ talana ādi sutte kāra ggahaṇena

original: yavataṃ sakārakacaṭapavaggānaṃ sakārakacaṭapavaggādesā. Sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṃ.
analyzed: yavatam sakāraka caṭapa vaggānam sakāraka caṭapa vagga ādesā sumanassa bhāvaḥ somanassam

original: Evaṃ domanassaṃ, sovacassaṃ, dovacassaṃ, ettha sakārāgamo. Tathā nipakassa bhāvo
analyzed: evam domanassam sovacassam dovacassam ettha sakāra āgamaḥ tathā nipakassa bhāvo

original: rājino bhāvo rajjaṃ, “kvacā”dinā rassattaṃ. Sarūpassa bhāvo sāruppaṃ. Evaṃ opammaṃ, sokhummaṃ.
analyzed: rājinaḥ bhāvaḥ rajjam kvaca ādinā rassattam sarūpassa bhāvaḥ sāruppam evam opammam sokhummam

original: Tathassa bhāvo tacchaṃ, dummedhassa bhāvo dummejjhaṃ, samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ. Evaṃ
analyzed: tathassa bhāvaḥ taccham dummedhassa bhāvaḥ dummejjham samaṇassa bhāvaḥ sāmaññam evam

analyzed: brāhmaññam nipuṇassa bhāvaḥ nepuññam tad śanti ādīsu pi kāra ggahaṇena iva yava tam

analyzed: vīriyam paribhaṭassa kammam pāribhaṭyam pāribhaṭyassa bhāvaḥ pāribhaṭya tā evam

original: Tatopi adhiko pāpatamo, pāpatamā, pāpatamaṃ. Pāpisiko, pāpisikā, pāpisikaṃ. Pāpiyo,

analyzed: pāpiyā pāpiyam pāpiṭṭhaḥ pāpiṭṭhā pāpiṭṭham atisayena pāpiṭṭhaḥ pāpiṭṭhataraḥ

original: 391. Vuḍḍhassa jo iyiṭṭhesu.

analyzed: sabbassa iva vuḍḍha saddassa jaḥ hoti iya iṭṭha e c ca etesu paccayesu jeyyaḥ jeṭṭhaḥ ettha

original: “kvacāsavaṇṇaṃ lutte”ti ekāro.

original: 392. Pasatthassa so ca.

original: Sabbasseva pasatthasaddassa sādeso hoti, jo ca iyiṭṭhesu. Ayañca pasattho ayañca pasattho sabbe ime pasatthā ayamimesaṃ visesena pasatthoti seyyo, seṭṭho, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.

original: 393. Antikassa nedo.

analyzed: bāḷhassa sādho

analyzed: sabbassa appa saddassa kaṇa hoti visesena appo ti kaṇiyaḥ kaṇiṭṭhaḥ

original: 396. Yuvānañca.
analyzed: yuvānañca

original: Sabbassa yuvasaddassa kaṇa hoti iyiṭṭhesu. “Tesu vuddhī”tiādinā ṇakārassa nakāro. Kaniyo, kaniṭṭho.

analyzed: vantu mantu vīnañca lopo

original: Sattadasatthavācakassa dasassa satta, yovacanassa ri, ti ca. Sattari, sattati, dvāsattari, dvāsattati, dvisattari, disattati, tesattati, tisattati iccādi.

original: Gamimhi “kvacādivaṇṇāna”ntiādinā dvebhāvo, “pubbobbhāso”ti abbhāsasaññā.
analyzed: gamimhi kva ca ādi vaṇṇa an anti ādinā dve bhāvaḥ pubbobbhāsaḥ iti abbhāsa saññā

original: “Abbhāse”ti vattate.
analyzed: ap bhāsā iti vattate

original: 467. Kavaggassa cavaggo.
analyzed: kavaggassa cavaggaḥ

original: Abbhāse vattamānassa kavaggassa cavaggo hotīti vakārassa jakāro, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā
analyzed: ap bhāse vattamānassa ka vaggassa ca vaggaḥ hoti iti vakārassa jakāraḥ kvaci dhātu uti ādinā

analyzed: an ap bhāsassa paṭhama purisa ekavacanamhi dīghaḥ saḥ gāmam jagāma kira jagama vā jagamu

original: Jagame, jagamittha. Jagamaṃ, jagamimha. Jagamittha, jagamire. Jagamittho, jagamivho. Jagamiṃ, jagamimhe.
analyzed: jagame jagamittha jagamam jagamimha jagamittha jagamire jagamitthaḥ jagamivhaḥ jagamim jagamimhe

original: Kammani jagamīyittha, jagamittha vā iccādi.
analyzed: kammani jagamīyittha jagamittha vā iccādi

original: Parokkhāvibhatti.
analyzed: parokkhā vibhatti

original: 468. Ajjatanī ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṃ, amhe.
analyzed: ī uṃ o ttha iṃ mhā ā ū se vhaṃ amhe

original: Īādayo dvādasa ajjatanīsaññā honti. Ajja bhavo ajjatano, taddīpakattā ayaṃ vibhatti ajjatanīti vuccati.
analyzed: ī ādayaḥ dvādasa ajjatanī saññāḥ honti ajja bhavaḥ ajjatano tad dīpaka ttā ayam vibhatti ajjatanī iti vuccati

original: “Apaccakkhe, atīte, paccakkhe”ti ca vattate.
analyzed: a paccakkhe atīte paccakkha iti ca vattate

original: 469. Samīpejjatanī.
analyzed: samīpa ijjatanī

original: Samīpe samīpato paṭṭhāya ajjappabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe ca apaccakkhe ca ajjatanīvibhatti hotīti ajjatanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ī.
analyzed: samīpe samīpatas paṭṭhāya ajjappabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe ca apaccakkhe ca ajjatanī vibhatti hoti iti ajjatanī parassa pada paṭhama purisa ekavacanam ī

original: Pure viya akārāgamo, vuddhādi ca, “kvaci dhātuvibhattī”tiādinā īmhādivibhattīnaṃ
analyzed: pure akāra āgamaḥ ca kvaci dhātu vibhatti iti ādinā īmha ādi vibhattīnam

original: akārāgamābhāve bhavi.
analyzed: akāra āgama abhāve bhavi

original: Maṇḍūkagatiyā “vā”ti vattate.
analyzed: maṇḍūka gatiyā vāti vattate

original: 470. Sabbato uṃ iṃ su.
analyzed: sabbataḥ uṃ iṃ su

analyzed: sabbehi dhātūhi uṃ vibhattissa iṃsu ādesaḥ hoti vā

analyzed: te abhaviṃsu bhaviṃsu vā abhavum bhavum vā tvam abhavi bhavi vā abhavaḥ bhavo

analyzed: abhavū bhavū vā abhavise bhavise vā abhavivham bhavivham vā abhavam bhavam

original: vā, abhava, bhava vā, abhavimhe, bhavimhe vā.
analyzed: vā abhava bhava vā abhavimhe bhavimhe vā

original: So apaci, paci, apacī, pacī vā, te apaciṃsu, paciṃsu, apacuṃ, pacuṃ. Tvaṃ apaci,

original: paci, apaco, paco vā, tumhe apacittha, pacittha. Ahaṃ apaciṃ, paciṃ, mayaṃ apacimha,

original: pacimha, apacimhā, pacimhā vā. So apacittha, pacittha, apacā, pacā vā, apacū, pacū.
analyzed: pacimha apacimhā pacimhā vā saḥ apacittha pacittha apacā pacā vā apacū pacū

original: Apacise, apacivhaṃ. Apacaṃ, pacaṃ, apaca, paca vā, apacimhe, pacimhe.
analyzed: apacise apacivham apacam pacam apaca paca vā apacimhe pacimhe

original: Kammani apaccittha, paccittha iccādi. Parassapadatte apacci, pacci, apaccī, paccī
analyzed: kammani apaccittha paccittha iccādi parassa padatte apacci pacci apaccī paccī

original: vā, apacciṃsu, pacciṃsu, apaccuṃ, paccuṃ. Apacci, pacci, apacco, pacco vā, apaccittha,

original: paccittha. Apacciṃ, pacciṃ, apaccimha, paccimha, apaccimhā, paccimhā vā.

original: So gāmaṃ agacchī, gacchī, agacchi, gacchi vā, te agacchiṃsu, gacchiṃsu, agacchuṃ,

analyzed: gacchum tvam agacchi gacchi agacchaḥ gacchaḥ vā tumhe agacchittha gacchittha

analyzed: aham agacchim gacchim mayam agacchimha gacchimha agacchimhāḥ gacchimhāḥ vā

analyzed: agañchimha gañchimha agañchimhāḥ gañchimhāḥ vā

analyzed: cchā desa abhāve saḥ agami gami agamī gamī vā karassa ettha

analyzed: bhāva niddesena yogavibhāgena vā sa āgame kvaci dhātu uti ādinā

analyzed: agamiṃsu gamiṃsu agamaṃsu gamaṃsu agamum gamum tvam agami gami agamaḥ gamo

original: agamumha, gamumha, agamimhā, gamimhā vā.

original: Attanopade so agacchittha, gacchittha, agañchittha, gañchittha iccādi. Cchādesābhāve
analyzed: attana upade saḥ agacchittha gacchittha agañchittha gañchittha iti cādi cha ādesa abhāve

analyzed: saḥ agamittha gamittha agamā gamā te agamū gamū ajjhagū agū tvam agamise

original: 471. Māyoge sabbakāle ca.

analyzed: sesam na iyyam saḥ mā bhavā mā bhavī mā te bhavantu antarāyāḥ mā pacā mā pacī mā

original: Atītakālikavibhatti.
analyzed: atīta kālika vibhatti

original: 472. Bhavissantī ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmissāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃssāmhe.
analyzed: bhavissantī ssati ssanti ssasi ssatha ssāmissāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṃssāmhe

analyzed: ssati ādīnam dvādasannam vacanānam bhavissantī saññā hoti bhavissatī iti bhavissantaḥ ayam vibhatti bhavissantī iti vuccati

original: 473. Anāgate bhavissantī.
analyzed: anāgate bhavissantī

analyzed: anāgate kāle bhavissantī vibhatti hoti

original: Atītepi bhavissantī, taṃkālavacanicchayā;
analyzed: atīte api bhavissantī tad kāla vacana icchayā

analyzed: na āgataḥ anāgataḥ paccaya sāmaggiyam sati āyatim uppajjana ārahaḥ ti atthaḥ ikāra āgamaḥ sara lopa ādi ca

original: Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Bhavissasi, bhavissatha. Bhavissāmi, bhavissāma. Bhavissate, bhavissante. Bhavissase, bhavissavhe. Bhavissaṃ, bhavissāmhe.

analyzed: kamme yap paccaya lopaḥ sukham tayā anubhavissate anubhavissante anubhavissase anubhavissavhe

original: Tathā pacissati, pacissanti. Pacissasi, pacissatha. Pacissāmi, pacissāma. Pacissate, pacissante. Pacissase, pacissavhe. Pacissaṃ, pacissāmhe.

analyzed: gamissanti gamissasi gamissatha gamissāmi gamissāmaḥ iccādi

original: Kamme gacchīyissate, gacchīyissante. Gacchīyissati, gacchīyissanti vā, gamīyissate,

original: Gamissati, gamissanti vā. Tathā ghammissati, ghammissanti iccādi.
analyzed: gamissati gamissanti vā tathā ghammissati ghammissanti iccādi

original: Bhavissantīvibhatti.
analyzed: bhavissantī vibhatti

original: 484. Kālātipatti ssā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃssāmhase.
analyzed: kāla atipatti ssā ssaṃsu sse ssatha ssaṃssāmhā ssatha ssisu ssase ssavhe ssiṃssāmhase

analyzed: viruddha paccaya upanipātataḥ kāraṇa vekallataḥ vā kriyāya anabhinibbatti tad dīpaka ttā

original: ayaṃ vibhatti kālātipattīti vuccati.
analyzed: ayam kāla atipattī iti vuccati

original: Kālātipattiparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ssā, akārikārāgamā, vuddhiavādesā ca, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ssā ssāmhāvibhattīnaṃ kvaci rassattaṃ, ssevacanassa ca attaṃ.

original: Abhavissase, abhavissavhe. Abhavissiṃ, abhavissāmhase.
analyzed: abhavissase abhavissavhe abhavissim abhavissāmhase

original: katesu vibhattuppatti, daḷhayati vīriyaṃ, evaṃ pamāṇayati, amissayati, tathā hatthinā
analyzed: katesu daḷhayati vīriyam evam pamāṇayati amissayati tathā hatthinā

original: atikkamati atihatthayati, vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇayati, visuddhā hoti ratti visuddhayati,
analyzed: atikkamati atihatthayati vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇayati visuddhā hoti ratti visuddhayati

original: kusalaṃ pucchati kusalayati iccādi.
analyzed: kusalam pucchati kusalayati iti ca ādi

original: 540. Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
analyzed: dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetu atthe

original: Sabbehi dhātūhi hetvatthe abhidheyye ṇe ṇayaṇāpe ṇāpaya iccete paccayā parā honti,
analyzed: sabbehi dhātūhi hetu atthe abhidheyye ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayaḥ icca ete paccayā parā honti

original: te kāritasaññā ca honti. Hetuyeva attho hetvattho, so ca “yo kāreti sa hetū”ti laddhahetusañño
analyzed: te kārita saññā ca honti hetuyā iva attho hetu attho so ca yaḥ kāreti sa hetu uti laddha hetu sañño

original: suddhakattuno payojako hetukattā, atthato pesanajjhesanādiko payojakabyāpāro idha hetu nāma.
analyzed: payojakaḥ hetuka ttā atthataḥ pesana ajjhesana ādikaḥ payojaka byāpāraḥ idha hetu nāma

original: Ettha ca –
analyzed: ettha ca

original: Ṇe ṇayāva uvaṇṇantā, āto dve pacchimā siyuṃ;
analyzed: ṇe ṇayāvaḥ uvaṇṇantāḥ ā taḥ dve pacchimā siyum

original: Sesato caturo dve vā, vāsaddassānuvattito.
analyzed: sesataḥ caturaḥ dve vā

original: Akammā dhātavo honti, kārite tu sakammakā;
analyzed: akammāḥ dhātavaḥ honti kārite tu sa kammakā

original: Sakammakā dvikammāssu, dvikammā tu tikammakā.
analyzed: sa kammakā dvi kammā assu dvi kammā tu ti kammakā

original: Tasmā kattari kamme ca, kāritākhyātasambhavo;
analyzed: tasmāt kattari kamme ca kāritā ākhyāta sambhavaḥ

original: Na bhāve suddhakattā ca, kārite kammasaññito.
analyzed: na bhāve suddha kattā ca kārite kamma saññitaḥ

original: Niyādīnaṃ padhānañca, appadhānaṃ duhādinaṃ;
analyzed: padhānam ca ap padhānam duha ādinam

original: Kārite suddhakattā ca, kammamākhyātagocaranti.
analyzed: kārite suddha kattā ca kammam ākhyāta gocaranti

original: Tattha yo koci bhavati, tamañño “bhavāhi bhavāhi” iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā bhavantaṃ
analyzed: tattha yaḥ koci bhavati tam aññaḥ bhavāhi bhavāhi iti evam bravīti atha vā bhavantam

original: bhavituṃ samatthaṃ payojayati, bhavituṃ payojetīti vā atthe iminā ṇeṇayappaccayā,
analyzed: bhavitum samattham payojayati bhavitum payojeti iti vā atthe iminā ṇe ṇaya ppaccayā

original: kāritasaññā ca, “vuttatthānamappayogo”ti vākyassa appayogo, “kāritānaṃ ṇo lopa”nti
analyzed: kārita saññā ca vutta tthānam appayogo ti vākyassa appayogo kāritānam ṇaḥ

original: ṇalopo, “asaṃyogantassa vuddhi kārite”ti ūkārassokāro vuddhi.
analyzed: ṇa lopaḥ a saṃyoga antassa kāritā iti ūkārassa ukāraḥ

original: “O, e”ti ca vattate, dhātuggahaṇañca.
analyzed: o e ti ca vattate dhātu ggahaṇam ca

original: 541. Te āvāyā kārite.
analyzed: te āvāyā kārite

original: Te dhātvantabhūtā okārekārā āvaāyādese pāpuṇanti kārite pare. “Te āvāyā”ti yogavibhāgena
analyzed: te dhātu anta bhūtāḥ okāra ekārāḥ pāpuṇanti kārite pare te yoga vibhāgena

original: jheādīnaṃ akāritepi hontīti okārassa āvādeso, saralopādi, “dhātuppaccayehi vibhattiyo”ti tyādayo.
analyzed: jhe ādīnam a kārite pi honti iti okārassa āva ādesaḥ sara lopa ādi dhātu ppaccayehi ti tya ādayaḥ

original: So samādhiṃ bhāveti, bhāvayati, bhāventi, bhāvayanti. Bhāvesi, bhāvayasi, bhāvetha, bhāvayatha. Bhāvemi, bhāvayāmi, bhāvema, bhāvayāma. Bhāvayate, bhāvayante.
analyzed: saḥ samādhim bhāveti bhāvayati bhāventi bhāvayanti bhāvesi bhāvayasi bhāvetha bhāvayatha bhāvemi bhāvayāmi bhāvema bhāvayāma bhāvayāma bhāvayate bhāvayante

original: Kamme attanopadayappaccayaīkārāgamā, saralopādi ca, tena bhāvīyate samādhi, bhāvīyante. Bhāvīyati, bhāvīyanti.
analyzed: kamme sara lopa ādi ca tena bhāvīyate bhāvīyante bhāvīyati bhāvīyanti

original: Tathā bhāvetu, bhāvayatu, bhāventu, bhāvayantu. Bhāvehi, bhāvaya, bhāvayāhi, bhāvetha, bhāvayatha. Bhāvemi, bhāvayāmi, bhāvema, bhāvayāma. Bhāvayataṃ, bhāvayantaṃ.
analyzed: tathā bhāvetu bhāvayatu bhāventu bhāvayantu bhāvehi bhāvaya bhāvayāhi bhāvetha bhāvayatha bhāvemi bhāvayāmi bhāvema bhāvayāma bhāvayatam bhāvayantam

original: Kamme bhāvīyataṃ, bhāvīyatu, bhāvīyantu.
analyzed: kamme bhāvīyatam bhāvīyatu bhāvīyantu

original: Bhāveyya, bhāvaye, bhāvayeyya, bhāveyyuṃ, bhāvayeyyuṃ. Bhāveyyāsi, bhāvayeyyāsi,
analyzed: bhāveyya bhāvaye bhāvayeyya bhāveyyum bhāvayeyyum bhāveyyāsi bhāvayeyyāsi

original: bhāveyyātha, bhāvayeyyātha. Bhāveyyāmi, bhāvayeyyāmi, bhāveyyāma, bhāvayeyyāma. Bhāvetha,
analyzed: bhāveyyātha bhāvayeyyātha bhāveyyāmi bhāvayeyyāmi bhāveyyāma bhāvayeyyāma bhāvetha

original: bhāvayetha, bhāveraṃ, bhāvayeraṃ.
analyzed: bhāvayetha bhāveram bhāvayeram

original: Kamme bhāvīyeyya, bhāvīyeyyuṃ.
analyzed: kamme bhāvīyeyya bhāvīyeyyum

original: Ajjataniyaṃ “sattamajjatanimhī”ti yogavibhāgena kāritantāpi dīghato sakārāgamo.
analyzed: ajja taniyam satta majja tanimhi iti yoga vibhāgena dīghataḥ sakāra āgamaḥ

original: Abhāvesi, bhāvesi, abhāvayi, bhāvayi, abhāvesuṃ, bhāvesuṃ, abhāvayiṃsu, bhāvayiṃsu,
analyzed: abhāvesi bhāvesi abhāvayi bhāvayi abhāvesum bhāvesum abhāvayiṃsu bhāvayiṃsu

original: abhāvayuṃ, bhāvayuṃ. Abhāvesi, abhāvayasi, abhāvittha, abhāvayittha. Abhāvesiṃ, bhāvesiṃ,
analyzed: abhāvayum bhāvayum abhāvesi abhāvayasi abhāvittha abhāvayittha abhāvesim bhāvesim

original: abhāvayiṃ, bhāvayiṃ, abhāvimha, abhāvayimha.
analyzed: abhāvayim bhāvayim abhāvimha abhāvayimha

original: Kamme abhāvīyittha, abhāvīyi.
analyzed: kamme abhāvīyittha abhāvīyi

original: Bhāvessati, bhāvayissati, bhāvessanti, bhāvayissanti. Bhāvessasi, bhāvayissasi, bhāvissatha, bhāvayissatha. Bhāvessāmi, bhāvayissāmi, bhāvessāma, bhāvayissāma.
analyzed: bhāvessati bhāvayissati bhāvessanti bhāvayissanti bhāvessasi bhāvayissasi bhāvissatha bhāvayissatha bhāvessāmi bhāvayissāmi bhāvessāma bhāvayissāma

original: Kamme bhāvīyissate, bhāvīyissante. Bhāvīyissati, bhāvīyissanti.
analyzed: kamme bhāvīyissate bhāvīyissante bhāvīyissati bhāvīyissanti

original: Abhāvissa, abhāvayissa, abhāvissaṃsu, abhāvayissaṃsu. Kamme abhāvīyissatha, abhāvīyissa iccādi.
analyzed: abhāvissa abhāvayissa abhāvissaṃsu abhāvayissaṃsu kamme abhāvīyissatha abhāvīyissaḥ iccādi

original: Tathā yo koci pacati, tamañño “pacāhi pacāhi” iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā pacantaṃ payojeti, pacituṃ vā payojetīti atthe vuttanayena ṇe ṇayādayo, akārassākāro vuddhi, sesaṃ neyyaṃ.
analyzed: tathā yaḥ koci pacati tam añño pacāhi pacāhi icca evam bravīti atha vā pacantam payojeti pacitum vā payojeti iti atthe vutta nayena ṇe ṇaya ādayaḥ akārassa ākāraḥ sesam neyyam

original: So devadattaṃ odanaṃ pāceti, pācenti. Pācesi, pācetha. Pācemi, pācema. Pācayati,
analyzed: saḥ devadattam odanam pāceti pācenti pācesi pācetha pācemi pācema pācayati

original: pācayanti. Pācayasi, pācayatha. Pācayāmi, pācayāma. Ṇāpeṇāpayesu pana so puriso taṃ
analyzed: pācayanti pācayasi pācayatha pācayāmi pācayāma pana saḥ purisaḥ tam

original: purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpeti, pācāpenti. Pācāpayati, pācāpayanti.
analyzed: purisam odanam pācāpeti pācāpenti pācāpayati pācāpayanti

original: Kamme so odanaṃ pācīyati tena, pācayīyati, pācāpīyati, pācāpayīyati.
analyzed: saḥ odanam pācīyati tena pācayīyati pācāpīyati pācāpayīyati

original: Tathā pācetu, pācayatu, pācāpetu, pācāpayatu. Pācīyataṃ, pācīyatu, pācayīyataṃ, pācayīyatu,
analyzed: tathā pācetu pācayatu pācāpetu pācāpayatu pācīyatam pācīyatu pācayīyatam

original: pācāpīyataṃ, pācāpīyatu, pācāpayīyataṃ, pācāpayīyatu. Pāceyya, pācayeyya, pācāpeyya,
analyzed: pācāpīyatam pācāpīyatu pācāpayīyatam pācāpayīyatu pāceyya pācayeyya pācāpeyya

original: pācāpayeyya. Pācīyeyya, pācīyeyyuṃ. Apācesi, apācayi, apācāpesi, apācāpayi. Pācessati,
analyzed: pācāpayeyya pācīyeyya pācīyeyyum apācesi apācayi apācāpesi apācāpayi pācessati

original: pācayissati, pācāpessati, pācāpayissati. Apācissa, apācayissa, apācāpissa, apācāpayissa iccādi.
analyzed: pācayissati pācāpessati pācāpayissati apācissa apācayissa apācāpissa apācāpayissa iccādi

original: Gacchantaṃ, gantuṃ vā payojetīti atthe ṇe ṇayādayo, vuddhiyaṃ sampattāyaṃ –
analyzed: gacchantam gantum vā atthe ṇe ṇaya ādayaḥ

original: “Asaṃyogantassa vuddhi kārite”ti vattate.
analyzed: a saṃyogantassa vuddhi kāritā iti vattate

original: 542. Ghaṭādīnaṃ vā.
analyzed: ghaṭa ādīnam vā

original: Ghaṭādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ vuddhi hoti vā kāriteti ettha vāggahaṇena vuddhi na hoti, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo.
analyzed: ghaṭa ādīnam dhātūnam asaṃyoga antānam hoti vā kāritā iti ettha vā gahaṇena na hoti vavatthita vibhāsa atthaḥ yam vā saddaḥ

original: So taṃ purisaṃ gāmaṃ gameti, gamayati, gacchāpeti, gacchāpayati. So gāmaṃ gamīyati tena, gamayīyati, gacchāpīyati, gacchāpayīyati iccādi. Sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ uparipi.
analyzed: saḥ tam purisam gāmam gameti gamayati gacchāpeti gacchāpayati saḥ gāmam gamīyati tena gamayīyati gacchāpīyati gacchāpayīyati iccādi sabbattha yojetabbam evam upari pi

original: Ghaṭa īhāyaṃ, ghaṭantaṃ payojayati, ghaṭeti, ghaṭādīnaṃ vāti na vuddhi, ghaṭayati, ghaṭāpeti, ghaṭāpayati.
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ īhā ayam ghaṭantam payojayati ghaṭa iti ghaṭa ādīnam vāti na ghaṭayati ghaṭāpa iti ghaṭāpayati

original: “Kārite”ti vattate.
analyzed: kāritā iti vattate

original: 543. Guha dusānaṃ dīghaṃ.
analyzed: guha dusānam dīgham

original: Guhadusaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ saro dīghamāpajjate kārite pare, vuddhāpavādoyaṃ.
analyzed: dhātūnam saraḥ dīgham āpajjate kārite pare vuddha apavādaḥ yam

original: Guha saṃvaraṇe, guhituṃ payojayati gūhayati, gūhayanti. Dusa appītimhi, dussantaṃ payojayati dūsayati, dūsayanti iccādi.
analyzed: saṃvaraṇe guhitum payojayati gūhayati gūhayanti appītimhi dussantam payojayati dūsayati dūsayanti iccādi

original: Tathā icchantaṃ payojayati icchāpeti, icchāpayati, eseti, esayati. Niyacchantaṃ payojayati
analyzed: tathā icchantam payojayati icchāpa iti icchāpayati eseti esayati niyacchantam payojayati

original: niyāmeti, niyāmayati. Āsantaṃ payojayati āseti, āsayati, acchāpeti, acchāpayati.
analyzed: niyāma iti niyāmayati āsantam payojayati āsa iti āsayati acchāpa iti acchāpayati

original: Labhantaṃ payojayati lābheti, lābhayati. Vacantaṃ payojayati vāceti, vācayati, vācāpeti,
analyzed: labhantam payojayati lābha iti lābhayati vacantam payojayati vācā iti vācayati vācā apa iti

original: vācāpayati. Evaṃ vāseti, vāsayati, vāsāpeti, vāsāpayati. Vāheti, vāhayati, vāhāpeti,
analyzed: vācāpayati evam vāsā iti vāsayati vāsāpa iti vāsāpayati vāhā iti vāhayati vāhāpa iti

original: vāhāpayati. Jīreti, jīrayati, jīrāpeti, jīrāpayati. Māreti, mārayati, mārāpeti, mārāpayati.
analyzed: vāhāpayati jīra iti jīrayati jīrāpa iti jīrāpayati māra iti mārayati mārāpa iti mārāpayati

original: Dasseti, dassayati iccādi.
analyzed: dasseti dassayati iti cādi

original: Tathā tudantaṃ payojayati todeti, todayati, todāpeti, todāpayati. Pavisantaṃ payojayati,
analyzed: tathā tudantam payojayati todeti todayati todāpeti todāpayati pavisantam payojayati

original: pavisituṃ vā paveseti, pavesayati, pavesāpeti, pavesāpayati. Uddisantaṃ payojayati
analyzed: pavisitum vā paveseti pavesayati pavesāpeti pavesāpayati uddisantam payojayati

original: uddisāpeti, uddisāpayati. Pahontaṃ payojayati pahāveti, pahāvayati. Sayantaṃ payojayati
analyzed: uddisāpa iti uddisāpayati pahontam payojayati pahāveti pahāvayati sayantam payojayati

original: sāyeti, sāyayati, sāyāpeti, sāyāpayati. Ettha ekārassa āyādeso, sayāpeti, sayāpayati,
analyzed: sāyeti sāyayati sāyāpeti sāyāpayati ettha ekārassa āya ādesaḥ sayāpeti sayāpayati

original: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ṇāpeṇāpayesu āyādesassa rassattaṃ. Nayantaṃ payojayati nayāpeti,
analyzed: kvacid dhātu uti ādinā āya ādesassa rassa ttam nayantam payojayati

original: nayāpayati. Patiṭṭhantaṃ payojayati patiṭṭhāpeti, patiṭṭhāpayati, patiṭṭhapeti vā.
analyzed: nayāpayati patiṭṭhantam payojayati patiṭṭhāpeti patiṭṭhāpayati patiṭṭhapeti vā

original: Hanantaṃ payojayatīti atthe ṇeṇayādayo.
analyzed: hanantam payojayati iti atthe ṇeṇaya ādayaḥ

original: “Ṇamhī”ti vattate.
analyzed: ṇamhi iti vattate

original: 544. Hanassa ghāto.
analyzed: hanassa ghātaḥ

original: Hanaiccetassa dhātussa ghātādeso hoti ṇakāravati kāritappaccaye pare. Ghāteti, ghātayati, ghātāpeti, ghātāpayati, “vadho vā sabbatthā”ti vadhādese vadheti, vadhāpeti.
analyzed: hanai c ca itassa dhātussa ghāta ādesaḥ hoti ṇakāravati kārita ppaccaye pare ghāteti ghātayati ghātāpeti ghātāpayati vadhaḥ vā sabbattha ati vadha ādese vadheti vadhāpeti

original: Juhontaṃ payojayati juhāveti, juhāvayati. Jahantaṃ payojayati jahāpeti, jahāpayati,
analyzed: juhontam payojayati juhāva iti juhāvayati jahantam payojayati jahāpa iti jahāpayati

original: hāpeti, hāpayati. Dadantaṃ payojayati dāpeti, dāpayati. Pidahantaṃ payojayati pidhāpeti,
analyzed: hāpa iti hāpayati dadantam payojayati dāpa iti dāpayati pidahantam payojayati pidhāpa iti

original: pidhāpayati, pidahāpeti, pidahāpayati.
analyzed: pidhāpayati pidahāpeti pidahāpayati

original: Rundhantaṃ payojayati rodheti, rodhayati, rodhāpeti, rodhāpayati. Chindantaṃ payojayati
analyzed: rundhantam payojayati rodha iti rodhayati rodhāpa iti rodhāpayati chindantam payojayati

original: chedeti, chedayati, chedāpeti, chedāpayati. Yuñjantaṃ payojayati yojeti, yojayati,
analyzed: cheda iti chedayati chedāpa iti chedāpayati yuñjantam payojayati yoja iti yojayati

original: yojāpeti, yojāpayati. Bhuñjantaṃ payojayati bhojeti, bhojayati, bhojāpeti, bhojāpayati.
analyzed: yojāpa iti yojāpayati bhuñjantam payojayati bhoja iti bhojayati bhojāpa iti bhojāpayati

original: Muñcantaṃ payojayati moceti, mocayati, mocāpeti, mocāpayati.
analyzed: muñcantam payojayati moca iti mocayati mocāpa iti mocāpayati

original: Dibbantaṃ payojayati deveti, devayati. Uppajjantaṃ payojayati uppādeti, uppādayati.
analyzed: dibbantam payojayati deva iti devayati uppajjantam payojayati uppāda iti uppādayati

original: Bujjhantaṃ payojayati bodheti, bodhayati. “Dādhāntato yo kvacī”ti yakārāgamo, bujjhāpeti,
analyzed: bujjhantam payojayati bodha iti bodhayati yaḥ kvaci iti yakāra āgamaḥ

original: bujjhāpayati. Tussantaṃ payojayati toseti, tosayati, tosāpeti, tosāpayati. Sammantaṃ
analyzed: bujjhāpayati tussantam payojayati toseti tosayati tosāpeti tosāpayati sammantam

original: payojayati sameti, samayati, ghaṭādittā na vuddhi. Kuppantaṃ payojayati kopeti, kopayati.
analyzed: payojayati sameti payojayati kopeti kopayati

original: Jāyantaṃ payojayati janeti, janayati, ghaṭādittā na vuddhi.
analyzed: jāyantam payojayati janeti janayati ghaṭāt itthā na

original: Suṇantaṃ payojayati dhammaṃ sāveti, sāvayati. Pāpuṇantaṃ payojayati pāpeti, pāpayati.
analyzed: suṇantam payojayati dhammam sāveti sāvayati pāpuṇantam payojayati pāpeti pāpayati

original: Vikkiṇantaṃ payojayati vikkāyāpeti, vikkāyāpayati. Jinantaṃ payojayati jayāpeti,
analyzed: vikkiṇantam payojayati vikkāya apeti vikkāya āpayati jinantam payojayati jaya apeti

original: jayāpayati. Jānantaṃ payojayati ñāpeti, ñāpayati. Gaṇhantaṃ payojayati gāheti, gāhayati,
analyzed: jayāpayati jānantam payojayati ñāpa iti ñāpayati gaṇhantam payojayati gāha iti gāhayati

original: gāhāpeti, gāhāpayati, gaṇhāpeti, gaṇhāpayati.

original: naṃ passati, ko viya dissatīti vā kīdiso, kīdisā, kīdisī, kīdisaṃ. Etamiva naṃ passati,

original: eso viya dissatīti vā ediso, etādiso vā, edisā, edisī, edisaṃ, eiti nipātanena etasaddassa
analyzed: esaḥ viya dissati iti vā edisaḥ etādisaḥ vā edisā edisī edisam nipātanena eta saddassa

original: ekāro. Samānaṃ katvā naṃ passati, samāno viya dissatīti sādiso, sadiso, saiti nipātanena
analyzed: ekāraḥ samānam katvā nam passati samānaḥ viya dissati iti sādisaḥ sadisaḥ sa eti nipātanena

original: samānassa sādeso, tadantassa vā dīgho, sādisā, sādisī, sadisā, sadisī, sādisaṃ, sadisaṃ.
analyzed: samānassa sa ādesaḥ tad antassa vā dīghaḥ sādisā sādisī sadisā sadisī sādisam sadisam

original: Dakārassa rakārādese pana īriso, yāriso, tāriso, māriso, kīriso, eriso, sāriso, sariso.

original: Kkhādese īdikkho, yādikkho, tādikkho, mādikkho, kīdikkho, edikkho, sādikkho, sadikkho.
analyzed: kkha ādese īdikkhaḥ yādikkhaḥ tādikkhaḥ mādikkhaḥ kīdikkhaḥ edikkhaḥ sādikkhaḥ sadikkhaḥ

original: Rakārādese sārikkho, sarikkho, īkārādese īdī, yādī, tādī, mādī, kīdī, edī, sādī.
analyzed: rakāra ādese sārikkhaḥ sarikkhaḥ īkāra ādese īdī yādī tādī mādī kīdī edī sādī

original: Casaddena tumhādiupapadepi tumhe viya dissatīti tumhādiso, tumhādisī, khandhā viya dissantīti khandhādisā iccādi.
analyzed: ca saddena tumha ādi upapade pi tumhe viya dissati iti tumhādiso tumhādisī khandhāḥ viya dissanti iti khandhādisāḥ iccādi

original: Dhara dhāraṇe, apāyesvapatamāne adhigatamaggādike satte dhāreti, dharanti tenāti vā, salakkhaṇaṃ dhāreti vā, paccayehi dharīyati vāti atthe –
analyzed: dhāraṇe apāyesu apatamāne adhigata magga ādike satte dhāreti dharanti tena ati vā salakkhaṇam dhāreti vā paccayehi dharīyati vā ati atthe

original: 589. Dharādīhi rammo.
analyzed: dharā ādīhi rammo

original: Dharaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi rammappaccayo hoti.
analyzed: dharait ca evamādīhi dhātūhi rammappaccayaḥ hoti

original: So ca –
analyzed: saḥ ca

original: Kammaggahaṇabho bhāva- kammesūtettha vediyo;
analyzed: bhāva vediyaḥ

original: Akattaripi hotīti, kārake rammappaccayo.
analyzed: a kattari pi hoti iti kārake rammap paccayaḥ

original: Rādilopo, dhammo, evaṃ karīyatīti kammaṃ. Vara varaṇe, vammaṃ.
analyzed: ra ādi lopaḥ evam karīyati iti kammam varaṇe vammam

original: Saṃsa pasaṃsane papubbo, piyaiccupapadaṃ, piyaṃ pasaṃsituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti vā piyaṃ pasaṃsanasīlo, piyaṃ pasaṃsanadhammo, piyaṃ pasaṃsane sādhukārīti vā atthe –
analyzed: saṃsa pasaṃsane pa pubbaḥ piya i cc upapadam piyam pasaṃsitum sīlam yassa ati vā piyam pasaṃsana sīlaḥ piyam pasaṃsana dhammaḥ piyam pasaṃsane sādhu kārī iti vā atthe

original: 590. Tassīlādīsu ṇītvāvī ca.
analyzed: tassīla ādīsu ṇī tva avī ca

original: Sīlaṃ pakati, tassīla taddhamma tassādhukārīsvatthesu gamyamānesu sabbadhātūhi ṇī tu āvīiccete paccayā hontīti kattari ṇīpaccayo, saṃyogantattāna vuddhi. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ.
analyzed: sīlam tu āvi icca ete paccayāḥ honti iti kattari sesam na iyyam

original: Piyapasaṃsī rājā. Atha vā piyaṃ pasaṃsi, pasaṃsati, pasaṃsissati vā sīlena vā dhammena
analyzed: piya pasaṃsī rājā atha vā piyam pasaṃsi pasaṃsati pasaṃsissati vā sīlena vā dhammena

original: vā sādhu vāti piyapasaṃsī, piyapasaṃsinī, piyapasaṃsi kulaṃ. Brahmaṃ carituṃ sīlaṃ
analyzed: vā sādhu vāti piya pasaṃsī piya pasaṃsinī piya pasaṃsi kulam brahmam caritum sīlam

original: yassāti vā brahmaṃ carati sīlena, dhammena, sādhu vāti brahmacārī, brahmacārinī,
analyzed: yassa ati vā brahmam carati sīlena dhammena sādhu vāti brahmacārī brahmacārinī

original: brahmacāri. Evaṃ saccavādī, dhammavādī, sīghayāyī, pāpakārī, mālākārī iccādi.
analyzed: brahmacārī evam sacca vādī dhamma vādī sīgha yāyī pāpa kārī mālā kārī iccādi

original: Casaddena attamānepi ṇī, paṇḍitaṃ attānaṃ maññatīti paṇḍitamānī bālo, bahussutamānī iccādi.
analyzed: ca saddena attamāne pi ṇī paṇḍitam attānam maññati iti paṇḍita mānī bālaḥ bahu ssuta mānī iccādi

original: Vatu vattane papubbo, pasayha pavattituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti atthe iminā tuppaccayo, pasayhapavattā.
analyzed: vatu vattane papubbaḥ pasayha pavattitum sīlam yassa ati atthe iminā tup paccayaḥ pasayha pavattā

original: Atha vā vaca viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, pasayha pavattituṃ sīlamassāti pasayhapavattā, pasayhapavattāro,
analyzed: atha vā vaca viyattiyam vācāyam pasayha pavattitum sīlam assa ati pasayha pavattā pasayha pavattāraḥ

original: bhujādittā dhātvantalopadvittāni, sesaṃ kattusamaṃ.
analyzed: bhuja ādi ttāḥ dhātu anta lopa dvittāni sesam kattu samam

original: Bhayaṃ passituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti vā bhayaṃ dassanasīlo, bhayaṃ dassanadhammo, bhayaṃ dassane sādhukārīti vā bhayadassāvī, bhayadassāvinī, bhayadassāvi cittaṃ. Evaṃ ādīnavadassāvī.
analyzed: bhayam passitum sīlam yassa ati vā bhayam dassana sīlaḥ bhayam dassana dhammaḥ bhayam dassane sādhu kārī iti vā bhaya dassāvī bhaya dassāvinī bhaya dassāvi cittam evam ādīnava dassāvī

original: “Tassīlādīsū”ti adhikāro.
analyzed: adhikāraḥ

original: 591. Sadda ku dha ca la ma ṇḍa ttha rucādīhi yu.
analyzed: sadda ku dha ca la ma ṇ ḍa ttha ruc ādīhi yu

original: Sadda ku dha ca la maṇḍatthehi dhātūhi, rucādīhi ca yuppaccayo hoti tassīlādīsvatthesu.
analyzed: sadda ku dha ca la maṇḍa atthehi dhātūhi ruc ādīhi ca yup paccayaḥ hoti tassi lādi su atthesu

original: Ghusa sadde, ghosituṃ sīlaṃ assāti vā ghosanasīloti vā aghosayi, ghosayati, ghosayissati
analyzed: sadde ghositum sīlam assa ati vā ghosana sīlaḥ oti vā aghosayi ghosayati ghosayissati

original: sīlena, dhammena, sādhu vāti atthe iminā yuppaccayo, tassa “anakā yuṇvūna”nti anādeso,
analyzed: sīlena dhammena sādhu vāti atthe iminā yup paccayaḥ tassa an a kā yu ṇ vū nanti an ādesaḥ

original: “aññesu cā”ti vuddhi, so ghosano, sā ghosanā. Bhāsa viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, bhāsituṃ

original: sīlamassāti vā bhāsanasīlo, bhāsanadhammo, bhāsane sādhukārīti vā bhāsano.
analyzed: sīlam assa ati vā bhāsana sīlaḥ bhāsana dhammaḥ bhāsane sādhu kārī iti vā bhāsanaḥ

original: Kudha kope, kujjhituṃ sīlamassāti vā kujjhanasīloti vā kodhano, kodhanā, kodhanaṃ.
analyzed: kope kujjhitum sīlam assa ati vā kujjhana sīlaḥ iti vā kodhanaḥ kodhanā kodhanam

original: Rusa rose, rosituṃ sīlamassāti vā rosanasīloti vā rosano.
analyzed: rusa rose rositum sīlam assa ati vā rosana sīlaḥ iti vā rosanaḥ

original: Cala kampane, calituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti vā calati sīlenāti vā calano. Kapicalane, kampituṃ
analyzed: cala kampane calitum sīlam yassa ati vā calati sīlena ati vā kapi calane kampitum

original: sīlaṃ yassāti vā akampi, kampati, kampissati sīlenāti vā kampano, ikārānubandhidhātusarato
analyzed: sīlam yassa ati vā akampi kampati kampissati sīlena ati vā kampanaḥ ikāra anubandhi dhātu sarataḥ

original: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā, “niggahītañcā”ti vā niggahītāgamo. Phadi kiñcicalane, phandituṃ

original: sīlaṃ yassāti vā phandati sīlenāti vā phandano.
analyzed: sīlam yassa ati vā phandati sīlena ati vā phandanaḥ

original: Maḍi bhūsāyaṃ, maṇḍayituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti vā maṇḍayati sīlenāti vā maṇḍano. Bhūsa alaṅkāre, bhūsanasīloti vā abhūsayi, bhūsayati, bhūyayissati sīlenāti vā bhūsano, bhūsanā, bhūsanaṃ.
analyzed: bhūsāyam maṇḍayitum sīlam yassa ati vā maṇḍayati sīlena ati vā maṇḍanaḥ alaṅkāre bhūsana sīlaḥ iti vā abhūsayi bhūsayati bhūyayissati sīlena ati vā bhūsanaḥ bhūsanāḥ bhūsanam

original: Ruca dittimhi, arucci, ruccati, ruccissati sīlenāti vā rocano. Juta dittimhi, ajoti, jotati, jotissati sīlenāti vā jotano. Vaḍḍha vaḍḍhane, vaḍḍhituṃ sīlamassāti vaḍḍhano iccādi.
analyzed: ruca dittimhi arucci ruccati ruccissati sīlena ati vā rocanaḥ dittimhi ajoti jotati jotissati sīlena ati vā jotanaḥ vaḍḍha vaḍḍhane vaḍḍhitum sīlam assa ati vaḍḍhano iccādi

original: 592. Pārādigamimhā rū.
analyzed: pāra ādi gamimhāḥ rū

original: Pārādiupapadehi parasmā gamiiccetasmā dhātumhā paro rūpaccayo hoti tassīlādīsvatthesu
analyzed: pāra ādi upapadehi parasmā dhātumhā paraḥ rūpa ccayaḥ hoti

original: kattariyeva. Pāro ādi yesaṃ te pārādayo, pārādīhi gami pārādigami. Rādilopo, bhavapāraṃ
analyzed: pāraḥ ādi te pāra ādayaḥ pāra ādīhi gami pāra ādi gami ra ādi lopaḥ bhava pāram

analyzed: gantum sīlam yassa ati vā bhava pāram gamana sīlaḥ bhava pāram gamana dhammaḥ bhava pāram

analyzed: gamane sādhu kārī iti vā bhava pāragū antam gamana sīlaḥ antagū evam vedagū addhagū

original: “Rū”ti vattate.
analyzed: rūti vattate

original: 593. Bhikkhādito ca.
analyzed: bhikkhā ditaḥ ca

analyzed: bhikkha e c ca evamādīhi dhātūhi rūpa ccayaḥ hoti tassila ādīsu atthesu bhikkha yācane bhikkhitum
