original: sabbaṃ jānātīti sabbaññū. Evaṃ mattaññū, dhammaññū, atthaññū, kālaññū, kataññū iccādayo.
analyzed: sabbam jānāti iti sabbaññū evam mattaññū dhammaññū atthaññū kālaññū kataññū iccādayo

original: 594. Hanatyādīnaṃ ṇuko.
analyzed: hanati ādīnam ṇukaḥ

analyzed: chaṭṭhī ṇakāraḥ vuddha atthaḥ āhanana sīlaḥ āghātukaḥ ghāta ādeso sara lopa ādi karaṇa sīlo

analyzed: kārukaḥ bhī bhaye bhāyana sīlaḥ bhīrukaḥ rakāra āgamaḥ ava rakkhaṇe āvukaḥ pitā

original: 595. Saṃhanaññāya vā ro gho.
analyzed: saṃhanaññāya vā raḥ ghaḥ

original: Saṃpubbāya hanaiccetāya dhātuyā, aññāya ca dhātuyā paro rappaccayo hoti, hanassa gho ca. Vāggahaṇaṃ sampiṇḍanatthaṃ, vikappanatthaṃ vā, tena saṅghātotipi siddhaṃ hoti.

original: Hanassevāyaṃ gho hoti, abhidhānānurūpato;
analyzed: abhidhāna anurūpataḥ

original: Asaṃpubbā ca ro tena, paṭighotipi sijjhati.
analyzed: a saṃpubbā ca raḥ tena paṭighaḥ tipi sijjhati

original: Hana hiṃsāgatīsu saṃ pubbo, saṃhanati samaggaṃ kammaṃ samupagacchati, sammadeva kilesadarathe
analyzed: sam pubbo saṃhanati samaggam kammam samupagacchati sammat eva

original: hanatīti vā saṅgho, rādilopo, samantato nagarassa bāhiye khaññatīti parikhā, itthiyaṃ

original: āpaccayo, antaṃ karotīti antako maccu.
analyzed: āpad cayaḥ antam karoti iti antakaḥ maccu

original: “Bhāvakammesū”ti vattate.
analyzed: bhāva kammesu iti vattate

original: 596. Nandādīhi yu.
analyzed: nanda ādīhi yu

original: Nandaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi paro yuppaccayo hoti bhāvakammesu. “Anakā yuṇvūna”nti yuppaccayassa

original: anādeso, nanda samiddhimhi, nanda nandane vā. Bhāve – nandīyate nandanaṃ. Kamme –

original: gahaṇīyaṃ vā gahaṇaṃ, gaṇhanaṃ vā, caritabbaṃ caraṇaṃ, bhūyate bhavanaṃ, hūyate havanaṃ.
analyzed: gahaṇīyam vā gahaṇam gaṇhanam vā caritabbam caraṇam bhūyate bhavanam hūyate havanam

original: Rundhitabbaṃ rundhanaṃ, rodhanaṃ vā, bhuñjitabbaṃ bhuñjanaṃ, bhojanaṃ vā. Bujjhitabbaṃ
analyzed: rundhitabbam rundhanam rodhanam vā bhuñjitabbam bhuñjanam bhojanam vā bujjhitabbam

original: bujjhanaṃ, bodhanaṃ vā. Sūyati, suti vā savaṇaṃ, pāpīyatīti pāpuṇanaṃ, pāpanaṃ vā,
analyzed: bujjhanam bodhanam vā sūyati suti vā savaṇam pāpīyatīti pāpuṇanam pāpanam vā

original: pālīyatīti pālanaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: pālīyati iti pālanam i c ādi

original: “Yū”ti vattate.
analyzed: yūti vattate

original: 597. Kattukaraṇapadesesu ca.
analyzed: kattu karaṇa padesesu ca

original: Kattukaraṇapadesaiccetesvatthesu ca sabbadhātūhi yuppaccayo hoti. Ettha ca padesoti
analyzed: kattu karaṇa padesa e c ca itesu atthesu ca sabba dhātūhi yup paccayaḥ hoti ettha ca padesaḥ ti

original: adhikaraṇakārakaṃ vuccati. Kattari tāva – rajaṃ haratīti rajoharaṇaṃ toyaṃ. Āramaṇaṃ
analyzed: adhikaraṇa kārakam vuccati kattari tāva rajam harati iti rajoharaṇam toyam āramaṇam

original: vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ, vijānanaṃ vā, ānanajādesā. Ghā gandhopādāne, ghāyatīti ghānaṃ,

original: jhe cintāyaṃ, jhāyatīti jhānaṃ, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā āttaṃ.
analyzed: cintā ayam jhāyati iti jhānam kvacid

original: Karaṇe – kara karaṇe, karoti tenāti karaṇaṃ, yathāsarūpaṃ saddā byākarīyanti etenāti
analyzed: karaṇe kara karaṇe karoti tena ati karaṇam yathā sarūpam etena ati

analyzed: anena ati pamānam vuccati anena ati vacanam panudati panujjate anena ati vā panūdanaḥ

original: Sūda paggharaṇe, sūdati, sujjate anenāti vā sūdano, suṇāti, sūyati etenāti vā savaṇaṃ.
analyzed: sūda paggharaṇe sūdati sujjate anena ati vā sūdanaḥ suṇāti sūyati etena ati vā savaṇam

original: Lū chedane, lunāti, lūyati anenāti vā lavanaṃ, lavaṇaṃ, loṇaṃ vā. Nayati, nīyati
analyzed: chedane lunāti lūyati anenāti vā lavanam lavaṇam loṇam vā nayati nīyati

original: etenāti vā nayanaṃ. Pū pavane, punāti, pūyate anenāti vā pavano, sameti, samīyati
analyzed: etena ati vā nayanam pu pavane punāti pūyate anena ati vā sameti samīyati

original: vā pāpaṃ anenāti samaṇo, samaṇaṃ vā. Tathā bhāveti, bhāvīyati ekāyāti vā bhāvanā.
analyzed: vā pāpam anena ati samaṇaḥ samaṇam vā tathā bhāveti bhāvīyati ekāyāti vā bhāvanā

original: Evaṃ pācanaṃ, pācāpanaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: evam pācanam iccādi

original: Adhikaraṇe – ṭhā gatinivattimhi, tiṭṭhati tasminti ṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ sayanaṃ, senaṃ vā, āsanaṃ, adhikarīyati etthāti adhikaraṇaṃ.

original: Vāti kiṃ? Nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhuṃ, daṭṭhā. Passiya, passituna, passitvā.

original: Antaggahaṇaṃ antalopaggahaṇañcānuvattate.

original: Dakārantehi uppajja, uppajjitvā, pamajja, pamajjitvā, upasampajja, upasampajjitvā. Chidi dvidhākaraṇe, acchijja, chijja, chijjitvā, chindiya, chinditvā, chetvā.

original: 671. Ranjudādīhi dhadiddakirā kvaci ja da lopo ca.

original: mandiraṃ, rudhiraṃ, ruhiraṃ, ruciraṃ. Badha bandhane, badhiro, badhirā, badhiraṃ,

analyzed: evam ghaṭi ghaṭṭane ghaṇṭaḥ ghaṇṭā vā vaṭi āvattane vaṭi dhāraṇa bandhana saṅghātesu

original: hinotīti hetu. Jana janane, jāyatīti jantu. Tanu vitthāre, tanotīti tantu. Vasa nivāse,
analyzed: hinoti iti hetu jana janane jāyati iti jantu tanu vitthāre tanoti iti tantu vasa nivāse

original: vasati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti vatthu, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā satakārasaṃyogassa tthādeso.
analyzed: vasati ettha phalam tad āyatta vutti tāyāti vatthu kvaci dhātu uti ādinā sa takāra saṃyogassa ttha ādesaḥ

original: 682. Kuṭādīhiṭho.
analyzed: kuṭa ādi hi ṭhaḥ

original: Kuṭādīhi dhātūhi ṭhappaccayo hoti. Kuṭa chedane, kuṭati chindatīti kuṭṭho byādhi.
analyzed: kuṭa ādīhi dhātūhi ṭhap paccayaḥ hoti kuṭa chedane kuṭati chindati iti kuṭṭhaḥ byādhi

original: Kusa chedanapūraṇagandhesu, kusatīti koṭṭho udaraṃ, dhātvantalopadvittāni. Kaṭamaddane,
analyzed: chedana pūraṇa gandhesu kusati iti koṭṭhaḥ udaram dhātu anta lopa dvittāni kaṭa maddane

original: kaṭati maddatīti kaṭṭhaṃ. Kaṇa nimīlane, kaṇṭho.
analyzed: kaṭati maddati iti kaṭṭham nimīlane

original: 683. Manupūrasuṇādīhi ussanusisā.
analyzed: manu pūra suṇa ādīhi us sanu sisā

original: Manu pūra suṇaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca ussanusaisaiccete paccayā honti.
analyzed: manu pūra suṇait ca evamādīhi dhātūhi pāṭipadikehi ca ussanu saisaicca ete paccayāḥ honti

original: Manu bodhane, ussa nusā, manate jānātīti manusso, mānuso vā, dhātvantassa āttaṃ.
analyzed: manu bodhane nusā manate jānāti iti manussaḥ mānusaḥ vā dhātu antassa āttam

original: Pūra dānapūraṇesu, pūratīti puriso, rassattaṃ, poso, rakārikārānaṃ lopo, vuddhi ca, pure ucce ṭhāne setīti puriso.
analyzed: dāna pūraṇesu pūrati iti purisaḥ rassattam posaḥ lopaḥ ca pure ucce ṭhāne seti iti purisaḥ

original: Suṇa hiṃsākulasandhānesu, suṇati kulaṃ sandahatīti suṇisā. Ku kucchite, kavīyatīti
analyzed: hiṃsā kula sandhānesu suṇati kulam sandahati iti suṇisā ku kavīyati iti

original: karīsaṃ malaṃ, kussa karattaṃ, dīgho ca. Su hiṃsāyaṃ, andhakāravidhamanena sattānaṃ
analyzed: karīsam malam ca su andhakāra vidhamanena

original: bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti sūriyo, rakārāgamo, sakārassa yattañca. Maha pūjāyaṃ, mahatīti mahiso,
analyzed: bhayam hiṃsati iti sūriyaḥ rakāra āgamaḥ sakārassa yat tat ca maha pūjā ayam mahatī iti mahisaḥ

original: mahiyaṃ setītipi mahiso. Si bandhane, sīyati bandhīyatīti sīsaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: mahiyam seti itipi bandhane sīyati bandhīyati iti sīsam iti ca ādi

original: 684. Akkharehi kāra.
analyzed: akkharehi kāra

original: Akkharehi akkharavācakehi vaṇṇehi kārappaccayo hoti. Taddhitādisutte caggahaṇena
analyzed: akkharehi akkhara vācakehi vaṇṇehi kāra ppaccayaḥ hoti taddhita ādi sutte ca ggahaṇena

original: nāmabyapadese syādyuppatti, akāro, akāraṃ, akārena iccādi, ākāro, okāro, kakāro,
analyzed: nāma byapadese akāraḥ akāram akārena iccādi ākāraḥ okāraḥ kakāro

original: yakāro, hakāro, ḷakāro. Evakārādīsu pana karīyati uccārīyatīti kāro saddo, eva ca
analyzed: yakāraḥ hakāraḥ ḷakāraḥ evakāra ādīsu pana karīyati uccārīyati iti kāro saddo eva ca

original: so kāro cāti evakāro. Evaṃ dhikāro, huṃkāro, sādhukāro.
analyzed: saḥ kāro ca ati evakāraḥ evam dhikāraḥ huṃkāraḥ sādhukāraḥ

original: Ikāro dhātuniddese, vikaraṇandhitoti ca;
analyzed: ikāraḥ dhātu niddese ca

original: Bhavantettha gamissādi, hanatyādīti ñāpakā.
analyzed: bhavantā ittha gamiḥ sādi hanati ādi iti ñāpakā

original: Uṇādippaccayantanayo.
analyzed: uṇ ādip paccaya ntanayaḥ

original: Tabbādī ṇādayo niṭṭhā, tave tunādayo tathā;
analyzed: tabba ādī ṇa ādayaḥ niṭṭhā tave tu na ādayaḥ tathā

original: Mānantādi uṇādīti, chaddhā kitakasaṅgaho.
analyzed: mān anta ādi uṇ ādi iti chaddhā kitaka saṅgahaḥ

original: Iti padarūpasiddhiyaṃ kibbidhānakaṇḍo
analyzed: iti

original: Sattamo.
analyzed: sattamaḥ

original: Nigamana
analyzed: nigamana

original: Sandhi nāmaṃ kārakañca, samāso taddhitaṃ tathā;
analyzed: sandhi nāmam kārakam ca taddhitam tathā

original: Ākhyātaṃ kitakaṃ kaṇḍā, sattime rūpasiddhiyaṃ.
analyzed: ākhyātam kitakam kaṇḍā

original: Tedhā sandhiṃ catuddhā padamapi catudhā pañcadhā nāmikañca,
analyzed: tedhā sandhim catuddhā padam api catudhā pañcadhā nāmikam ca

original: Byāsā chakkārakaṃ chassamasanamapi chabbhedato taddhitañca;
analyzed: vyāsā chak kārakam chas samasanam api chap bhedataḥ taddhitaḥ ca

original: Ākhyātaṃ aṭṭhadhā chabbidhamapi kitakaṃ paccayānaṃ pabhedā,
analyzed: ākhyātam aṭṭhadhā chabbidham api kitakam paccayānam pabhedā

original: Dīpentī rūpasiddhī ciramidha janatābuddhivuḍḍhiṃ karotu.
analyzed: dīpentī rūpa siddhī ciram idha janatā buddhi vuḍḍhim karotu

original: Vikhyātānandatheravhayavaragurunaṃ tambapaṇṇiddhajānaṃ,
analyzed: vikhyāta ānanda thera vhaya vara gurunam

original: Sisso dīpaṅkarākhyaddamiḷavasumatī dīpaladdhappakāso;
Bālādiccādivāsadvitayamadhivasaṃ sāsanaṃ jotayī yo,
analyzed: sa āsanam

original: Soyaṃ buddhappiyavho yati imamujukaṃ rūpasiddhiṃ akāsi.
analyzed: saḥ ayam buddha ppiyavhaḥ yati imam ujukam rūpa siddhim akāsi

original: Iti padarūpasiddhipakaraṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: iti pada rūpa siddhi pakaraṇam niṭṭhitam
